Solution on-sentence summary: An easy-to-use, inflatable, automatic, and foldable wing sail, using wind propulsion to decrease fuel and GHG emissions
Identification: WISAMO -Wing Sail Mobility- aims to contribute to maritime transport decarbonization improving the environmental footprint of bigger ships, decreasing their fuel consumption and their GHG emissions. WISAMO solution is a large inflatable, foldable and automated wing sail using the universal and free energy of wind propulsion, operable on any vessel -as original equipment or on those ones already operating. The wing's principle is to be inflated with small fans. It is automated and it may be deployed or completely lowered thanks to a telescopic mast according to weather conditions or to facilitate the boat's mobility i.e. when passing under a bridge, when operating on the unloading dock. The position of the mast has been particularly studied to be close to the thrust center of the wing in order to be more efficient. The main differentiating characteristics of WISAMO is the simplicity of usage, optimum power in upwind conditions -the most frequent use case, and efficiency in a large range of winds.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Marine & Oceans, Cargo ships, Maritime shipping, Fuel efficiency
The environmental benefits: Large wind usage range from 30° to 135°with an optimum performance between 45° and 135° (a contrario from 60° to 150°for a generic sail, with a heavy drop of performance from 45°);As 75% of wind forces met on main commercial routes are less than 17 knots (IMO - MEPC.1/Circ.896), vessel speeds will create apparent wind more profitable for Wisamo performance (capacity to sail upwind);Thanks to its foldable mast, impact on vessel stability will be limited and preliminary fatigue will be avoided;Save up to 20% fuel consumption so up to 20% CO2 emissions;Usable in most weather conditions between minus 10 Celsius degrees to 50 Celsius degrees;As CO2 is the result of the combustion of Carbon and Oxygen, 1 ton of Marine Diesel oil uses will generate 3 tons of CO2, this saving represents a double impact : reducing GHG emissions and reduce the consumption of a limited energy source;
The Financial benefits: Around 5 years payback time; Mast lifetime of 20 years, and renewable wing after 5 year usage ;0 cost linked to operation downtime, even for retrofit implementation  ;

Identification: Steamology was founded to commercially exploit the technology legacy of a successful landspeed world record attempt, to explore the potential of clean green renewable hydrogen steam. Steamology deliver scalable and modular solutions for industrial steam heat and power, embracing the hydrogen economy, decreasing/eliminating emissions, replacing fossil fuels and fossil fuel engines. Steamology patented energy solutions address three markets using a common core technology: • process steam and heating for decarbonising industrial applications including the food, beverage and pharmaceutical sectors • Drop-in diesel engine replacement unit with power ratings from 250 kW to Megawatt scale output through mechanical, electrical or hybrid drivetrains for powering trains, trucks, ships transport or static applications • Renewable Energy (RE) storage and power generation

Organization short description: Steamology is a Zero Emission Power Solutions
About:
Steamology is an innovative technology development company with an extreme engineering pedigree and a land speed record breaking heritage. Founded to commercially exploit the technology legacy from a successful world record attempt and to explore the potential of novel clean green renewable hydrogen steam power generation. Steamology is developing a zero-emission energy generation and storage system designed to be used with Renewable Energy generation such as PV solar, geothermal or wind turbine. At the heart of the W2W (Water to Water) system is a compact energy dense steam generator. Steam is generated using energy stored as compressed hydrogen and oxygen gas in tanks. High pressure superheated steam is used to drive a turbine to do useful work by generating electricity. Renewable Energy is used to power electrolysis to generate the hydrogen and oxygen gas and to compress the gas into storage tanks. This W2W closed cycle is emission free producing no carbon or NOX emissions in a repeatable cycle without charging losses. Steamology delivers scalable modular reliable off grid power on demand.



The three products share common technology:



Gas to Steam 

Using stored hydrogen and oxygen gas to generate zero emission steam for industrial applications.



Gas to Power

Using stored hydrogen and oxygen gas to generate zero emission steam to drive a turbine to power electrical or mechanical devices.



Renewable Energy (RE) to Electrical power storage and generation for Off grid closed loop, water to water systems



Using RE to power electrolysis, hydrogen and oxygen gas production for energy storage. Energy generation from zero emission steam turbine to power electrical local grids on demand.

Hello Watt met gratuitement à disposition un comparateur de fournisseurs d’électricité et de gaz, accompagné d’une équipe de spécialistes qui conseille les particuliers sur les travaux d’isolation pouvant être mis en place dans leur logement ainsi que sur les projets d’installation de panneaux solaires.



Hello Watt est le conseiller énergie qui démocratise des solutions simples et efficaces pour réduire les factures d’énergie des particuliers. 



1/ Hello Watt guide les particuliers sur le choix de leur(s) fournisseur(s) d’énergie grâce à son comparateur de prix des différents fournisseurs d’électricité et de gaz naturel et à la réalisation de devis pour le propane en citerne. Des prestations d’accompagnement sur le pilotage, le choix, l’installation et l’entretien des équipements énergétiques comme la chaudière seront également bientôt disponibles. 



3/ Hello Watt aide aussi les particuliers à aller plus loin en les accompagnant dans l’installation de panneaux solaires destinés à la production individuelle d’énergie verte.



Afin d’accompagner au mieux les particuliers sur ces différents projets et être en mesure de proposer des conseils personnalisés, Hello Watt s’appuie sur un service client composé d’experts de l’énergie ainsi que sur l’utilisation de données de consommation énergétique fournies par les gestionnaires de réseau. Des données plus précises permettant de mieux conseiller les utilisateurs de nos services seront également très prochainement disponibles, sous réserve de l’accord du particulier concerné, grâce aux compteurs communicants Linky et Gazpar actuellement en cours de déploiement.

Solution on-sentence summary: A mobile, modular station, water depollution, treatment with natural zeolites
Identification: SOLeHo offers solutions that meet the requirements of national and European legislation. - Reference: Environmental and health standards for: recovery of water for industrial activities and human consumption, discharge into the natural environment, recycling (capture of heavy metals and chemical derivatives). - CLEAR IMPACT STATION (CIS) is a nomadic connected station, water treatment, and aims to set up, consolidate and capitalize (Blue DATA), which has been done thanks to university work (with conditions at low scale), in particular to develop a solution for the transition to the next stages of the industrial project. The data modeling (Blue Data) of this pilot will make it possible to size the development of the pre-industrial then industrial phase of the solution. CIS will pave the way for the development of structured industrial offers, allowing to measure the environmental impact and which will lead to offers and services to the commercial industry.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Heavy metals, Domestic & municipal wastewater, Industrial wastewater, Black water, Water & Wastewater treatment
The environmental benefits: 4 micron microfiltration capacity (molecular tamis) versus 50 micron for sand, which retains only large particles;97% is the reduction of toxic substances (ammonia (NH4), heavy metals (Pb, Cu, CD, Zn, Co, Cr, Mn and Fe, Pb, Cu) , toxins, low-level radioactive elements (Cs, Co, Sr, Ag);100 kg of product is equivalent to 180 kg of traditional filtration media;Clinoptilolite in drinking water treatment for NH4+ removal, reduce 97% -  Stabilize the pH of soils and water around 7 & 8 pH;50% reduction in chlorine in swimming pool water (tricholramine reduction), elimination of flocculant;Captures the 33 chemicals contained in heavy water;

Organization short description: CIS, véritable opportunité de réaliser des expérimentations dans des conditions traitements "réels" des eaux usées.
About:
Le développement rapide de l’industrie, et l’explosion de la croissance démographique de ces 30 dernières années, ont généré de gros volumes d’eaux usées contenant des substances dangereuses pour notre environnement.

L’apparition de nouveaux composants chimiques, perturbateur endocrinien, métaux lourds, impactent lourdement notre environnement et bouleversent notre biodiversité. 



Les effluents (industrielles ou domestiques) sont dirigés dans les mêmes réseaux de collectes et traitement des eaux usées. Cependant, force est de constater que l’efficacité et le rendement de ces STEP ont une charge physico-chimique, et biologique non traitée dans les eaux de rejets. (1)



Les marchés cibles visés par cette démarche :

-	L’industrie, l’agriculture, les syndicats des eaux, les collectivités (EPCI…), l’immobilier dans l’objectif est de proposer des services commerciaux tels que : 

-  Traitement tertiaire des eaux en sortie de STEP, pour une amélioration de la qualité des eaux,

-  Potabilisation des eaux de captage et de production des eaux,

- La collecte et l’analyse de données issues de la Blue DATA pour dimensionnement et 

   modélisation de la gestion des flux,

- Services de données dédiées pour les collectivités, institutions, laboratoires, industries....



Pour répondre à ces nombreux objectifs environnementaux et sociétaux, le projet CLEAR IMPACT STATION est né. Notre volonté est également de contribuer au maintien de la biodiversité, et de réduire la présence, en constante augmentation, des polluants dans les eaux. 

C’est ainsi qu’à la lumière de ces constats est née l’idée de la construction d’un prototype expérimental, une station d’épuration ou de potabilisation, mobile et connectée à microfiltration de zéolites naturelles activées.



Ces roches d’origine volcanique présentent des propriétés intéressantes dans les applications du traitement des eaux (usées, potabilisation, traitement d’eaux industrielles…) notamment dans leur capacité d’adsorption et désorption (voir lexique annexe A). 



Les zéolites sont utilisées dans l'industrie comme échangeurs de cations, adsorbants sélectifs et catalyseurs, ce qui font d’elles des candidates idéales pour le développement d’applications dans le domaine du traitement des eaux usées (2).



L’objectif visé par ce prototype expérimental est de développer une modélisation des procédés de microfiltrations à zéolites naturelles, de pouvoir produire de l’eau potable dans n’importe quelle situation, de traiter les effluents industriels lors d’incidents environnementaux. 

Le second est de pouvoir modéliser et pré-dimensionner le traitement de gros volumes d’effluents industriels en sortie de station de traitement (STEP), ou d’utilisation de ce procédé en production d’eau potable avec des zéolites naturelles activées. 



La réalisation de cette CIS permettra de mesurer l’impact environnemental de la future solution proposée à l’industriel ou aux collectivités en charge de la gestion du réseau d’adduction en eau potable.

Son fonctionnement est facilité par l’informatique embraquée, à la remontée d’alertes ou arrêts intempestifs, du monitoring du procédé de filtration des eaux, le débit et le volume etc…

Concernant le fonctionnement et la gestion des eaux à traiter par la CIS, le premier critère que nous avons choisi est la modularité. Ce qui signifie qu’il est interopérable avec les systèmes actuels ou futur.  Evolutif, dans son mode de fonctionnement (ajout d’un conteneur supplémentaire accueillant un complément de systèmes de filtrations). L’aide et la consolidation de données en pré-diagnostique des flux d’eaux à traiter. Enfin comme la CIS est nomade, cela permet son implantation dans n’importe quel environnement.



Les flux d’entrées saturés (chargés) seront dirigés vers le skid 1 (décanteur, coagulateur) chargé de capter les premiers éléments tels que les matières en suspensions par exemple.

Puis ces flux de sorties entrent dans le second skid dans le 1er bac tampon pour être envoyés dans deux filtres à zéolites naturelles, et dirigés vers un bac de sortie de traitement des eaux usées. Tout au long de ce processus, des capteurs (clarinettes) seront chargés de collecter les données (débit, température, pH, KH, TAC, conductivité etc…)

Ces données d’entrées/sorties alimenteront la Blue Data. 



L’ensemble du procédé est contrôlé en direct ‘’sous monitoring processus’’. L’analyse de la qualité et du rendement de la microfiltration à zéolites, permettra grâce à la CLEAR IMPACT STATION de dimensionner (modélisation) et calibrer la phase I (pré déploiement industriel) et la phase II du projet son déploiement à taille ‘’cousue-main’’ industriel (modulable et adaptable à divers cas de figures). 



Pour conclure, l’innovation est un impératif de pérennité et rentabilité pour les entreprises, les collectivités. La transformation écologique reste, à tort, l’expression d’un coût financier, sans mesurer l’impact environnemental et sociétal. 

La maîtrise de rejet est un enjeu majeur, de l’accompagnement de leur transformation pour rendre plus lisible et donner une image positive (attrait de l’entreprise, amélioration des normes au regard des institutions, organismes gestionnaires des réseaux d’AEP, les organismes de gestion de l’environnement…).

La transformation RSE, également présente de cette démarche, valorisera l’image de marque de l’entreprise : vertueuse, respectueuse de l’environnement. 

Il n’y aura pas de transformation écologique sans l’engagement des industriels, ou des collectivités. CLEAR IMPACT STATION est le moyen d’engager cette transformation selon le principe d’un prototype expérimental mais aussi enrichi et reproductible.
SDG’s of application: SDG 6 - Clean water and sanitation

Solution on-sentence summary: A retrofit infrastructure modernization with the newest technology without waste
Identification: A retrofit is a modernization of a system, which consists in replacing or adding some of its components while keeping others. The main advantage of a retrofit is the saving of resources. Instead of purchasing a new system as a whole, it is possible to integrate new functions, e.g. via new software or targeted components, while retaining the majority of the hardware components. Supercomputing Systems AG (SCS) has long observed the waste of resources in industry. In 2009, a first project was implemented by SCS to counter a partial obsolescence with a retrofit and thus modernize an IT solution without having to acquire a new global solution. Instead of buying new ticket machines for public transport in the canton of Zug, SCS made a retrofit. This pioneering project paved the way for many other projects (dynamic passenger information displays, parking guidance systems, relay interlocking systems) in which an SCS department has now specialized.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility
Target client profile: Individual, Public Authorities, BusinessManufacturingComputers & Other Electronics, BusinessServicesRetailerB2C E-Commerce Platforms, BusinessServicesRetailerNon-food Retail Stores
Tags: Electronic waste, Packaging & plastics waste
The environmental benefits: The software that we have developed for our first customer in the public transport domain is now installed on about 2'500 points of sale;We do not only retrofit ticket vending machines, but have implemented and deployed in Switzerland our solution in two additional domains, i.e. information displays and parking guidance systems;Usually saving about 90% of the CO2 grey energy emissions;Each retrofit is of course different, but when we consider that a retrofit of an existing infrastructure makes it possible to not create new devices and simply change the necessary internal components (e.g. computing units);In the case of ticket vending machines, a retrofit makes it possible to reuse the concrete base on which the device is installed, which implies 100% reuse of the existing concrete foundation;
The Financial benefits: When compared to mainstream alternatives (consisting e.g. in buying a new system), our solution enable the customers to save at least 75% of the costs;After a retrofit, our customers can also buy by themselves the internal electronic component of the system, again at a price up to 75% cheaper than the one of the original provider;
Complementary solutions: SEAB Energy - Flexibuster: A small-scale modular container for transforming organic waste into energy (Energy,Waste & Pollution,Food & Agriculture);Pellenc ST: Optical sorting machines to recycle large amounts of waste quickly and accurately (Waste & Pollution);RT7000: A machine to chemically recycle plastic waste back into oil (Industry & Consumer Goods,Waste & Pollution);PYROWATTS: A disruptive waste to energy scalable gasifier for decentralized waste management (Waste & Pollution,Energy);

About:
As a development services provider, we bring 25 years of experience in the areas of electronics, software and system design into your projects. Our work is based on reliable technical expertise, well-founded methodological competence as well as significant experience in project management.



The team, consisting of over 120 proven experts, covers a broad spectrum of technologies: software development, cloud solutions, IOT systems, AI /VR / AR solutions; hardware, FPGA- and GPU systems, fast communication systems, embedded system software. Our algorithm specialists find even the finest of signals in enormous data volumes and develop effective decision-making tools to optimize complex procedures.



Thanks to the experience we have gained from more than 2000 projects for over 300 customers, we succeed time and again in subdividing complex challenges into manageable projects and implementing these with a high degree of planning security. That is why many of our customers reduce the complexity and the risk relating to their projects by delegating the responsibility for dates and deliverables to us as part of fixed-price projects.



We realize innovative solutions and maintain them during their entire life cycle. In doing so, we align ourselves 100% to the requirements of our customers’ projects and fund ourselves entirely from this income.



We see ourselves as an open and interested partner for our customers and join forces with them to achieve success.

Solution on-sentence summary: A large-scale reforestation service blending agritech, machine learning, and computer vision to solve global warming
Identification:
MORFO offers reforestation services blending agritech, machine-learning, and computer vision to fight global warming. 



We are an A-Z solution for large-scale reforestation, from area analysis, to species selection & encapsulation, to high-rate plantation and ecological monitoring. 



We plant forests on degraded lands in tropical and sub-tropical regions and restore entire ecosystems by optimising our techniques for biodiversity and socio-economic impact. 



For each project, MORFO closely monitors the planted areas and continuously analyses biodiversity and biomass developments, as well as carbon capture levels. All data is displayed on an online dashboard accessible by all parties involved.

Solution on-sentence summary: Providing Natural Sunlight to poorly lit interiors, with a highly efficient SOLIS, creating healthy efficient buildings
Identification:
Solight developed a highly efficient, fully static, patented, solar collector delivering healthy, energy-saving sunlight indoors which brings flexibility and a competitive price-to-performance ration.

The model SOLIS Max, which is 30,000 Lumens, typically lights 60 sqm and is ideal for Commercial Buildings, but there are also other models that are compatible with various applications.

SOLIS delivers constant full visible spectrum lighting from 08:00 until 16:00, with controlled heat or UV, offering the multiple recognized benefits of natural lighting, with electricity savings of up to 40%. The Solution makes homes and workplaces healthier and more energy efficient.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Construction, LED, Green building, Smart-buildings
The environmental benefits: Can deliver an annual average 30,000 Lumens under 100K Lux Nominal Sunlight and remains highly efficient in cloudy days;Durable and lightweight Aluminum construction ;A light guide which is 60X60 cm;70% reduction in daytime artificial lighting;Provides solar heating in winter and a non-heating Sunlight in summer;Extended life for artificial luminaries due to reduced daytime usage (Opex);
The Financial benefits: Electricity savings of 35~12% depending on building type and utilization;Increased workers productivity 18~12% ;Improved school children's concentration and learning 30% ;
Complementary solutions: Occupancy detector: Wall-mounted sensor for occupancy detection of commercial facilities (Infrastructures,Buildings & Shelters);LED Bulb for Household Use: A basic light bulb using the led technology (Buildings & Shelters);Solatube Tubular Daylighting : Energy efficient green building components that bring daylight into interior spaces (Buildings & Shelters);Philips PowerBalance: An energy-efficient led luminaire ensuring a comfortable working environment (Buildings & Shelters);
Organization short description: Solight develops an innovative, efficient, and affordable static solar lighting system. Making our buildings healthier.
About:
In modern society, we are living in a lighting paradox: Healthy, free, full spectrum solar light outdoors, yet we spend most of our days under unhealthy, flickering, and wasteful artificial lighting. 

This severely disrupts our body’s natural Circadian Rhythms, causing: Depression, Fatigue, Insomnia, Obesity, and Learning Difficulties.

To remedy this Solight has developed an innovative static solar lighting system, enabling efficient and constant harvesting of solar light from 0800 AM till 0400 PM, channeling natural light into desired interior spaces. 

Saving electricity during the day, delivering healthy full visible spectrum lighting, without heat or UV radiation.

Our price performance, durability and costs, are superior to existing systems.

Get your natural light from www.Solight-energy.com

Solution on-sentence summary: Environmental monitoring and steering tool, via bees which act as drones collecting samples of pollen which we analyze
Identification: Although pollution and lack of biodiversity constitute operational, reputational, environmental and financial risks for many sectors it remains difficult for many actors to take improvement actions amongst others due to a lack of metrics. The BeeOmonitoring combines nature (bees acting as drones to collect billions of environmental samples on large surfaces) and technology (software processing the data). Through the analysis of the samples, BeeOdiversity can identify, find the origin and assess the level of pollutants (heavy metals, 523 pesticides, nitrates, PAH, dioxins, etc.) and assess plant diversity level and quality. The BeeOmonitoring enables to (i) monitor industrial and agricultural pollution, (ii) assess the quality/diversity of plants, (iii) take targeted improvement decisions and (iv) implement adapted actions to enhance biodiversity. No other method can monitor so many pollutants and provide biodiversity metrics (on-site) as efficiently.
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Credibility, Network, Funding, Partners
Target client profile: Public Authorities, BusinessFarming & AgricultureCrops, BusinessFarming & AgricultureForestry & Logging
Tags: Data centers, Soil and land, Algorithms & AI, Harvesting, Sensors & monitoring
The environmental benefits: The BeeOmonitoring monitors plant biodiversity on a surface of 700ha via +50,000 bees collecting samples on a daily basis (+230 to 360 days) representing billions of samples per year ;The BeeOmonitoring monitors +500 pesticides (5 times more than compulsory water monitoring in most countries) and +200 other pollutants (heavy metals, dioxins, furans, PCBs, etc) on 700ha;The BeeOmonitoring identifies yearly up to 800 plant species, 6,000 pollutant molecules, 120 pesticides;Increase of plant diversity by x3 to x4 and less than 5% bee colony decline (vs+20% on average) ;Decrease of number and concentration of pesticides and other pollutants up to more than x3 ;700 ha covered per site  and a total of 150 kha covered in more than 15 countries;
The Financial benefits: Reduce risks worth hundreds of thousands or millions of euros (e.g. water treatment costs or water catchment closure, air quality issues, soil or food contamination, lack of pollinators, permit, etc);2 to +10 times cheaper than traditional methods such as ecological surveys or pollution sensors to monitor 700ha; yearly payback with direct and indirect benefits;Increase yield of crop production by 10 to 30% & reduces costs of pesticides use;

Solution on-sentence summary: An IoT-connected and consumer-friendly water recycling system to reduces water consumption by up to 45 percent in buildings
Identification: Hydraloop offers a full product range of stand-alone and concealed water recycling devices for residential and commercial real estate. Hydraloop purifies the water from showers, baths, and washing machines as well as condensation water from tumble dryers, heat pumps and air conditioning units. Hydraloop water can be re-used for toilet flushing, washing machines, garden irrigation, and topping up swimming pools. Hydraloop's patented technology is consumer friendly, carefree, and sustainable. Our treatment process removes dirt, soap, and other pollution from greywater without the use of filters, membranes, or chemicals. Hydraloop combines six different technologies: sedimentation, floatation, dissolved air floatation, foam fractionation, an aerobic bioreactor, and disinfection of the treated water with powerful UV light.

About:
Hydraloop is an internationally recognized multi-award-winning venture. It is recognized as a vision leader and has the potential to become a long-term global product market leader. We empower people and organizations to save between 25-45% on water and wastewater, save energy and reduce carbon footprint, whilst keeping full comfort of living with low maintenance decentralized greywater recycling solutions.

 

Hydraloop is headquartered in The Netherlands, with offices in the United States and Middle East and has business units in Canada and Australia. We currently collaborate with over 130 local sales, distribution, and service partners, in a rapidly extending global network. 



We offer turn-key products and made-to- measure solutions for projects of any size.

1. Product portfolio for residential real estate:

Hydraloop H300 - for 4-5 person households

Hydraloop H600 - for 8-10 person households or small businesses

Hydraloop Concealed - for tiny houses, 2-3 person apartments and bathroom retrofits



2. Product portfolio for commercial real estate:

Hydraloop Cascade - modular, scaleable made to measure solution for multi-family housing, and larger operations such as hotels, office buildings, launderettes, shopping centers, student housing, sports clubs, airports, and more.



Hydraloop devices use a unique combination of sustainable water treatment technologies that ensures the highest water quality and creates a sustainable future. 



Production is outsourced and currently made in The Netherlands, but decentralized production lines will empower scalability, reduce transport costs, minimize carbon footprint, and increase local commitment, acceptance and employability.

Solution on-sentence summary: A software platform that optimises energy efficiency and decreases emissions of ships, using digital twins
Identification:
Syroco EfficientShip supports the energy transition of maritime transportation. Using digital twins of ships, the software platform helps ship operators and fleet managers to evaluate & improve the efficiency of ships and decrease their fuel consumption and carbon emissions.

It uses physics modeling, data and AI to provide an accurate simulation of ship behavior and reduce emissions by 10% or more. 



Thanks to the digital twin, Syroco EfficientShip builds a baseline and tracks each ship's performance to guide the crew during operations, increasing the efficiency and performance of each voyage. 



At the fleet level, the platform creates operating conditions to predict and evaluate performance under different operating scenarios and routes.



In the research lab or design office, Syroco EfficientShip optimizes the design and operating parameters of the ship, testing advanced operating scenarios to determine the best configuration for the ship.
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Funding
Target client profile: BusinessServicesInfrastructurePorts and Marine Infrastructure, BusinessServicesTransportersWaterways & Cargos
Tags: Marine & Oceans, Cargo ships, Algorithms & AI, Maritime shipping, Fuel efficiency
The environmental benefits: A typical merchant ship (over 100m long) burns between 10 and 350 tons of fuel per day, and produces 8,000 and 280,000 tons of carbon per year;There are approximately 42,000 merchant ships over 100m long, which burn a combined 450 million tons of fuel per year;Syroco EfficientShip reduces fuel consumption and carbon emissions of a merchant ship by 10%;For a typical containership or tanker, Syroco EfficientShip saves 25,000 tons of CO2 per year;
The Financial benefits: Return on investment between 300% and 1200% (depending on ship size);Save between 100k€ and 3M€ per year on the fuel bill of each ship;Save between 50k€ and 1.5M€ per year per ship on the carbon certificates that will soon be required to compensate for the emissions;
Complementary solutions: WeNow: A plug-and-play system for the driver to act for the climate now (Freight,Mobility);Bound4blue : A novel wingsail system for assisted clean sailing in the maritime transport sector (Freight,Industry & Consumer Goods);Skybreathe: An eco-flying solution based on cloud and big data for open airlines (Freight,Mobility);Rotor Sails: An auxiliary wind propulsion system to reduce the fuel consumption of commercial shipping (Freight,Mobility);
Organization short description: Syroco is a Climate Tech startup that supports the energy transition of maritime transportation.
About:
Syroco is a Climate Tech startup that supports the energy transition of maritime transportation. It provides fleet operators, cargo owners, naval architects and shipyards a solution to evaluate and improve the efficiency and impact of ships. 



The Syroco EfficientShip software platform builds digital twins of ships by leveraging physics modelling, enriched by data and AI. Deployed on board, in the fleet/operations center and in the design office, the digital twins provide recommendations for ship routing and configuration in order to reduce the energy consumption and emissions.
SDG’s of application: SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure

Solution on-sentence summary: A software tools to assess the geo-energy potential for sustainable heating and cooling of buildings
Identification: Geosophy allows real estate and construction professionals to assess the geo-energy potential of the subsoil of a building to be renovated or built. They can thus cool their buildings in summer and heat them in winter, dividing their energy costs by 5, and reducing the carbon footprint of a building by up to 90%. Geo-energy, or surface geothermal energy, is a local, sustainable, non-carbonated, discreet and silent energy from the shallow subsoil, which at this stage is largely under-exploited in France. This solution is based on our ability to develop Physics and financial models, using data science and machine learning techniques to automatize and refine feasibility studies of geo-energy installations.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Target client profile: Public Authorities, BusinessEnergy Utility, BusinessServicesBuildings Operators
Tags: Heat-pump, Cooling, Geothermal power, Software, District heating & cooling, Building heating
Sectors: Buildings, Energy, Heating, cooling and ventilation
The environmental benefits: In 2022, Geosophy has processed 10,319,090 square meters of buildings, avoiding a total of 68,530 tons of CO2 per year, as well as 29,096k € per year in charges to its clients;Geosophy has more than 1000 subscribers on its platform, has performed more than 3,500 tests and 200 opportunity scans;By 2026, Geosophy's solution makes it possible to avoid 380,000 tonnes of CO2 equivalent, i.e. the equivalent of 7% of the emissions of Paris (source: GPC carbon assessment of the Paris territory from the PCAET 2014 assessment);Our clients can cool their buildings in summer and heat them in winter, reducing the carbon footprint of a building by up to 90%;
The Financial benefits: Payback time starting from 5 years : Real estate value of the building increased up to 15%;Real estate and construction professionals can cool their buildings in summer and heat them in winter, dividing their energy costs by 5;
Complementary solutions:
Solar space heating: Solar-powered air heaters and rock bed thermal storage to heat homes 

 (Buildings & Shelters,Energy);X-Sol 100 : Resistant and low-cost solar water heater using special plastic materials (Buildings & Shelters,Energy);Heat recovery system: Low temperature heating of premises by recycling waste heat from refrigeration systems (Energy,Buildings & Shelters);Recovering heat : Standardized, ready-to-install solution for supermarkets to heat buildings or water using waste heat (Buildings & Shelters);
Organization short description: We empower building owners by defining the best strategy of value-creation for their geo-energy resources.
About:
At depths between 10m to a few 100 m, the temperature of the ground remains undisturbed all year, at a typical value of 12 to 15°C. This geo-energy, or surface geothermal energy, is a local, sustainable, non-carbonated, discreet and silent energy from the shallow subsoil. It is at this stage largely under-exploited in France, mainly because owners are not aware of their underground resources.



At Geosophy, we develop Physics and financial models, using data science and machine learning techniques to automatize and refine feasibility studies of geo-energy installations. We are therefore able to assess geo-energy potential of buildings, both on technical and commercial aspects, at park or building level. 



Geosophy allows real estate and construction professionals to assess the geo-energy potential of the subsoil of a building to be renovated or built. They can thus cool their buildings in summer and heat them in winter, dividing their energy costs by 5, and reducing the carbon footprint of a building by up to 90%.
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities

Solution on-sentence summary: Firelighters made with recycled coffee grounds to light wood firelogs in fireplaces, stoves or to light charcoal in BBQ
Identification: Smart and Green firestarters are made with coffee grounds, without wood or petroleum product like paraffin and kerosene. One box of the product helps start 40 fires (in fireplaces, stoves, or barbecue grills). As coffee grounds are 67% more powerful in combustion than wood, the firelighters are very efficient in lighting wood firelogs or charcoal. One box of Smart and Green firelighters allows to recycle coffee grounds equivalent to 75 cups of coffee which represents the average drinking coffee consumption of an adult during 20 days. As there is absolutely no wood in the Smart and Green products, using Smart and Green firestarter is a good way to fight against deforestation. By using Smart and Green firelighters, customers have the guarantee to light fireplaces easily, limit the yearly generated waste quantity of coffee grounds, and avoid cutting trees.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Biobased, Waste-heat valorisation, Waste-to-energy & fuels, Food waste

Solution on-sentence summary: A Noise Mitigation System that reduce the underwater noise impact of coastal and Offshore works on maritime ecosystems
Identification: The solution address the issue of underwater noise created by maritime works. Underwater noises have been the subject of numerous scientific publications over the last 25 years and are recognised as one of the worst maritime pollution. Human activities produce huge noise in the environment. These noises propagate almost without attenuation. That’s why marine animals perceive  accumulated noises up to several thousand kilometers around them. Pile driving during maritime works, creates one of the most intense noises, up to 260dB! This level is responsible for major impacts up to the death of individuals. Thus, protecting the ecosystem from these noises is vital for all species and finally for mankind. To address this issue, we have developed our SubSea Quieter. This innovative membrane is a 3D fabric with a coating providing resistance and waterproofness… Once it is inflated, the break in impedance between the water and the introduced air dramatically attenuates sounds up to 99%.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners
Target client profile: BusinessConstruction, BusinessEnergy Utility, BusinessServicesInfrastructurePorts and Marine Infrastructure
Tags: Coastal, Offshore wind power, Marine & Oceans, Turbines, Wind power
Sectors: Infrastructures, Logistics, Manufacturing and construction processes, Ecosystems management
The environmental benefits: Reduces underwater noise up to 99% ;Protects up to 25 millions m3 of seawater ecosystem from noise for each offshore work equipped;Greenhouse gas reduction by 99% compared to existing Noise Mitigation System    ;
The Financial benefits: 3 to 5 times cheaper than existing Noise Mitigation Systems;Allows to save up to 15M€ per offshore wind farm ;

Solution on-sentence summary: An embedded system of sensors and actuators for hives to become bio-vigilant and connected
Identification: NOEHMI is a device destined to control conditions in hives in order to allow beekeepers to monitor pollinators' health. It may be utilized not only by farmers but also by companies, research centers, and local authorities. The device is composed of sensors, actuators, and a scale. Each device is connected to a dedicated application. Thanks to the implementation of artificial intelligence and Internet of Things tools into our system, data analysis, personalized recommendations, and remote control of conditions in the hives will be possible. The popularisation of NOEHMI will lead to a better understanding of how biodiversity is affected by environmental conditions, a decrease in the mortality rate of bees, and increased yield for farmers.

Solution on-sentence summary: A filter for the washing machines to capture microfibres before being discharged into sewage and oceans
Identification: We regularly ingest & inhale microfibres - tiny plastic fibres that our clothes, carpets, blankets etc. shed during use. By washing our clothes, we are releasing about one plastic bag worth of microfibres into the environment every week. Microfibres from washing are a major contributor to microplastic pollution. Microfibers in the environment enter the food chain and end up back on our plates. Attracting dirt, toxins and pathogenic bacteria they cause poisoning, genetic disruption (also in marine life!) and through the food chain affect humans. We eat 5g of microplastics every week, it is as if we ate a credit card. Our solution is a filter that attaches to the washing machine and captures microfibres before they enter the drain. The solution improves the quality of our waters by preventing the microfibres from being discharged into sewage and oceans and thus entering our environment. The dirty cartridges are being cleaned and reused and the mash caught recycled.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Developing countries, Textile & fiber waste, Reduce & prevent waste, Recycle waste
The environmental benefits: Stops between 80 to 90% of fibres that would be otherwise released into the water systems;The use of the filter will not affect the use of water and energy during washing. It represents 0% added burden during washing;The dirty cartridges returned for refurbishing and durable parts will be reused at least 10 times;Microfibre emissions reduction between 80 and 90 % ;Extended cartridge use that covers at least 1 month (20 washings) ;100% closed loop. All cartridges get refurbished with durable parts reused;
The Financial benefits: Price performance: 90 % fibre emissions reduction per 4 Euro/month (estimated cartridge cost after scale-up);
Complementary solutions: ECOSOFTT: A suite of solutions to allow underserved communities to manage their water resources (Buildings & Shelters,Waste & Pollution,Water);ECOLOO: A social impact driven enterprise to address the sanitation crisis in developing countries (Buildings & Shelters,Waste & Pollution,Water);Hydraloop: A fully automatic stylish in-house greywater recycling system (Buildings & Shelters,Water,Waste & Pollution);FGWRS: Grey water recycling for collective housings (Water,Buildings & Shelters,Waste & Pollution);
Organization short description: We develop, produce and sell filters that stop microplastic fibres from washing from entering the environment.
About: PlanetCare develops innovative filtering solutions that efficiently capture microfibres from washing before they are released into the environment. The range of solutions includes retrofitting of existing washing machines, domestic and commercial as well as advanced automated options for integration into new washing machines. With more than 5000 users we are market leaders with an understanding of customer needs. Our products are sold through our own on-line shop. We maintain a closed loop for our cartridges.

Solution on-sentence summary: A nutrient recovery system that treats wastewater while also providing an algae-based feedstock, a circular economy
Identification: CLEARAS Solutions created and patented the EcoRecover Advanced Biological Nutrient Recovery (ABNR) system. The EcoRecover treats wastewater to discharge limitations or below in order to simultaneously recover plant based materials, creating a circular economy and providing a consistent source of income for the owner of the system. The wastewater provides essential nutrients to algal growth, like phosphorus and nitrogen. Recycled liquid carbon dioxide is pumped into EcoRecover as the other vital component for algae photosynthesis, allowing the system to sequester the carbon dioxide. The EcoRecover is added on to an existing wastewater treatment plant, after the secondary treatment system.
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Network
Tags: Algae, Domestic & municipal wastewater, Water & Wastewater treatment
The environmental benefits: For every 1 lb of biomass produced, 2.2 lb of carbon dioxide is recycled;The biomass is harvested after water treatment and can be sold to companies making plant based products like algae based inks, foams, plastics, fertilizers, and more;Our largest plant to date produces 2000-3000 lb of biomass per day, that's almost 6000 lb of sequestered carbon dioxide;Potential to sequester 7650 lb of CO2 per day using only our existing projects, not counting any new projects;CLEARAS has the potential to be completely net negative if we can implement on site renewabe energy sources, we can sequester 0.024 lb of carbon dioxide per lb of biomass;
The Financial benefits: Lower cost of ownership, after 15 years EcoRecover becomes less expensive than the chemical or mechanical treatment system;Recurring revenue streams, currently $1-1.25 per lb of biomass, market rising with CAGR of 7%.;
Complementary solutions: REM: A novel acid regeneration system for steel pickling (Waste & Pollution,Water,Industry & Consumer Goods);ECOSOFTT: A suite of solutions to allow underserved communities to manage their water resources (Buildings & Shelters,Waste & Pollution,Water);ECOLOO: A social impact driven enterprise to address the sanitation crisis in developing countries (Buildings & Shelters,Waste & Pollution,Water);Hydraloop: A fully automatic stylish in-house greywater recycling system (Buildings & Shelters,Water,Waste & Pollution);
Organization short description: CLEARAS recovers our finite natural resources to economically clean water, clean air and make earth-friendly products.
About: CLEARAS Solutions created and patented a plant-based approach for wastewater treatment at the tertiary level while simultaneously producing a biomaterial feedstock. This is an innovative approach that eliminates the use of chemical wastewater treatment, mitigating excess nitrogen and production of toxic sludge. Therefore, we avoid methane emission production while feeding our algae with recycled carbon dioxide. Every pound of algae we produce needs 2.2 pounds of CO2. With the implementation of 100% renewable energy, the CLEARAS process will be completely net negative.

Solution on-sentence summary: Replace phosphate rock mineral fertilizer with secondary source of biophosphate fertilizer for enhanced resilience
Identification: The Bio-Phosphate is a recovered and renewable fertiliser product for substitution of mineral fertilisers produced from Critical Raw Material phosphate rock. Biophosphate has macroporosus structure and economically high concentrated recovered Phosphorus content. The Bio-Phosphate products are formulated to BIO-NPK-C in any compounds as of user/market demands for both organic and low input farming application cases. The product can be adjusted to account to the needs of the land, soil types, different climate conditions, users and markets. BioPhosphate is control the release of nutrients according most important plant needs. Beside the highly available recovered phosphorus/calcium content the BioPhosphate also contains other important recovered trace elements, and other nutrients. The product is a fully safe and economical fertilizer with primarily application in the horticultural organic/low input farming cultivations with combined beneficial and multiple effects.

About:
3R-BioPhosphate Ltd. (since 1989) is a technology intensive company, playing international leading role in the RTD, engineering and full industrialization of the zero emission pyrolysis technology and it’s bio-products. The main specialization is the BioPhosphate recovery and high quality biochar processing. Originally the company has been an joint venture with ALSTOM subsidy (Lang Machine Works, since 1870) and became independent organization in 2001. Past years, 3R/Edward Someus coordinated and key technology designed multiple international applied research and commercial technology/product driven development programs (EU FP5, EUFP6, EUFP7, CIP-Ecoinnovation, H2020, see 3R project references) in the specific field of carbon refinery, biochar and phosphorus recovery.



The core competence of the company is the ecological recycling and added value reuse of unexploited biomass by specific and advanced high temperature 3R Zero Emission pyrolysis and biotech means. The 3R is the only one vendor in the EU who is specialized on high nutrient dense BioPhosphate recovery from food grade animal bones. 

he company is the original source and inventor of “3R” Recycle-Reduce-Reuse zero emission pyrolysis technology &  BioPhosphate product developments.The company is the only one biochar vendor in Europe, with official and accredited Authority permit to use qualified and eco-safe biochar in open ecological soil environment (permit to lawfully market BioPhosphate: 6300/13393-2/2019, that is interlinked to EU 2019/515 that shall apply from 19 April, 2020). The company also received Authority permit for organic phosphorus recovery plant full industrial installation and operation in West Hungary at Biofarm Agri Research Station. EU REACH approved and certified.

Solution on-sentence summary: A patented, low-frequency sound separation technology designed to process impounded waste coal ash
Identification: Waste to value: Turning a traditional industrial waste into valuable, low-carbon engineered building products. The world has an insatiable appetite for cement. SonoAsh’s unique and patented technology provides the opportunity to reduce the massive greenhouse gas emissions associated with virgin cement production by recycling traditional waste and replacing cement clinker with a low-carbon, alternative material that delivers improved strength characteristics. Additionally, the SonoAsh process remediates the legacy, long-term, environmental issues associated with industrial waste in storage, improving groundwater and creating new clean technology jobs. There are millions of tonnes of material in storage globally that can reduce the emissions associated with cement production and help build future green infrastructure.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Visibility, Partners
Tags: Cement, Construction, Reuse waste, Construction materials
Sectors: Buildings, Infrastructures, Manufacturing and construction processes
The environmental benefits: Eliminate one tonne of a traditional waste for every tonne processed ;For each tonne of coal ash processed, approximately 0.90 of the tonne creates a low carbon Supplementary Cementitious Material (SCM) reducing C02 emmissions in cement production by up to 40%;For each tonne coal ash processed, approximately 0.10 of the tonne contains valuable critical metals and minerals that are produced with no CO2 footprint ;
The Financial benefits: Each SonoAsh 400,000k +  tonne facility creates more than 100 jobs in rural communities;Each SonoAsh 400,000k + tonne facility generates $60 million in annual revenue ;
Complementary solutions: Low-cost substructure system: Bottom-fixed offshore turbine prototype that can be installed safely, simply and without cranes (Energy,Infrastructures);IPSIIS : Insulation based on mineral foam for better energy conservation (Buildings & Shelters,Waste & Pollution);BHEP: A new generation of buildings designed to create financial, human and societal value (Buildings & Shelters);Sopratec III: Energy efficient building airtightness system (Buildings & Shelters);
Organization short description: SonoAsh is a waste-to-value technology that enables decarbonized next generation infrastructure.
About:
The SonoAsh patented technology is globally applicable, it enables a new rural, waste-to-value industry capable of producing an in demand multi-product matrix.   

SonoAsh has six (6) granted patents surrounding the upgrading of waste coal ash from coal fired power plants. Today, where coal ash is within spec, it is a cementitious ingredient in modern day cement mixtures.   Where ash is out of spec, it is waste and stored in lagoons, impoundments and pits, an environmental reality in every country amplifying associated social economic implications.  There are well over 3 billion tonnes in storage in the US alone,  yet ash is imported into both coasts. 

The SonoAsh process enables waste coal ash to be upgraded into a matrix of high value products,  the largest fraction is a low carbon, cement replacement product, ideal for high performance cement applications.   Other products include strategic metals, rare earth elements, carbon abrasives, cenospheres and in the future, associated carbon offset credits. The SonoAsh patented process creates a decarbonized building material for the infrastructure needs of tomorrow.   The beneficiation of millions of tonnes of waste coal ash in storage contains solutions to a healthier environment, new industries in rural communities and tangible greenhouse gas reductions.
SDG’s of application: SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: The power of sea and ocean waves is converted to electricity through a clean and safe solution with high efficiency
Identification: The power of sea and ocean waves is converted to electricity through a new technology that is economically sustainable, and cumulated to safe work conditions over time of machinery, persons, and environment. The converter comprises interconnected rectangle parallelepipeds in their initial form out of the water. The structure, self-positioning in a certain depth, fluctuates simultaneously and correspondingly to the movement of the sea-ocean wave, accompanying it in its form and movement. From said movement, all the sections necessarily are going to change their geometric shapes, from rectangle parallelepipeds to oblique parallelepipeds forcing, by narrowing or stretching in its diagonal, the linear alternators to operate the generation of electricity. Generma technology helps to finally enter the wave energy conversion as one of the leading actors into the mix of exploited renewable sources which, together, will contribute to dismantling the use of polluting sources.

Solution on-sentence summary: A cleaner and more efficient cooling technology using water as a refrigerant
Identification:
Our solution fight Green House Gases (GHG) by eliminating the need to use Fluor-gases.

We design and build game changing compressors and machines that produce clean cooling and clean heating using water (R718) as natural refrigerant  through HVAC, Chillers and Heat Pumps.

Our solutions are sober and use less electrical energy.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Visibility, Funding, Partners
Tags: Heat-pump, Chemicals alternatives, Hazardous waste
Sectors: Buildings, Waste/Pollution, Heating, cooling and ventilation
The environmental benefits: 30% less electrical energy consumption;High COP (Coefficient Of Performance) > higher than 4.5;R718 (water) has 0 impact on Ozone depletion (ODP), 0 impact on Global warming (GWP) and 0 impact on soil contamination;30% reduction of energy consumption;
The Financial benefits: less than 2 years payback time;3000€ saving/year for a 20 kWth machine;
Complementary solutions:
Solar space heating: Solar-powered air heaters and rock bed thermal storage to heat homes 

 (Buildings & Shelters,Energy);X-Sol 100 : Resistant and low-cost solar water heater using special plastic materials (Buildings & Shelters,Energy);Heat recovery system: Low temperature heating of premises by recycling waste heat from refrigeration systems (Energy,Buildings & Shelters);Recovering heat : Standardized, ready-to-install solution for supermarkets to heat buildings or water using waste heat (Buildings & Shelters);
Organization short description: We are developing clean and efficient thermodynamic systems based on water as refrigerant.
About:
We require cooling in our everyday lives to preserve food, to have air-conditioning but also to allow better operations of most technological systems such IT servers, industrial machinery, industrial processes and so on.



However, today's refrigeration (HVAC-R) systems are using intensively fluorinated gases as refrigerant. These gases contribute greatly to the greenhouse effect. 1kg of fluorinated gases leaking to the atmosphere is equivalent to 3,5 tons of CO2 in average. In a global scale, the contribution of fluorinated gases to global warming represents 1 billion tons of CO2 per year.



The awareness of the impact of the F-gases on the global warming pushed most governments to regulate the use of these refrigerants with a shot-term phase-out plan by leading regions such as Europe and United States. Similar regulations exists all around the world following to the Kigali Agreement.



Alternative refrigerants exist on the market. However, they can be toxic, inflammable or work under very high pressure, leading to very high constraints on the installation and the maintenance.



Our idea is a simple one: instead of using hazardous fluid which are produced in a questionable way and which have harmful impact on the environment, we thought of using the most natural, abundant and neutral fluid in the world, water!



Water is a formidable fluid with excellent thermodynamics properties. It can be used in a refrigeration system for all positive temperature application. Its use in a refrigeration system is very efficient and scalable with a gain of 30% in energy efficiency compared to conventional refrigeration system and a cooling power range from 2kW to 2MW.



With positive temperature application being roughly 80% of the global cold demand, when our idea is implemented in a large scale, we could reduce the global greenhouse gas emission by 800 million tons of CO2 per year.
SDG’s of application: SDG 6 - Clean water and sanitation, SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Identification: The Dendronic process separates the three main components of wood: lignin, cellulose, and hemicelluloses which can then be used for various applications, such as sugar production, conversion to bio-chemicals and new materials. Underused materials such as agricultural waste, invasive species, sawdust and non-recyclable waste wood from the construction and demolition industries are targeted as raw materials. About: Lixea is a technology licensing company commercialising a breakthrough sustainable chemical technology invented at Imperial College London. The Dendronic® technology uses a novel low-cost ionic liquid to undertake lignocellulose fractionation. Quite simply, the novel process breaks down complex woody biomass into its constituents in a specific, environmentally benign, and low-cost manner. The chemical components of cellulose fibres, lignin and hemicelluloses can be used and/or converted by down-stream processors to products including sugars, performance chemicals, moulded fibres for packaging ($4.3bn), cellulosic fuels ($625m), phenolic resins ($11bn) and bitumen replacements ($49bn).

Solution on-sentence summary: A next-generation energy storage solution to tackle renewable energy integration and EV charging challenges
Identification: To meet the climate objectives, we must move towards a sustainable energy model which reinforces the use of renewable energy sources. However, solar and wind power only produce when the wind is blowing, or the sun is shining. This causes grid instability due to loss of system “inertia”, which ultimately impacts energy supply to consumers. Electricity is difficult to store on a large scale; production must always be at least equal to consumption. Without a mass storage solution, renewable energies have no future. OXTO ON is a flywheel and this Solution will lead the stability of inertia of the system, fostering renewable integration and electrification of transport. A flywheel is considered a mechanical battery that stores kinetic energy in the form of a rotating mass. It is a truly sustainable solution to the challenges of decarbonising power generation and transport industries. Three markets are targeted: Grid stabilisation, EV-charging industry, Building/Trains energy recovery.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Credibility
Tags: Off-grid, Batteries - energy storage, Flywheel energy storage systems (FESS)
The environmental benefits: 95% round-trip efficiency, 4 ms response, 100% DOD & unlimited cycles;Modular system with 25-year lifespan and limitless cycles of charge;Lowest operation costs: no degradation of performance, no cooling system;True sustainable solution: 70% less CO2 emissions than chemical batteries (e.g. lithium) from cradle to grave;Fosters renewable integration and electrification of transport; contributes to reduction of GHG emissions;100% recyclable (steel) and cleaner disposal process than alternative solutions;
The Financial benefits: Lowest cost over 25 years (2-3x cheaper): low maintenance costs, no replacements, 100% performance;Payback time = 3-5 years;Enables efficient use of solar and wind, provides UPS capabilities (savings on fuel costs);
Complementary solutions: Storage GEM®: Smart energy management system in containerized storage units for rapid deployment (Energy);Smart Energy Hub: An innovative hydrogen-based energy storage solution for buildings (Buildings & Shelters,Energy);Cool Green Energy Factory: An innovative energy concept to make cooling processes economically and ecologically sustainable (Energy,Industry & Consumer Goods);Solar GEM® (Green Energy in Motion): Smart energy management system for solar power plants (Energy);
Organization short description: OXTO Energy is a global, energy storage, technology provider. Our solution will help our world move to a low-carbon economy by fostering renewables and electrification of transport
About:
OXTO Energy’s purpose is to radically transform the way energy is stored in order to meet the worlds’ ever-increasing demand for more and cleaner energy.



OXTO has developed a new clean mechanical battery, made of steel totally recyclable, climate agnostic and with unlimited cycles, to deliver safe, scalable and lowest cost power storage solutions.

OXTO’s technology uses the principles inherited from previous successful deployments in satellite: simple design with fewest possible components, robust device with very limited maintenance over a long lifetime of 25-30 years.

The design allows for working alongside any power application from wind turbines and heavy-industry to EV-charging infrastructure.



Our solution addresses the following challenges:

•	EV charging infrastructure: the electrical grids as they were conceived cannot cope with a future dense EV infrastructure. The problem is the power required to simultaneously charge several vehicles or to fast charge vehicles. Our solution is a power buffer to any grid connection.

•	Smart Grid and Distribution: our solution addresses issues of inertia, voltage support (e.g. over-voltage raised by solar power plants). We combine our solution with other technologies to make an overall smart grid (solar, wind, flow batteries, compressed air, EV charging…)

•	Storage and flexibility: our solution provides flexibility by making renewable power plant the next generation of autonomous power plants. By combining a means of renewable energy and storage technologies to our flywheel solution, we can create a stand-alone power plant that meets the challenges of the energy transition in the world.



Flywheels will hence foster integration of REN and help cope with the EV charging infrastructure, whatever the grid connection. It will clearly reduce air and noise pollution.

Impacts: reduce the energy bill of communities (expensive fossil fuel); Reduce GHG emissions; reduce noise pollution (motorbikes, rickshaw, bus… with petrol engines); reduce water contamination (risk of fuel leakage from gas motorbikes maintenance) by fostering the electrification of transports.
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities

Organization short description: Is CLEAN AIR (EIC backed SME) launched APA - Air Pollution Abatement, a filterless, water-based innovative technology.
About:
It is different from all other products because uses simple water and mechanical processes for ambient air cleaning at ground level, a truly and effective air purification action in the spaces and places where we all breathe.

APA is a single technology able to abate simultaneously both Particles and Chemical pollutants, holding unique technological know-how and more than 30 inventions and patents already granted in Europe and Internationally. 

Air Pollution Abatement technology provides a huge range of solutions to clean the air everywhere as the many existing indoor and outdoor pilots and installations demonstrate. 

APA is certified for its efficiency and as a medical device because is able to abate ultra-fine nanoparticles, several times smaller than Viruses and Bacteria, which makes APA effective in reducing the presence and spread of the Sars Cov 2 virus, source of the Covid 19 infection.

The recent technology advancements have highlighted the potential to use APA water also for Covid 19 detection, in indoor spaces. 

This is possible only with APA in the cheapest and safest manner, because the water safely and securely contained within the system, kills viruses and bacteria and using standard Covid 19 RNA tests we can inform authorities and businesses even 1 week in advance of people showing symptoms. 

This is in itself a ground-breaking capability, unique of APA.

Is CLEAN AIR has experience in different Innovation Initiatives with several important customers and projects, both outdoor and indoor. In particular, using the «Nearly Zero Air Pollution Building» approach together with the disinfecting and virus detection capabilities of APA, is also possible to enable a harmful substance-free environment for spaces with a high density of people, such as business offices, schools, Universities and care institutions, to fight against this terrible pandemic.

APA is recognized as a Best Available Technology, very different from the competitors for a lot of clear advantages. It is: more efficient and cost-effective; more sustainable; extremely cheap (for the low running and maintenance costs) and easy to use and to be controlled; widely patented, also strongly certified even as a first-class EC Medical device; scalable and flexible, able to operate everywhere.

The company headquarters are located in Rome (Italy), with commercial offices in London (UK) and Hong Kong (China). 

Is CLEAN AIR's team is agile and dynamic composed of experienced engineers, analysts and environmental experts, with a global vision, an international mindset, and the ability to support stakeholders' needs offering the right solutions for different requirements and budgets.

Solution on-sentence summary: A farms wich combine precision agronomy and new technologies for growing plants
Identification:
To address urgent and unprecedented food challenges, Futura Gaïa aims at providing an efficient, immediate and sustainable solution through designing, manufacturing and selling turnkey vertical farms.

Thanks to inspiring founders relying upon a strong, complementary and experienced team, Futura Gaïa is about to reinvent agriculture.

Its unique concept combines precision agronomy and new technologies for growing plants while having a real focus for the preservation of the environment and creating positive local impact.

Futura Gaïa solution delivers year-round production of fruits/vegetables/plants with unbeatable yield indicators & maximized nutritional value. Thanks to its affordability and flexibility providing a distinctive agility in the CEA (Controlled Environment Agriculture) arena, Futura Gaïa can position its farms at all levels of the agri-food value chain from farmers to food and processing industries (cosmetics, pharma).
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility

Solution name: Buy Back Program for Mobile Devices
Solution on-sentence summary: Back2Buzz incentives customers to trade in their old mobile devices, to refurbish them and give them an extended life
Identification: 80% of the total smartphone volume sold is estimated to remain in drawers (hibernating). Back2Buzz incentives customers to trade in their old mobile devices, to refurbish them and give them an extended life. By using a widget, an app, and a solid back system, Back2Buzz can give higher residual values for a trade-in device than the competition making it more interesting for a customer to trade in older devices. By refurbishing mobile devices, the life cycle of a mobile device is extended by at least 24 months. At the end of the full life cycle (which can be up to 6 years), Back2Buzz makes sure that those devices are recovered and recycled correctly, meaning that the batterie is recycled by official instances (Bebat) and that other precious elements (gold, silver, copper) are recovered from other components.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding
Tags: Recycled, Electronic waste, Rare earths, Waste collection, Logistics, Reuse waste, Recycle waste
The environmental benefits: 80% of the total smartphone volume sold is estimated to remain in drawers (hibernating) as the incentive or residual value is not big enough for customer to turn in their old device;The life span of a smartphone is estimated at 23 months where the full potential could be 6 years by refurbishing;Each newly produced smartphone needs 30 kilos of raw material for a phone in average of 130 grams and 80% of the total CO2 production in the lifecycle of a smartphone comes from its production;At the end of the lifecycle of the phone, precious materials (cobalt, copper, gold, titanium, etc) can be recovered instead of ending up on a waste mountain;
The Financial benefits: A higher residual value is economically more interesting for a customer to trade-in a old mobile device than to keep it in a drawer;A well kept mobile device can be given a second and even a third life, extending the life cycle of a mobile device from 23 months average up to 6 years;
Complementary solutions: WOODOO: A bio-based translucent wood material for sustainable construction applications (Industry & Consumer Goods);LACTIPS: A 100% biobased material for a sustainable packaging alternative (Industry & Consumer Goods);RT7000: A machine to chemically recycle plastic waste back into oil (Industry & Consumer Goods,Waste & Pollution);BIO DISPERSIS LC: Recycle vinasse, a polluting residue from the alcohol industry, into organic additives for concrete (Waste & Pollution,Industry & Consumer Goods);
Organization short description: Back2Buzz is a Belgian company specialized in refurbishing A++ grade smartphones, ecofriendly&biodegradable accessories
About: Back2buzz is a Belgian company specialized in refurbishing smartphones to grade A++ Premium. In addition, Back2Buzz offers a range of bio-degradable and eco-friendly accessories. A one-stop-shop! Back2Buzz gives a second or even a third life to a smartphone in order to reduce the electronic waste mountain.
SDG’s of application: SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: A land management system that rewards soil quality and biodiversity restoration by regularly producing valuable harvest
Identification:
The Biodiversity Incubator combines the renaturing of degraded land and restoration of biodiversity with the removal of greenhouse gases while allowing considerate reaping of plant harvest. It upholds the triple bottom line creating positive impact on people, planet, and profit. Degraded land regenerates over time while providing work and revenue to the local population. After repayment of initial investment, annual revenues from harvest sustain care and maintenance and act as a safeguarding value chain remunerating continuous restoration efforts.

It does not compete for fertile (food) land and is established on previously non-farmed land (additionality). Artificial irrigation is not needed. Enhanced drought protection of the perennial plants makes it better prepared for climate adaption. The solution endorses transparency, traceability, and accountability of all stakeholders. It supports directly or indirectly almost all UN sustainability goals (SDGs).
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Trees & Forests, Biodiesel, Soil and land, Harvesting, Water & Wastewater treatment
Sectors: Food/Agri, Water, Water efficiency, Ecosystems management
The environmental benefits: Compared to traditional plantations freshwater use is reduced by 95% thanks to improved natural water holding capacity.;Use of bio-oil as fuel in vehicles or airplanes leads to 80% reduction of CO2 emissions compared with fossil fuels;Removes greenhouse gases by retaining 80% of the air captured CO2 from the atmosphere with a performance of net 5 tCO2e/year and hectare or higher;Restores soil and fosters biodiversity by increasing organic soil content;Growing of the primary plant seeds on soils with high initial concentration of heavy metals (e.g. mining areas) reduces through phytoremediation the level of contamination over short time periods by 30-70%.;
The Financial benefits: Positive revenues after buildup from year 3 of operation reaching full yield capacity in year 5.;Builds prosperity in local communities by providing 0.5 permanent, well-paid jobs per hectare of operation, an operation of 2500 hectares thus directly supports 1250 agricultural workers;
Complementary solutions: Kelda Technology: Halve the amount of water used by your shower without diminishing the experience (Buildings & Shelters,Water);IOT flood alert: A smart device-based solution for information, anticipation and alert of flood risks (Water,Infrastructures);h-aero®: Solar-powered helium unmanned aerial vehicle for versatile monitoring activities (Food & Agriculture,Industry & Consumer Goods);Water Widget: A simple and inexpensive device for reducing water usage in showering applications (Buildings & Shelters,Water);
Organization short description: Profitably renaturing Earth's wasteland for the benefit of humanity.
About:
Renaturation of wasteland and biodiversity restoration as a profitable, multiple impact investment.



A land management system rewarding the restoration of soil quality and biodiversity while permanently removing greenhouse gases from the atmosphere. Through the reaping of plant harvest, local communities have a long-term incentive to maintain agricultural areas in a sustainable way.

Solution on-sentence summary: The Sanura Flatmate is the most cost-effective shower heat exchanger for saving energy in existing showers
Identification: A lot of energy is wasted in showers. Valuable hot water is used for only seconds and is then drained into the sewer. By using a shower heat exchanger, heat can be recovered from the drain water and reused to pre-heat the incoming cold water. This results in significant energy savings and reduced carbon emissions. Current shower heat exchangers are integrated into the shower floor or wall, requiring breaking and plumbing work. Especially in existing showers/bathrooms, breaking and plumbing lead to significant implementation costs and hinder large-scale adoption of heat exchanger systems. Sanura developed the Flatmate, a shower heat exchanger that can be easily installed on top of the existing shower floor and connected to a standard shower faucet, without any breaking or plumbing work. By eliminating implementation costs, the Flatmate is the most cost-effective heat exchanger solution for existing showers/bathrooms.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Shower, Water-networks, Waste-heat valorisation, Green building
The environmental benefits: The Flatmate saves around 30% energy in the shower;The Flatmate can be installed within 20 minutes, without any breaking or plumbing works;By reusing heat that is otherwise wasted, the Flatmate significantly reduces the total energy used in a shower; In a typical use case of a 4-persons household, the Flatmate prevents around 5 tons of CO2 from being emitted over its 15 years product lifetime.;
The Financial benefits: In a typical use case of a 4-persons household, the Flatmate leads to energy savings of up to 200 Euro per year ;With a consumer purchase price of 689 Euro, the simple payback time is less than 4 years for a typical 4-persons household;
Complementary solutions:
Heat recovery system: Low temperature heating of premises by recycling waste heat from refrigeration systems (Energy,Buildings & Shelters);animeo Connect : Facade shading management solution for increased energy savings in buildings (Buildings & Shelters);Recovering heat : Standardized, ready-to-install solution for supermarkets to heat buildings or water using waste heat (Buildings & Shelters);LightFi: Continuously measure building occupancy to optimize energy use for HVAC and lighting



 (Buildings & Shelters);
Organization short description: We develop and sell shower heat exchangers that are cost-effective and easy to implement.
About: Showers waste a lot of energy. Valuable hot water is used only seconds before it is wasted into the sewer. By using a shower heat exchanger the heat can be recovered before being discharged. Current shower heat exchangers are difficult to implement in existing bathrooms due to the necessity of breaking and reconstructing works. Sanura aims at making shower heat recovery available for existing bathrooms by developing and selling shower heat exchangers that are cost-effective and easy to implement.
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities
