Solution name: TreaTech solution for the valorisation of waste
Solution on-sentence summary: A disposal solution developed to turn waste into valuable products such as renewable energy, clean water, and minerals
Identification: TreaTech brings to market an innovative technology for the valorization of waste. It transforms waste into local, contaminant-free methane-rich gas and clean water while recovering valuable minerals creating a positive impact on circular economy, energy independence and climate change mitigation.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners
Target client profile: Public Authorities, BusinessServicesWaste & Remediation, BusinessManufacturingBeverages, BusinessManufacturingChemicals & Pharmaceuticals, BusinessManufacturingFood Products
Tags: Biogas & biomethane, Carbon emissions waste, Methane, Waste collection, Waste-to-energy & fuels, Municipal Solid Waste
Sectors: Energy, Waste/Pollution, Power and fuel generation, Wastewater managementSolid waste management
The environmental benefits: The robustness of the technology allows us to treat a wide range of wastes from various sectors such as; chemical, food and beverage, municipal, agricultural and livestock among others.;Taking the example of a waste chemical solvent, our technology can produce 50 GWh of energy per year in the form of methane and capture 3300 t/year of CO2 by treating 6000 t/year of the waste;When treating sewage sludge, compared to mono-incineration, which is the most common disposal solution, for 3 times less space, our product is able to recycle up to 95% of the waste value; and it emits 94% less CO2eq;TreaTech’s process conditions blast viruses, bacteria, as well as micro-pollutants from the water it treats - 90% recovery of water that can be reused;
The Financial benefits: The technology can produce energy at prices as low as 30 US$ per MWh as opposed to other gas producers (Anaerobic Digestion US$>100; Pyrogasification US$>120; Power to Gas US$>200);In addition to the waste disposal fee, the process allows for several revenue streams from the sale of methane-rich gas; phosphorous and NH3 fertilizer precursors; clean water; and carbon credits;
Complementary solutions: Renewable gas for industrial burners: Decentralized renewable solutions for process heat in industrial processes (Industry & Consumer Goods,Energy);Stirling Engine: Stirling engine modules to generate clean electricity from waste heat locally (Energy,Industry & Consumer Goods);REM: A novel acid regeneration system for steel pickling (Waste & Pollution,Water,Industry & Consumer Goods);SEAB Energy - Flexibuster: A small-scale modular container for transforming organic waste into energy (Energy,Waste & Pollution,Food & Agriculture);
Organization short description: TreaTech is a Swiss based private Company that has developed a unique waste disposal technology.
About:
TreaTech was founded in 2015 by Life Sciences and Chemical Engineers at the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Lausanne, with the goal of harnessing the power of the circular economy to convert waste into valuable by-products.

 

To do this, TreaTech has developed patented technology that uses catalytic hydrothermal gasification (HTG) to convert a broad range of waste streams that are usually incinerated into integral resources in a sustainable and cost-efficient manner. These include clean water, minerals used for fertilizer such as phosphorus, nitrogen and potassium, as well as a constant supply of methane-rich renewable gas that can be injected into the grid network, stored or used to produce electricity at our customers’ sites.

 

TreaTech’s technology provides a solution to both short-term and long-term challenges. In the short-term it can provide a secure feedstock of renewable gas that can enhance supplies for businesses and consumers, improving regional resilience to a sudden spike in wholesale gas prices. Long-term, TreaTech provides a clean technology solution that can reduce the climate impact of current waste treatment solutions.
SDG’s of application: SDG 6 - Clean water and sanitation, SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: A solution to detect leaking toilets and avoid unexpected, large water and utility bills
Identification: Many are not aware that an estimated minimum 5-8% in UK, in US several government sources state 20%) of all toilets are constantly leaking clean water from the cistern into the toilet pan - each leaking toilet generally wastes between 274-1096 litres of clean water daily. Clean, unused freshwater leaks down the inner backside of the toilet pan, and straight down the drain along with the waste water. Water can trickle down the inner backside of the toilet pan so slowly that it is not even visible to the human eye, even the water surface inside the toilet pan remains calm. Aguardio's Leak Sensor is capable of detecting water leaks as little as three litres of water an hour. The device is simply connected to the toilet’s water inlet pipe with a plastic tie. It does not interfere with plumbing. If no one is present in the building, remote notification of water leaks is possible by pairing the Leak Sensor with a gateway.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners
Tags: Developing countries, Toilets, Water-networks, Leaks
Sectors: Buildings, Water, Water distribution, Water efficiency
The environmental benefits: The Leak Sensor will beep when it detects water leaks of more than 3 litres of water an hour (toilets and taps);Around 5-8% of all toilets leak, which could be avoided by implementing Aguardio Leak Sensor;
The Financial benefits: Average payback installations in Denmark expected 4-12 months (only leaks below 275 liters/day) ;
Complementary solutions: Kelda Technology: Halve the amount of water used by your shower without diminishing the experience (Buildings & Shelters,Water);Water Widget: A simple and inexpensive device for reducing water usage in showering applications (Buildings & Shelters,Water);Hydraloop: A fully automatic stylish in-house greywater recycling system (Buildings & Shelters,Water,Waste & Pollution);AQUA4D: Water-Smart Irrigation: Precision irrigation for water efficiency and land restoration (Food & Agriculture,Water);
Organization short description: Aguardio's easy-to-use IoT sensors help reduce the amount of water and energy consumed in the bathroom.
About:
Water scarcity is challenge that is becoming more and more prevalent. Globally, available freshwater resources are predicted to dwindle drastically due to the effects of climate change, while the demand for water is predicted to increase. Research shows that a behavioural change must be part of the solution that will reduce overall water demand. 

 

Aguardio’s mission is simple – to reduce water and energy consumption by supporting, improving and developing sustainable behaviour, and to reduce water waste by alerting to water leaks.



Our shower solution aims to motivate people to reduce their time in the shower by at least one minute: Each person will then save more than 10 litres of hot water and save enough energy to run a 60-watt light bulb for 6 hours. 



Our leak solution enables the detection of water leaks in toilets and from taps and is capable of preventing unnecessary water waste. 

 

Aguardio’s IoT sensors are designed to guide and motivate the user towards more sustainable habits. 



- Reduce shower time: Installed in the bathroom, Aguardio Shower Sensor causes a change in shower behaviour so as to reduce water and energy consumption. A combination of sensor technology and big data enables the Aguardio Shower Sensor to identify showers without having to access the water supply.

Aguardio Shower Sensor is much more than just a physical device - it’s a platform from where social norms can begin to change for the better. The sensor has a documented effect through a third party academic Research Study conducted by the University of Surrey.



- Detect leaking toilets and taps: The Aguardio Leak Sensor is a plug and play IoT sensor that can prevent substantial water waste in toilets. 

Many are not aware that at least 5-8% of all toilets leak clean water down the inner backside of the toilet pan. Leaks of even 274 litres daily can be invisible, as the water trickles down without disturbing the water surface in the toilet pan. The Aguardio Leak Sensor sounds a beep when it detects a leak, even as small as three litres of water an hour.

The sensor can also map out the number of toilet flushes as well as the use of water taps, which allows e.g., schools to address health concerns and to make sure that available facilities match the demand.
SDG’s of application: SDG 6 - Clean water and sanitation, SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

This solution is based on strong regulatory obligations and on an increasingly important awareness of environmental problems and in particular those related to recycling.



Today for every 3 parking spaces, Purple diverts 1 ton of waste from landfill and/or incineration. It thus achieves an average carbon gain of 3.4 tonnes.

Organization short description: We develop and deploy modular, permeable, eco-friendly flooring solutions.
About:
PURPLE ALTERNATIVE SURFACE designs and markets ecological, modular and intelligent solutions for urban pavements with a view to preserving water resources.



The company, based in Belfort in the Burgundy-Franco-Comté region, has forged partnerships in the fields of plastics processing and recycling with a view to eco-construction. It operates in a very favourable legislative and regulatory context. The management team, as well as the external contributors, are experienced in the various skills related to environmental protection, recycling and construction. The technological proposal is disruptive and will fully meet the expectations of designers, integrators and public decision makers. A sales force will be set up. The objective is to achieve a turnover of €13M by 2025, and thus to become a reference in this sector of activity with high technical, economic and environmental added value.



Soil artificialisation is now one of the main causes of climate change and the erosion of biodiversity. Rainfall episodes are more dense, which increases the risk of flooding. Every year, about 24,000 hectares are urbanised, the equivalent of the city of Marseille. Also, only 9% of plastic waste worldwide is recycled. The rest goes to landfill, incinerators, or worse, is exported out of sight. In France, 30% of plastics are now recycled, and the AGEC law aims to reach 100% by 2025.



Based on these observations, the SURFACE ALTERNATIVE VIOLETTE team has developed an eco-friendly, permeable road structure, of which the slab is a component.

Solution on-sentence summary: Swiss-made full glass high-performance solar tile with custom designs fitting into existing tile/slate roofs
Identification: The Swiss solar manufacturer Megasol has been producing solar roof tiles for over solar roof tiles for over 10 years. The latest version "Match" offers easy installation, high compatibility, and many design options. Megasol offers one to three standard formats per tile type, which can be combined with each other as required. In this way, the Swiss manufacturer achieves that "Match" is compatible with a very broad range of roof tiles. The solar roof tile from Megasol can be completely freely designed for sophisticated architecture. Megasol offers a wide range of colors and even the possibility to create individual colors. Megasol makes it possible to give the "Match" solar panels an individual look and even a unique feel by means of glass structures. Classic solar glass or interesting glass surfaces such as Creek, Diamond, River, or Wave can be used. This innovation was awarded the international "Red Dot Award" design prize.

Solution on-sentence summary: A biosourced chitosan from animal or plant biomass with guaranteed traceability
Identification:
Alpha Chitin aims at providing biosourced chitosan from animal or plant biomass with guaranteed traceability, high repeatibility and quality. The purity of produced chitosan can reach 90% and there is a wide range of molecular weights offered. The product is 100% natural.

The potential applications include pharmaceutical industry, cosmetic companies, agricultural sector and industrialists.

The manufacturing process is based on green chemistry principles. Alpha Chitin obtains raw materials from local suppliers and grows its own Mycelium for the fungi-based chitosin production. Its main facility is based in Lacq, France and the company is dedicated to support local economy, e.g. by creating workplaces.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Funding
Tags: Biobased, Medical & hygienic, Chemicals, Chemicals alternatives
The environmental benefits: Very high purity - around 90%;Different molecular weights: from 500 Da to 1200 kDa;100% Natural Origin Guaranteed ;3 times lower carbon footprint than chitosan produced from shrimp shells;Decreases pollution of the grounds by copper 100-150 folds in agrochemical application;
The Financial benefits: To be the only European producer of quality chitosan - Offer European players, as a priority, competitive prices with those practiced by Asian producers;
Complementary solutions: WOODOO: A bio-based translucent wood material for sustainable construction applications (Industry & Consumer Goods);LACTIPS: A 100% biobased material for a sustainable packaging alternative (Industry & Consumer Goods);RT7000: A machine to chemically recycle plastic waste back into oil (Industry & Consumer Goods,Waste & Pollution);BIO DISPERSIS LC: Recycle vinasse, a polluting residue from the alcohol industry, into organic additives for concrete (Waste & Pollution,Industry & Consumer Goods);
Organization short description: Alpha chitin est une entreprise de chimie du végétal qui produit des chitosans à partir de biomasse innovante pour des applications médicales, environnementales...
About:
Alpha chitin produit des chitosanes pour la médecine, la pharmacologie, la cosmétique, l'environnement et l'industrie.

La molécule de chitosane principalement produite en Asie à partir de carapaces de crevettes ou de crabes est extraite par Alpha Chitin à partir d'une biomasse de larves d'insectes, de carapaces de Krill et d'un champignon spécialement développé par notre société. Ces différentes biomasses permettent une réduction drastique de la consommation d'énergie et des produits chimiques actuellement utilisés.

Le chitosan extrait du champignon nous permet d'offrir aux acteurs du marché une molécule "d'origine naturelle" très importante en raison des législations européennes restrictives notamment.

Nous apportons également une solution radicale au besoin légal de production de biopesticides en Europe avec le développement d'un chitosan zwitterion qui permet d'encapsuler le soufre et le cuivre et donc de pulvériser cette formulation en agriculture en réduisant drastiquement l'utilisation du cuivre et du soufre.
SDG’s of application: SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: An approach to reduce exposure to particulate matter by targeted integration of sustainable air treatment technology
Identification:
The Lungs of the City provides a validated solution to substantially improve urban air quality, aiming at particulate matter removal at exposure hotspot locations. The solution is based on a proven air treatment technology, combined with an scientifically validated application strategy and a vast amount of practical experience. Therefore it brings a meaningful addition to existing policies to improve urban air quality. With the Lungs of the City approach, buildings, objects and infrastructure are smartly and efficiently transformed into net air purifiers to bring relief at exposure hotspot and actively reducing health risk.

With the Lungs of the City, an important instrument has been added to the toolkit for increasing urban sustainability and improvement of the living environment.
Looking For: New clients, Funding, Partners
Tags: Air quality monitors & filters, Filtration & purification, Sensors & monitoring, Ventilation
The environmental benefits: Limit the health risk of poor air quality with 25%;Compared to conventional air cleaning technologies, the Lungs of the City approach will reach a 80% reduction in energy consumption;The captured residue is 100% reused in architectural building ceramics, and therefore finding its way back in the city in a long lasting sustainable application;
The Financial benefits: A 2016 study of the World Bank has shown that each investment in air quality improvement will lead to a fourfold saving in health costs;A reduction of 2ug/m3 of PM2.5 concentration will lead to a reduction of more than 6% of the socio-economic cost per year per person. ;
Complementary solutions: Ambee: Pollution heatmaps of cities using portable sensors and purifiers (Waste & Pollution);Air Pollution Abatement (APA): A smart multiservice platform for air pollution abatement (Buildings & Shelters,Infrastructures,Waste & Pollution);Indoor Air Purification Solution: Adapting an industrial air purification process in commercial buildings (Buildings & Shelters,Waste & Pollution);Airy: A plant pot to ventilate the root system in an effective way (Buildings & Shelters,Waste & Pollution);
Organization short description: ENS offers a sustainable solution and strategy to eliminate particulate matter from ambient air for exposure reduction
About:
ENS Clean Air is a Dutch company specialized in air quality improvement strategies and technologies. ENS has  a particular focus on reduction of exposure to particulate matter and emission control in the built enviroment and the industry.



ENS developed a patented technology, specially designed to eliminate particulate matter without disposables, such as filters. There is a strong focus on energy efficient treatment of large air volumes. For urban air improvement, ENS has developed and scientifically validated the 'Lungs of the City' approach, for targeted PM exposure reduction in the urban landscape.



Over the years, ENS has grown to be an experts party in the field of air quality mitigation strategies, with a special focus on air flows and particulate matter. 



The ENS technology is applied in many cities underground car parks, in metro stations, in playgrounds, courtyards and integrated in street furniture and art objects. For the industry, ENS focuses on the improvement of  working environments and emission control. For this purpose, also custom solutions are engineered, such as on street sweepers, cold milling machines and for railway machinery.
SDG’s of application: SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities

Solution on-sentence summary: RHeX is a rotating heat exchanger designed to work with very dirty effluents without losing efficiency even when containing mechanical particulate
Identification: RHeX is an enhanced rotating heat recovery unit, specifically designed to work with dirty effluents also containing mechanical particulate, without losing efficiency. RHeX heat exchangers are a patented solution that can fill a gap in specific niche applications where it is possible to harvest energy from fluids with high levels of mechanical impurities or which, due to their properties, would normally foul or clog traditional heat exchangers.

Organization short description: POZZI: a long history of expertise and professional service towards innovative and sustainable technologies.
Headquarters: 20825 Barlassina, Province of Monza and Brianza, Italy
About: POZZI LEOPOLDO has been manufacturing textile machinery since 1885. Well aware of nowadays’ challenges, with a vision of progress that integrates immediate and longer-term objectives, POZZI has been among the first machine builders to work towards sustainability, designing and constructing energy-saving products. The solutions range from dyeing machines to chemical dispensing systems, from fixing and conditioning machinery to heat recovery units, with RCR being the first rotating energy optimizer ever built to successfully recover heat from heavily polluted water effluents, especially designed for the textile industry, but practically used anywhere there is a discharge of dirty hot water and the will to recover otherwise wasted heat. By patenting the RCR Pozzi has reached far beyond the textile field, so much so that in 2016 the European Union funded R&D of the newer RHeX model of rotating heat exchanger under Grant Agreement n. 727930 of the Horizon 2020 "LowUP" project. Its major benefits are: fouling-proof, pressure resistant up to 5 bar thanks to new design and robotized welding procedure, added pumping action for smooth treatment of viscous effluents, modular assembling of rotor disks (easy substitution in case of damage), overall maintenance-free, increased efficiency even with fluids at lower enthalpy. Fields of applications: textile, food and beverage, tanneries, industrial laundries, tank cleaning, sewage treatment, semi-residential facilities like hospitals, hotels, large buildings and wherever large quantities of very dirty effluents are discharged.
SDG’s of application: SDG 6 - Clean water and sanitation, SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities

Solution on-sentence summary: An energy and water-efficient solution to eliminate scaling by limestone in water networks
Identification:
The CO2 BICARBONIZER eliminates scaling by limestone from all equipment with a reduced carbon footprint, energy consumption and water consumption.

The solution is an ecological anti-limestone process with a natural and effective effect called the Karstic effect.

It completely cures limestone and offers optimal drinking water quality with no discharge for operation, and thus takes care of equipment and the health of the house habitants.

The installation does not require a licensed plumber to install and commission the device.

The Bicarbonizer contributes to recycling CO2 by transforming limestone.

Unlike salt softeners, the solution does not consume salt and does not release brine water into the environment. Its CO2 consumption recycles the equivalent of the CO2 absorption of a small tree, i.e. a small tree per year per family.
Looking For: Réseau, Nouveaux clients, Visibilité, Partenaires, Crédibilité
Tags: Drinking-water, Water-networks, Chemicals, Water quality
The environmental benefits: 100% curative of limestone and treats drinking water ;A 10kg bottle of CO2 to treat approximately 80-100 m3 of water, i.e. the equivalent of the water consumption of a family of 4 in an apartment for 1 year on ;Recycling 10 kg of food CO2 from a family per year is approximately the absorption of a young tree for its growth in one year;Use of approximately 80% less product in water for less waste;Crockery equipment, stainless steel sink, dishwasher, washing machine, water heater, kettle, coffee maker, shower screens, taps, (etc.) are preserved;
The Financial benefits: Less energy consumption for heating resistors without limescale deposits and water without pieces of limescale;Healthy tap water that reduces the need of buying plastic bottled water, which generates savings;
Complementary solutions: Kelda Technology: Halve the amount of water used by your shower without diminishing the experience (Buildings & Shelters,Water);Water Widget: A simple and inexpensive device for reducing water usage in showering applications (Buildings & Shelters,Water);Hydraloop: A fully automatic stylish in-house greywater recycling system (Buildings & Shelters,Water,Waste & Pollution);AQUA4D: Water-Smart Irrigation: Precision irrigation for water efficiency and land restoration (Food & Agriculture,Water);
Organization short description: Manufacturer of CO2 BICARBONIZER for water treatment. CO2 BICARBONIZER is the only 100% ecological descaler.
About: Manufacturer of CO2 BICARBONIZER for water treatment. CO2 is the only 100% ecological descaler that removes scale embedded in your pipes, heating resistors, bathrooms, skin and hair. The CO2 BICARBONIZER gives non-irritating water, appetizing water without removing the trace elements good for your health. Reduction of the CARBON FOOTPRINT by the equivalent of CO2 consumption per year for a family and a small tree. The carbon (C) stays on the minerals and the oxygen (02) goes back into the atmosphere when the water is used. No more sedimentation of limestone around the products giving more efficiency at a lower dosage.
SDG’s of application: SDG 6 - Clean water and sanitation

Solution on-sentence summary: Advanced Energy Communities (EC) solution to simplify the setting up and management of EC
Identification: The solution aims to deliver economic, social and environmental benefits to end-users, while also empowering the active participation of citizens in the energy markets. The solution is a modular, interoperable and localized cloud-based Operating System designed to manage energy communities around the world, managing the energy flows and trades, as well as distributed energy assets to increase collective self-consumption, provides aggregation of flexible assets for balancing markets participation, and it can also aggregate generation to participate in Energy Markets. End-users (residential or C&I) are provided with apps to monitor and manage energy flows and transactions. The solution seamlessly connects the dots between behind-the-meter optimization for community members and front-of-the-meter grid resiliency and transaction management for local energy markets. It is promoting the energy transition in a decentralized, digitalized and democratized way.

Solution name: Hybrid Small wind solar mini power plants
Solution on-sentence summary: A hybrid micro power plant generating energy from wind & solar, to be installed easily on rooftops of  buildings
Identification:
PowerPyramid and EnergyTower are unique hybrid micro power plants to generate clean energy from wind and sun all year round. It can be easily installed on the roofs of buildings such as houses, farms and offices, or placed free-standing.

We mount multiple solar panels on a wooden frame, add a dual vertical axis wind turbine at the top and the controls and electronics below to ensure optimal power production when the sun is shining or the wind is blowing. The devices are characterized by low installation costs, high turbulence resistance, low costs and high robustness and effectiveness. According to the UN, more than 1.4 billion people still have no access to electricity: with the use of hybrid wind-solar small power plants, many of them can be supplied with sustainable, local and clean electricity
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Off-grid, Rooftop, Wind power, Solar photovoltaic
The environmental benefits: Easy installation and low cost;Independent from wind direction ;Robust and efficient;With 1 billion buildings worldwide, if 1% of them each generate 1 MWH of electricity per year, 10 TWh less electricity is needed ;
The Financial benefits: Due to rising electricity prices, an EnergyTower(TM) can pay for itself in less than 20 years;In remote locations, the power supply can be guaranteed, avoiding the transport of oil or gas to the site, thus preventing a lot of energy and CO2 emissions;
Complementary solutions: Renewable gas for industrial burners: Decentralized renewable solutions for process heat in industrial processes (Industry & Consumer Goods,Energy);Stirling Engine: Stirling engine modules to generate clean electricity from waste heat locally (Energy,Industry & Consumer Goods);SEAB Energy - Flexibuster: A small-scale modular container for transforming organic waste into energy (Energy,Waste & Pollution,Food & Agriculture);PowerCorner: Mini-grids for affordable, reliable, sustainable energy-services for rural and off-grid populations (Energy);
Organization short description: We manufacture and sell the innovation EnergyTower to enable everybody to generate own clean electricity anywhere.
About:
This utilizes the combination of PV, wind turbine, storage, control and inverter, all in one device, easy to install anywhere and connect to the home grid, with lowest installation costs.

About one sixth of all people have no access to an electricity grid. Electricity is a prerequisite for education, information and health care. A lot of electricity is produced with fossil fuels. Many people would like to contribute to climate protection and be independent of electricity suppliers, but do not have a large sunny house roof. 

With our products EnergyTower™, PowerPyramid™, PolerPower™ and RoofPower™ we are filling this niches by offering the first devices that can be easily installed like an `IKEA furniture` and simply connected to the house network. Sun and wind as renewable energy sources complement each other perfectly. This means that electricity is also produced at night when it is needed for lighting, and thou less storage capacity is needed. The vertical PV modules generate more electricity when the sun is low, are less prone to snow and dirt and require less space. Costs can be saved by combining the technical devices. The interior of EnergyTower™ can also be used for water treatment and communication equipment, etc.
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy

Organization short description: UrbanThink®Platform is dedicated to digital decision support solutions for the decarbonized transition.
About:
KLC company, develops digital decision-making solutions in area of ecology and energy transition.

Our company has created a platform called Urbanthink®, which has the power to improve the quality of life for everyone.

Today, we are faced with complex challenges in our ecological and energy transitions.

Organization short description: D-Carbonize supports organisations to reduce their CO2 emissions with the best CO2 management software: Carbon Cockpit
About:
D-Carbonize supports organisations to reduce their carbon footprint with a maximum of transparency and control over CO2 emissions’ data thanks to our Carbon Cockpit.



CO2 emissions are becoming an increasingly heavy burden for organisations to bear which are more and more difficult to hide. 

Like in any efficient diet, unless one appoints a doctor every time a weight loss check is necessary, it is difficult to lose weight and track improvements without an accurate scale. 



We provide this weight scale with our platform Carbon Cockpit, and we ambition to break the dependency relationship between organisations and external carbon experts to measure their CO2 emissions.

We develop the necessary tool for CSR and ESG professionals to reach efficiently carbon reduction targets.



The Carbon Cockpit is the best carbon accounting software on the market. It offers complete features allowing organizations full autonomy, accurate results, clear reports, and comprehensive forecasts of their carbon footprint.

The Carbon Cockpit is an easy-to-use management tool to calculate and monitor your carbon emissions through ergonomic reports.



The Carbon Cockpit calculation algorithm is based on the Bilan Carbone® and Greenhouse Gas Protocol standards. It includes a database of more than 5 000 emission factors. This product is a professional tool for CO2 professionals.

Solution on-sentence summary: A modular & autonomous water filtration system which adapts itself to any fresh water source to provide drinking water
Identification: The unYo is a decentralized system that filters any type of fresh water to provide drinking water in a low-cost, effective, and environmentally friendly way, for small volumes (less than 40m3/h). Highly effective, the system is modular and adapts itself to water source ; it blocks 99.9999% of viruses and bacteria, pesticide residues, suspended matters and dissolved pollutants, all while preserving the natural minerals in the water. Thanks to its software, hardware and sensor technology, the unYo is autonomous and requires little to no on-site maintenance ; it does not require the use of chemicals, nor consumables, and it has a very low energy consumption (3kwh). Better for the environment, it has a lower environmental impact when compared to traditional technologies like reverse osmosis. Designed to be coupled with clean energy sources (such as solar panels) and easily transportable, its features make it the ideal solution to provide drinking water in remote areas.

Solution on-sentence summary: The Dynamic Combustion Chamber™ - DCC™ - boiler is fueled by hydrogen and oxygen, emitting zero greenhouse gases.
Identification: The DCC™ boiler is a commercial/industrial process steam generator (or water heater) fueled by hydrogen and oxygen. It emits no carbon dioxide, carbon monoxide, or other carbonaceous greenhouse gases. Moreover, it is NOx-free with pure hydrogen and oxygen. The primary product of combustion is water (steam), which when condensed is clean enough to be sent to a drain or recycled to the boiler, to an electrolyzer, or to another process that can utilize (warm) water. The purity of this "combustion" or "fuel" steam makes it easier to condense vs. more a dilute steam such as that obtained by combusting hydrogen in air. The energy efficiency of the DCC™ boiler is therefore superior, which is especially relevant wherever the cost of hydrogen is high. The system is particularly well-suited for electrolyzer-derived hydrogen where oxygen is a byproduct that is often vented to the atmosphere.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Target client profile:
Public Authorities, BusinessConstruction, BusinessManufacturingAutomotives & Road Vehicles
, BusinessManufacturingMachinery & Turbines, BusinessManufacturingMetals & Steel, BusinessEnergy Utility
Tags: Electrolysis, Hydrogen, Cogeneration (heat and power), Building heating, Industrial process heat
Sectors: Buildings, Energy, Food/Agri, Industry/Goods, Heating, cooling and ventilationPower and fuel generationIndustrial Heat, Manufacturing and construction processes
The environmental benefits: The dewpoint is greater for H2/O2 (DCC™ boiler) than H2/air combustion gases (~98 °C and ~70 °C, respectively at 15% excess O2);A DCC™ boiler producing steam at 3000 kg/h generates ~29 cubic meters (7600 U.S. gallons) of clean water daily;A DCC™ boiler making 3000 kg/h steam saves 11 tonnes of CO2/day ;The hydrogen-oxygen fired DCC™ boiler produces at least 400 kg of clean, warm water of combustion per 1000 kg of steam made;
The Financial benefits: At $1 per kg and electrolyzer O2 recovery, a DCC™ boiler’s fuel cost is equivalent to a ~$6.60/MMbtu ($23/MWh) price point for a conventional boiler;Recent natural gas prices in the EU have reached around $100/MMbtu ($340/MWh). The equivalent cost of hydrogen (with electrolyzer O2 recovery) for an optimized DCC™ boiler is ~$15/kg;

Solution on-sentence summary: A microwave-assisted alkaline hydrolysis for an economically viable recycling process of PET
Identification: The Solution aims at providing a sustainable, and profitable option for recycling polyester, with a particular focus on what mechanical recycling is not able to treat. This Solution relies on microwave-assisted alkaline hydrolysis to go back to terephthalic acid and ethylene glycol, saving up to 60% of CO2 emission compared with the existing production processes. This allows us to go back to what is normally used to produce PET and polyester fibers with a purity as high as the one from fossil fuels. Re-polymerizing the molecules it is possible to obtain a new polyester without using oil (at least 0 kg of petroleum naphtha per Kg of PET produced) and with the same quality (i.e., physical-mechanical properties, scrap rate, etc.).

Solution name: LOHC infrastructure for large-scale hydrogen transport
Solution on-sentence summary: A hydrogen distribution solution that enables safe and efficient large-scale hydrogen transport
Identification: The solution aims at providing a sustainable, safe and cost-efficient option to store and transport large amounts of hydrogen via the innovative LOHC technology (liquid organic hydrogen carrier). The LOHC technology stores hydrogen in a liquid carrier fluid via a chemical reaction, making it safe and easy to handle and transport.  At the customer site, hydrogen can be released again when needed. The process of storing and releasing hydrogen is reversible, meaning the carrier liquid is not consumed. The idea is similar to filling and emptying a deposit bottle, which is then ready for the next storage cycle. The LOHC has the same material properties as diesel and can therefore be distributed in the existing mineral oil infrastructure (e. g. tank trucks, and tank ships).
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world

Solution on-sentence summary: A wave energy system using the energy in the waves for conversion to power and/or desalination
Identification:
The Wavepiston system harvests the energy in the waves for conversion to power and/or desalinated water (drinking water).

Between two anchor points a string is mounted with multiple energy collectors, like pearls on a string. Each energy collector consists of a pump and a plate. When the waves pass by the plates are moved back and forth driving hydraulic pumps that generate high-pressure water, which is piped to a conversion station for conversion to electricity via a standard hydropower turbine and/or used for desalination via a standard reverse osmosis system producing drinking water. A Wavepiston wave energy farm will consist of multiple strings with multiple energy collectors on each string all connected to the conversion station.

The Wavepiston system is the solar cell of wave energy - a modular system with identical modules, ensuring high scalability, high automation, and all parts fit into standard 40' containers for easy logistics.
Looking For: Network, Funding, Partners
Target client profile: Public Authorities, BusinessEnergy Utility, BusinessWater Utility
Tags: Marine & Oceans, Electrical grid, Saline water, Desalination (= seawater purification), Wave & Tidal power
Sectors: Energy, Power and fuel generationWater supply
The environmental benefits: Capacity factor of 25 - 50 %;+90 % reduction of CO2 emission replacing fossil fuels;A competitive weight per effect in tons per MW;A non-intrusive system, not spoiling the view, creating an artifical reef in the sea. Studies so far on wave energy have shown no significant negative impact on flora and fauna.;
The Financial benefits: Reference project 7 years payback time;Reference project IRR 13%;

Solution on-sentence summary: A HIL-based test solution to de-risk and fasten integration and commissioning of all software-controlled renewables/DERs
Identification: This solution provides an affordable and significantly faster solution for testing and integrating diverse software-controlled devices into the grid while ensuring their safe operation in all conditions. The Microgrid Testbed with Generic Models uses a test-driven and model-based methodology which allows all relevant parties to create high-fidelity models of their renewable installations/microgrids (i.e. digital twins of physical sites) and use these models to identify and fix control software issues by automated testing, as well as to integrate devices and solve interoperability issues before commissioning using the simulation/emulation domain. This way, the solution represents one of the key enabling technologies for a rapid transition to a decentralized and digitalized grid which is also more stable and more resilient.

Organization short description: Typhoon HIL is the technology leader in the field of ultra-high fidelity real-time Hardware in the Loop testing.
About:
Typhoon HIL is the technology and market leader in Ultra-high fidelity Hardware in the Loop (HIL) solutions for design, testing, and validation of power electronics, microgrids, e-Mobility, EV powertrain software testing, and distribution control and protection systems. 



Typhoon HIL platform ushered a new era of model based testing and validation of control software and hardware with its embedded, ultra-high fidelity real-time Hardware in the Loop (HIL) platform. The core technology is based on proprietary numerical algorithms, ultra-low latency application specific processors, and optimized software architecture. Our HIL systems are widely used by engineers in microgrids, solar PV inverters, wind turbine  converters, battery storage, marine power systems, motor drives, automotive, and traction industries to speed up time to market, reduce cost of testing, and improve quality and reliability.



Designed with love, from the ground up, Typhoon HIL tools offer a unique user experience free of third-party software and hardware complexities. We stand behind our seamlessly integrated technology stack, from Typhoon HIL’s application-specific processors and ultra-robust numerical solver all the way to the Schematic Editor, SCADA system, and TyphoonTest testing automation. As a result, Typhoon HIL Control Center, with all the libraries installs with a single click, models compile in seconds, digital inputs are sampled as low as at a 3.5 ns resolution, and real-time simulation runs with a time step as low as 200 ns on the latest generation of Typhoon HIL products. The complete technology stack empowers our customers to continuously exceed their controller software quality, performance, and time-to-market goals.



With more and more renewables on the grid, more solar farms, more wind parks, more energy storage systems, more fast chargers, there is more and more software on the grid, both control and communication, and the power is becoming more digital. To ensure the flexibility, robustness, efficiency, and capability of the grid, software has to be extensively tested. With our real-time controller-HIL approach for software testing and validation we believe we bring to the market one of the key enabling technologies for wider integration of renewable energy sources, thus fully satisfying our mission: To engineer and promote environmentally sustainable power technologies that scale.



Typhoon HIL is privately owned company headquartered in Cambridge Massachusetts, US, with three fully owned daughter companies in Switzerland, Serbia and Canada and with offices in Germany, France and Brasil. In early days it was backed up by Venture Capital Fund of Ray Stata, founder of Analog Devices. From 2008, when the first office in Switzerland has been founded, to today it has grown to about 110 people and has a base of more than 700 customers including more than 400 academic customers.
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities

Solution on-sentence summary: A control system using AI to optimize the consumption of activated carbon on the treatment of atmospheric discharges
Identification: MyClaugerDetect is an intelligent solution that optimizes the treatment of odors and atmospheric emissions while reducing the cost of activated carbon by a factor of 10. Our smart unit operates autonomously using a fixed setpoint to ensure regulatory compliance. By combining different data, whether atmospheric, process-related or collected from local residents via the odor observatory, MyClaugerDetect determines a risk level in terms of air quality. If the odor risk is high, MyClaugerDetect automatically adjusts the setpoint. The exhaust air is then filtered in the activated carbons. The goal is to use it as little as possible to limit the environmental impact. If the risk is low, MyClaugerDetect automatically pilots an air bypass to optimize the use of activated carbons. MyClaugerDetect makes it possible to meet regulatory constraints with smarter, waste-free consumption. Resulting in cleaner industrial sites, so that everyone can live together peacefully.
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Credibility
Target client profile:

Organization short description: Founded in 1971, Clauger is a family-owned company specializing in industrial cold and air treatment.
About:
Founded in 1971, Clauger is a family-owned company specializing in industrial cold and air treatment. Today, we have more than 2,000 employees worldwide and have a turnover of 500 million euros.

For over 50 years, we have been responsible for the design, manufacture, installation, service, and maintenance of our equipment in France and on 4 continents. Our international dynamic, driven by key milestones and supported by 12 subsidiaries, allows us to export our know-how to more than 90 countries.

Clauger has used its expertise to provide industries with innovative and custom-built solutions. The company offers durable solutions for all types of markets: dairy products, fresh and cured meat, fruits & vegetables, logistics / cold chain, pharmaceuticals, chemicals, etc.

Regardless of the customer size, geographical location, type and complexity of the project, Clauger offers the most optimized solution.

Concerned about the environmental issues of our time, and driven by the needs of our customers, we rely on innovation to help them optimize their energy efficiency. Since 2013, we have saved our customers the equivalent of the consumption of a nuclear reactor (or 400,000 homes), savings that double each year. To innovate in order to bring a better quality of life is the most important leitmotiv of the company.
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure

Identification: Heex Technologies provides a data management platform to engineering teams so that they can transition from Big Data to Smart Data. Today, companies are requiring more precise information than ever before and if Big Data already allowed great progress, most AI developments are now facing a diminishing learning curve. By automatically extracting the most pertinent data at the edge, our software solution improves productivity with a seamless workflow designed to scale.

About:
Weturn is the first service to recover and recycle unsold products from the textile industry in a real closed loop. Our mission is to generalise the use of recycled textile materials.

We recycle fabric rolls, production scraps and unsold finished products into new qualitative yarns and textiles. We offer a unique, innovative, European, transparent and measurable solution. We have two offers : collect and eco-design. The collect allows materials to be recovered by recycling excess stocks. Eco-design allows us to develop collections that include recycled materials with less impact.

Solution on-sentence summary: An energy conversion solution that allows efficient energy production by low-altitude (urban) blowing winds
Identification: Until now, standard wind energy solutions have focused on the predictable behaviour of winds: the regular, laminar flow found only at high altitudes. However, winds can have much more varied behaviours. Windcity has developed, patented and produces a Passive Variable Geometry turbine, an energy conversion solution to allow efficient energy production by low-altitude blowing winds, enabling the utilisation of wind in urban areas for the benefit of society.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners
Target client profile: Individual, Public Authorities, Local NGO, BusinessEnergy Utility, BusinessServicesBuildings Operators
Tags: Off-grid, Wind power
The environmental benefits: Urban wind applications have a great potential increase in energy harvesting: the turbulent wind power lost with conventional tech is fully recovered as a circular input by our solution, which offers up to a net +67% energy production. ;Urban winds come in many short gusts of 3-5 minutes duration: conventional wind tech use this time to slowly speed-up before starting to produce;Being fast to speed-up and starting to produce during the short wind gust requires acceleration: in a turbulent average wind of 18 km/h our solution displays up to 8 times (800x) higher acceleration compared to standard wind tech..;Up to 100% of the urban wind today wasted can be recovered: this translates to +65% overall energy production in the urban environment;Up to 45% CO2 emission reduction in wind turbine production;Average 60% of the blade materials from recycled fibers ;
The Financial benefits: in an urban wind site, pay 0,108 €/kWh equivalent energy price, that is only a 30% of the average 2022 energy price;Save up to 40% of the wind energy installed costs: our rooftop installation uses the existing building as a wind tower;

Complementary solutions: Renewable gas for industrial burners: Decentralized renewable solutions for process heat in industrial processes (Industry & Consumer Goods,Energy);Stirling Engine: Stirling engine modules to generate clean electricity from waste heat locally (Energy,Industry & Consumer Goods);SEAB Energy - Flexibuster: A small-scale modular container for transforming organic waste into energy (Energy,Waste & Pollution,Food & Agriculture);PowerCorner: Mini-grids for affordable, reliable, sustainable energy-services for rural and off-grid populations (Energy);
Organization short description: Nature variability reduces renewable energy efficiency. The solution is always adapting to change: Windcity.
About:
Our vision is "Variable Geometry for Variable Flow"​: we pursue it through our patented disruptive energy conversion concept which allows us to maximize production in any variable flow. Thanks to Windcity's simple mechanics technology, we are able to harvest up to 70% more energy compared to competitors.



We contribute to a shift towards the Circular Economy by recovering and exploiting a relevant yet so far underestimated class of wind, that of variable wind. Our arms are designed to adjust the blades'​ radius and inclination, allowing our turbine to work in complete autonomy without the need of any additional energy source. 



Windcity is active in the mini-wind turbine sector (wind flow) and in technology transfer also for the hydrokinetic sector (water flow) offering, thanks to its patent of passive variable geometry, the mini-turbines from 3 to 10 kW adapt themselves to the variability of the natural resource for maximum energy production, while today experience loss of performance with conventional technologies. Efficiency, reliability, plug-in to standard market components as solar inverters and IoT connected as smart objects: renewable energy becomes the real alternative in the distributed market.



Windcity is a next-generation energy Tech Company, we have 2 patents, pilots across EU & soft commitment from previous institutional investors to follow on in the round. Buon vento! More info & Investment memo at bit.ly/3QPbuDR
SDG’s of application: SDG 6 - Clean water and sanitation, SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution name: Platform for BIPV solutions with Click & Go technology
Solution on-sentence summary: A platform and Click&Go technology for aesthetic photovoltaic facades and roofs, from idea to operation
Identification:
The BIPV.world digital platform for Building Integrated Photovoltaics, streamlines, structures, and automates design and information processes for the building industry. Architects, engineers, and facade companies will be enabled to co-create better designs and reduce costs.   



BIPV.world also solves the issue of not having enough BIPV specialists in societies to deal with this high-growth application. The digital platform combined with the Click&Go mounting technology is very easy and fast to design and implement. BIPV module and system suppliers benefit as well, because the cost to serve the market is almost zero now and the business scalability problem for the whole BIPV industry is solved as well. 



BIPV.world is the “Amazon.com for BIPV applications”.
Looking For: Network, Visibility, Funding, Partners, New clients
Target client profile: Individual, Public Authorities, BusinessManufacturingSolar Panels, BusinessEnergy Utility, BusinessServicesBuildings Operators
Tags: Electric, Off-grid, Solar photovoltaic
Sectors: Buildings, Energy, Power and fuel generation
The environmental benefits: Design any Building Integrated PhotoVoltaic facade in 15 minutes or less and get information (realtime) about costs and energy revenues (€);Fully install any Click&Go Building Integrated PhotoVoltaic Facade in less than 0,8 manhour per m2 with traditional building employees (non-specialists);Click&Go BIPV mounting technology for secure and long-life mounting of energy generating facades and roofs;Net energy positive, full electric, buildings resulting zero CO2 emissions;Flawless, fast, and low cost digital design and automated implementation processes;A vertical photovoltaic installation peaks renewable energy production at different, more beneficial, times compared to roof based photovoltaic installations ;
The Financial benefits: Real estate owners create a reliable revenue stream of € 35 - 45 per m2 per year.;The payback time for the Click&Go BIPV energy generating function in ventilated facades is less than 4 years;BIPV.world eliminates hidden costs the BIPV supply chain;
Complementary solutions: Renewable gas for industrial burners: Decentralized renewable solutions for process heat in industrial processes (Industry & Consumer Goods,Energy);Stirling Engine: Stirling engine modules to generate clean electricity from waste heat locally (Energy,Industry & Consumer Goods);SEAB Energy - Flexibuster: A small-scale modular container for transforming organic waste into energy (Energy,Waste & Pollution,Food & Agriculture);PowerCorner: Mini-grids for affordable, reliable, sustainable energy-services for rural and off-grid populations (Energy);
Organization short description: Click&Go technology for BIPV. Digital platform to create, supply and scale energy generating facade and roof systems
About:
Every building surface that sees daylight can and should generate renewable energy. BIPV.world is the inspiration, design and collaboration platform for architects, designer, facade builders, and construction professionals to come up with Building Integrated PhotoVoltaic systems  for the real estate industry. 



We enable faster, easier and more cost effective tailor-made energy transitions and supply these BIPV systems as prefabricated systems, ready to install, anywhere in Europe. 



The BIPV facade in the picture is the largest BIPV facade in The Netherlands and its unique futuristic design was made possible by utilizing the versatile "Click&Go" mounting technology developed by TULiPPS with financial contribution from European Commission (FP7 SUMMIT, H2020 EnergyMatching and H2020 BIPVBOOST). 



This digital platform enables every designer to create aesthetic, practical, and robust facade and roof designs with integrated solar panels according to the latest BIM standards. Another outcome is quickly available information about costs, earnings and return on investment (ROI) as a function of design choices.



The BIPV.world platform helps architects, designers, facade builders, and construction professionals excel and distinguish themselves from their competitors by offering the best BIPV solutions in industry, combined with compelling profitable business cases that are helpful to convince prospective customers. 



The online BIPV.world platform incorporates many competing solutions and its revolutionary operational model and BIM based design principles enables faster results, right-first-time, for all building applications and their respective environments. The BIPV.world platform is in the process of scaling-up in cooperation with European technology institutes (SUPSI, Tecnalia, Eurac) and a wide range of platform partners. 



For many years already, the BIPV.world organization provides practical experience and know-how to real estate companies in order to transform new and existing buildings to energy positive buildings. We are a reputed provider of services in the field of energy transition and offer consultancy in areas of: solar design and optimization, implementation & project management, renewable energy production & operations, permits from grid operators, and technical certification after project completion for insurance.  



BIPV.world is the most efficient and easy way to design, calculate and install building-integrated photovoltaic (BIPV) systems for all European parties involved in the real estate industry.
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities

Solution on-sentence summary: A modular battery using immersion cooling to provide safety, high performance and long life to electric mobile machines.
Identification:
The solution aims at providing a sustainable solution for the energy source of mobile industrial equipment used in sectors like construction, agriculture, mining or logistics.

Heavy duty equipment are used from 5 hours to 24 hours per day and they require constant productivity in all conditions. Electrifying these machines is therefore a bigger challenge than eletrifying cars.

WATTALPS uses an innovative immersion cooling technology to effectively control the temperature of the battery and ensure together safety, maximum performance and cycle life in all conditions.

WATTALPS permits to OEMs of the Off-Road sector to significantly reduce their time to market and divide their CAPEX by 20 for high performance batteries. Thanks to its temperature control, a high number of endurance testing and a clever monitoring system connected to the cloud, WATTALPS’ solution enables leasing companies and fleet managers to control and optimize their investment in their productive equipment.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners
Target client profile:
BusinessManufacturingAutomotives & Road Vehicles
, BusinessManufacturingBatteries & Battery Parts
Tags: Electric, Batteries - energy storage, Heavy duty vehicles, Lithium
Sectors: Energy, Mobility, Vehicles and vessels, Energy storage
The environmental benefits: 80% more autonomy than standard counterparts;43% increased charging rate versus the best other cooling technology;The liquid used for immersion cooling is biodegradable, non toxic and non flammable;Each WATTALPS’ module sold enables to save 1,27 tCO2e;Each WATTALPS’ module repurposed for a second life enables to save an additional 1,13tCO2e;
The Financial benefits: CAPEX divided by 20 to equip a new machine with high performance batteries;2 years extra battery life in classical e-mobility application. Estimation of 20% battery life increase in heavy duty applications.;

Solution on-sentence summary: A craneless system to erect wind turbines and lift blades by climbing up the turbine like a Koala
Identification: Koalalifter is a technical solution to erect wind turbines and replace spare parts without using a heavy crane. One of the most important advantages of KoalaLifter is the high adaptability of the collars. They are able to copy the shape and diameter of the wind turbine tower thanks to their adaptable friction collars. KoalaLifter is able to climb up the tower using the strength of the tower with winds up to 25 m/s reducing the wind turbine downtime. This provides reliability, robustness and safety during the operation.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Lightweight, Offshore wind power, Electrical grid, Maintenance and inspection, Repair, Wind power
The environmental benefits: KoalaLifter adapts to any type of tower of any height;Koalalifter lifts blades up to 20 tons, nacelle components up to 30 tons and turbine erection up to 150 tons;Component exchange takes 5-6 hours, turbine erection takes 17 hour and the wind turbine shutdown is shorter than with current methods;Less tree cutting & civil works because there is no need to create a clearance area to move KoalaLifter. It is transported only in a regular 40’ truck, where current methods need and use up to 40 trucks;Fast wind farm commissioning results in 60,000 kg CO2eq saved per wind turbine;Less CO2 emissions due to the reduced time to repair a wind turbine: each day the wind turbine cannot operate, it must be substituted by a non-renewable source of energy;
The Financial benefits: Operates with high winds, it is easy to install with an easy dumping system, and it is transported without any special permits;Twice less expensive than a regular crane to erect a 3/4MW turbine;
Complementary solutions: Low-cost substructure system: Bottom-fixed offshore turbine prototype that can be installed safely, simply and without cranes (Energy,Infrastructures);PYROWATTS: A disruptive waste to energy scalable gasifier for decentralized waste management (Waste & Pollution,Energy);SOPRASOLAR FIX EVO: A photovoltaic waterproofing process for converting roof surfaces into renewable electrical production (Buildings & Shelters,Energy);Pyro Power Plant: A climate-positive process for biochar and clean energy generation from biowaste (Energy,Food & Agriculture,Waste & Pollution);

About:
Koalalifter solution presents significant advantages versus competitors as: 

Universality: it operates in any wind turbine,

Regular truck transportation

Easy installation with a damping system

Only one operator needed

Can operate with higher winds

Portfolio covering: Maintenance, dismantling and turbine erection

Solution on-sentence summary: A self-healing cement formula that reduces risk of leakage in carbon capture and storage wells
Identification: EverCRETE self-healing cement provides longer lasting isolation at underground CO2 storage sites. Those sites are designed for permanent containment of captured CO2, which is pumped down injection wells into porous rock formations up to several kilometers beneath surface. A custom formulation of Portland cement is used in a typical oil, gas or storage well to create an impermeable seal between the rock and steel casing. CO2 injection wells pose an additional challenge because CO2 can prematurely degrade traditional Portland cement. EverCRETE's self-healing formula reacts with CO2 upon contact, allowing the impermeable seal to maintain itself in circumstances that would require repair or replacement of traditional cement formulas at significant cost to the operator.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility
Tags: Underground, Developing countries, Cement, Gaseous waste capture, Leaks, Industrial materials
Sectors: Energy, Infrastructures, Manufacturing and construction processes
The environmental benefits: EverCRETE maintained compressive strength under 28 MPa of pressure in CO2 saturated water through the duration of a lab test that caused traditional well cement to fail;EverCRETE is rated for in-situ temperatures up to 140 degrees Celsius;EverCRETE reduces the chance of premature failure of the cement seal in a CO2 injection well;EverCRETE performance has been demonstrated in laboratory and field conditions;
The Financial benefits: The cost of EverCRETE is approximately 10x less than the cost of repairing degraded cement;

Solution on-sentence summary: An AI and machine learning software platform to accelerate materials R&D and innovation
Identification:
Materials or molecules are essential to every aspect of our lives, from the clothing we wear, the phones and vehicles we use, the energy that powers our lives, to what we eat and the medicines we need.

The solution is a cloud-based software platform deploying our leading machine learning (ML) algorithms that make materials R&D faster, greener, and more productive. This allows companies to develop better materials and molecules faster, while minimizing their waste and carbon footprint.

The solution solves optimization problems that existing methods cannot solve, increasing the probability of discovering novel breakthrough materials. The solution works with existing processes and allows R&D labs to replace the slow and expensive trial-and-error method with a data-driven method, where the platform and algorithms orchestrate and guide the experiments. Companies can deploy leading ML algorithms with no coding and no ML-expertise required.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Target client profile:
Public Authorities, BusinessManufacturingAutomotives & Road Vehicles
, BusinessManufacturingBatteries & Battery Parts, BusinessManufacturingChemicals & Pharmaceuticals, BusinessManufacturingSolar Panels, BusinessServicesHealthcare & Medical Institution
Tags: Chemicals, Algorithms & AI, Automation, Internet, Manufacturing, Reduce & prevent waste, Industrial materials
Sectors: Energy, Industry/Goods, Mobility, Project planning, Energy and fuel efficiencyManufacturing and construction processes
The environmental benefits: Atinary solutions are 10x faster and lead to better performance than state-of-the-art methods used in industry, such as high-throughput experimentation and Design of Experiment;Atinary solutions can solve complex optimization problems that current methods cannot, including multi-objective optimizations with categorical variables and non-linear constraints ;Applications include catalysis, formulation, and process optimization of materials for climate tech, health, and chemicals;Atinary solutions can find the optimal blend formulation of organic polymer solar cells with less than 3% of the samples needed using conventional traditional trial-and-error methods and high-throughput experimentation (HTE).;Atinary solutions accelerate the process by 6x and improves efficiency by 25% compared to current state-of-the-art Design of Experiment (DoE);Atinary Falcon outperformed algorithms from renowned universities in the U.S. in a competition to discover optimal perovskite crystals for solar cells, with the highest success rate of all resulting in high quality perovskite crystals;
The Financial benefits: Reduce the number of samples and experiments needed to find optimal materials and molecules by up to 33x compared to high-throughput experimentation and up to 22x compared to Design of Experiment;The transfer learning algorithm accelerates materials optimization and discovery by up to 5x, leveraging prior knowledge from past experiments and use this knowledge in new applications;Increase the probability of discovering the advanced materials needed  to develop biodegradable plastics, or better, lighter, non-toxic, non-flammable and/or easier to recycle batteries;
Complementary solutions: WeNow: A plug-and-play system for the driver to act for the climate now (Freight,Mobility);Heat recovery system: Low temperature heating of premises by recycling waste heat from refrigeration systems (Energy,Buildings & Shelters);Low-cost substructure system: Bottom-fixed offshore turbine prototype that can be installed safely, simply and without cranes (Energy,Infrastructures);Claranor: Pulsed light packaging sterilization equipment for bioindustries (Industry & Consumer Goods);
Organization short description: Machine learning startup making R&D and discovery of advanced materials and molecules 10x faster, better and greener.
About:
Atinary is a machine learning (ML) software startup based in Lausanne and Silicon Valley with the mission to accelerate optimization and R&D of breakthrough materials and molecules by 10x.



The name Atinary comes from the verb in Spanish "atinar", which means hit, as in hit the target. Atinary's leading ML technology can hit targets 10 to 100 times faster.



Why does accelerated materials discovery matter?



Accelerating R&D matters because materials are essential to improve our lives and tackle some of humanity’s biggest challenges. For example, better materials are key to reduce pollution and address climate change, and to improve health. We need better materials to get rid of microplastics and to develop a) more affordable batteries that last longer and are not toxic; b) more efficient solar cells that can be deployed everywhere; and c) more effective carbon capture, use and sequestration tech. Similarly, to discover new medicines and vaccines, we need to find the optimal conditions to hit the right molecules.



Fortunately, there are more molecules and materials waiting to be found than visible stars in a starry night, or grains of sand on Earth. Thus, the opportunity is immense!



Products:



Atinary offers proprietary ML algorithms that can be deployed seamlessly in existing workflows using Atinary’s no-code software platform, SDLabs. Users of SDLabs can accelerate R&D and discovery by 10x by augmenting lab scientists with machine learning technology that is simple to use, accessible in the cloud, and user friendly.



With SDLabs users can deploy ML algorithms to solve multi-objective optimization problems with multiple parameters, including categorical variables and non-linear constraints. Thus, SDLabs users can hit optimal chemical reactions to find the best materials and molecules in months or weeks, instead of years.



Atinary’s SDLabs has been deployed and validated across industries and sectors, including in energy, climate tech, pharma, biotech, chemicals, and materials.
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure

Solution on-sentence summary: An innovative heat treatment furnace which allows to decarbonise heat treatment, making it more efficient and safer
Identification: The ECO Furnace is a double chamber installation including a furnace and an integrated oil quenching cell. It is a compact installation that aims at replacing gas-heated atmospheric furnaces for carburizing operations. Thanks to vacuum, the ECO Furnace is very efficient. Heat treatment takes place at a higher temperature in comparison to conventional solutions, which increases productivity. Also, the carbon footprint of this equipment is optimized. Indeed, electric heating combined with vacuum allows to get rid of endo gas generators, and only consume the gas needed to carburize. As a result, energy consumption is limited and CO2 emissions are among the lowest with a cut of about 80% compared to mainstream alternatives. Thus, thanks to electric heating and vacuum, their integration in workshops are made super easy. Indeed, no flames are generated and the risk of fire hazards is eliminated. Moreover, ECO Furnaces can be integrated in existing batch lines, using existing conveyors.

Solution on-sentence summary: The GEH2 is a zero-emissions electro-hydrogen medium-power generator for land applications (back-up & prime power)
Identification:
The EODev GEH2® is a hydrogen fuel cell power generator designed to replace diesel or gas gensets in both mobile, prime and emergency standby applications. This generator has zero direct emission, only rejecting water and heat as by-products. No noise, no fumes, no CO2 or fine particles. It was designed to be scalable, efficient and easy to use, and is equipped with the latest generation of hydrogen fuel cells from Toyota, giving it strong reliability and a record life span. It can thus be used in various scenarios, depending on the customers' needs, to provide low carbon electricity to support existing power supply limitations from the grid.

Customers comprise all sorts of companies that have temporary power supply needs or emergency power needs.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility
Target client profile: Public Authorities, BusinessMining & Extraction, BusinessConstruction, BusinessEnergy Utility, BusinessWater Utility
Tags: Electrical grid, Hydrogen, Fuel efficiency
The environmental benefits: The GEH2 has a mass of 3.9 tons and its dimensions are 1150mm (width) x 2200mm (height) x 3350mm (length);This cutting-edge generator has zero direct on-field emissions, only rejecting water and heat as by-products: No noise, no fumes, no CO2 or fine particles;These mobile hydrogen power generators have the advantage of being ultra-quiet when running and odourless;
The Financial benefits: The GEH2® has an energy efficiency of 50%, whereas a Diesel solution operates with only 30% efficiency;EODev offers a warranty of 6,500 hours or 24 months of operations but the lifespan of the GEH2 is expected to reach at least 13,000 hours;

Organization short description: We develop and industrialize sustainable, reliable and affordable hydrogen-based energy solutions.
About:
We have always been convinced that true progress is the one respecting the world we live in, and that our eco-friendly solutions should benefit to the greatest number.

Since innovation only takes on its full meaning if it is spread, and since the most extraordinary inventions are only of interest if they are shared, EODev relies on its own technological advances and those of its partners to design, develop, and produce accessible, high-performance solutions meeting the major challenges of the 21st century.
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy

Solution on-sentence summary: Color-optimized solar modules allowing the combination of energy and crops production
Identification: Food systems have a significant carbon footprint and a lot can be done to decarbonate our favorite fruits and vegetables. Voltiris' solution, consisting of color-optimized solar modules compatible with crop production, enables the energetic transition of greenhouses and allows greenhouse owners to gain in sustainability, energetic independence and viability. The solution, based on a spectral filtering technology, is compatible with high-light crops. Hence, growers can fully leverage the large surface of their greenhouses to cover them at max 35% with Voltiris modules. For a standard 5ha greenhouse, this results in up to ~17,500 solar modules installed, hence transforming the greenhouse into a photovoltaic power plant. The solution brings innovations on both the solar module and an innovative 2-axis solar-tracking system that allow to produce as much electricity as standard panels resulting in a very competitive LCOE.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, Visibility, Funding, Credibility
Tags: Off-grid, Developing countries, Greenhouse, Agricultural equipment & machinery, Solar photovoltaic
The environmental benefits: 20 times more sustainable energy in a greenhouse than with Combined Heat and Power (CHP);Up to 80% energy independence for a standard greenhouse (vs 2% without our solution);Up to 80% reduction of CO2 emissions coming from energy;4.3GWh of green energy produced in a standard 5ha greenhouse;
The Financial benefits: Up to 70% reduction in energy costs;Solution paid off in ~4 years when compared to Combined Heat and Power (CHP) system, for an expected lifetime of 25 years;
Complementary solutions: NEXUS: An alternative for sustainable development of smallholder farmers and fisheries communities (Food & Agriculture);AgRho® S-Boost: An innovative solution for the treatment of seeds (Food & Agriculture);AQUA4D: Water-Smart Irrigation: Precision irrigation for water efficiency and land restoration (Food & Agriculture,Water);Living Farming Tree: A sustainable mini-indoor farm for urban farming (Food & Agriculture);
Organization short description: Voltiris enables the energy transition of greenhouses by developing color-optimized solar modules compatible with crops
About:
Voltiris is a Lausanne-based startup that enables the energy transition of greenhouses by developping color-optimized solar modules compatible with agriculture, and more specifically with glass greenhouses. It allows greenhouse owners to transform their greenhouses into renewable powerplants and hence, better control their energy costs and improve the viability and sustainability of their operations.



The innovative Voltiris modules allow a double use of agricultural land by producing electricity without reducing the yield of crops placed underneath. Indeed, Voltiris modules filter the light field in order to transmit to the plants the light waves necessary for their growth, the rest being used to generate electricity. With the renewable energy produced, greenhouse owners require less external gas and electricity, and can significantly reduce their carbon footprint and operational costs.



Voltiris has been incorporated as a Swiss legal entity in Lausanne (VD), Switzerland in February 2022
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: A digital twin platform to optimise the environmental impact and operation of buildings
Identification: Akila is a digital twin platform for the built environment, able to measure and optimize environmental impact and efficiency all the way from a single building to large international multisite portfolios. Akila was designed as an ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance)-first platform, with real-time collection and structuring of complex data from all the different systems that make a building run. Akila users can at any time see how their built assets are performing and use this reporting to easily document their progress towards net-zero. Akila is an open platform, meaning that, in addition to the modules developed in house by the Akila team, it will also feature integrations with a growing number of specialised software and hardware solutions.
