Solution on-sentence summary: Engineering soils using local waste for a variety of land use
Identification:
The Solution aims to recycle mineral and organic amendments while protecting natural soils. The clean waste will be used to build a new fertile soil which allows fast plant growth and production. As soils are the key to green infrastructure development, our solution is directly beneficial as it presents the main component of green spaces. Our solution protects the surrounding environment, improve life quality, and reduce cost related to both waste and natural soil transformation.  

SubsTer® solution is fertile topsoil made of clean waste recycling while respecting government regulation; in particular, it targets the global recycling platform market, while our clients target green landscape design or planning.

Complementary solutions: Hawa Dawa GmbH: Intelligent iot sensor-based environmental monitoring for air-quality improvement (Waste & Pollution);SEAB Energy - Flexibuster: A small-scale modular container for transforming organic waste into energy (Energy,Waste & Pollution,Food & Agriculture);Pellenc ST: Optical sorting machines to recycle large amounts of waste quickly and accurately (Waste & Pollution);Low-cost substructure system: Bottom-fixed offshore turbine prototype that can be installed safely, simply and without cranes (Energy,Infrastructures);
Organization short description: Microhumus provides sustainable and cost-effective environmental solutions to soil degradation.
About:
Soils are a fundamental component of green infrastructures, playing key roles in supporting plant growth, infiltration of runoff water, and macro/micro activities relevant to nutrient cycling and pollutant degradation in urban, mining, traffic, industrial, military and brownfield areas. To ensure the development of vegetation and offset the low fertility of urban soils, large quantities of topsoil are imported from surrounding agricultural or forest areas. Taking soil from rural areas for urban use is not sustainable as it is costly and comes with environmental risks: release of CO2, dust, petroleum consumption. Soil is not a renewable resource that can be excavated and easily transported from rural to urban areas without consequences. 

Also, the growth of urbanization increases the need for developing green infrastructure like parks, urban farming, side-street trees, … and human activities increase waste release, contamination, and soil degradation.

Microhumus fights soils degradation and sealing by applying innovative solutions. 

Using locally available materials or waste such as construction demolition waste, Microhumus builds fertile soils while respecting local regulations. These soils are engineered and designed to provide several ecosystem services based of the client needs.  

Both phytoremediation and engineered soils solutions rely on huge amount of scientifically approved litterature and research collaboration with a large number (10) of international research institutes and universities around the world.

Microhumus' services have already convinced many industrial groups including building (Colas, Vinci, Eiffage, Spie, …), Environmental Consulting (Ginger, Antea, Egis, EODD …), and industries (ArcelorMittal, SmurfitKappa, RTE, GRTgaz, …).
SDG’s of application: SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: A kitchen water filter to turn taps into sources of clean water, to avoid bottled water consumption.
Identification:
More and more people on our planet drink bottled water instead of tap water. This poses a major problem for us and our environment. Plastic bottles are not only responsible for a large portion of the world's plastic waste problem, it also takes 1 to 2 liters of clean water and other precious resources to make a 1-liter plastic bottle.

That's why we developed the DrinkPure water filter. DrinkPure is a simple source for natural and healthy water straight from every tap. Our filter can effectively remove microplastics, pathogens, pesticides, odors and other contaminants. This has been proven by accredited testing laboratories. The filter can be easily screwed to all standard faucets. Our customers benefit from filtered drinking water without compromise! Thanks to the QuickFix filter coupling,  you decide whether water is filtered or not. One filter lasts for about two months. DrinkPure doesn’t only help you reduce plastic waste. It is also much cheaper than drinking bottled water.

Solution on-sentence summary: An AI-based platform to make cities greener through curb management
Identification:
Cocoparks develops a turnkey solution for cities to better manage the curb, in order to reduce by 10% urban pollution as well as increase significantly the accessibility of the city centers. The proprietary solution is based an AI-based sensor analyzing the urban environment locally (fully GDPR compliant) and in real-time, a SaaS platform so the city can steer the curb and an app for the citizens and users of the infrastructure. This enables cities to solve issues such as unsafe delivery vans being double-parked because of cars parked in delivery spaces, electric cars looking to park at a charging station occupied by a vehicle that is not plugged in, drivers turning around endlessly in the city center looking for a parking spot, which represents an important ratio of city circulation.

In addition, continuous parking that prevents other people from reaching local retailers is avoided. The solution can also be helpful for the detection of dangerous scooters that have fallen to the ground and are obstructing traffic and reducing the impact of construction sites on mobility in city centers.

Target client profile: Individual, Public Authorities, BusinessServicesInfrastructureRoads & Road Traffic Infrastructure
Tags: Street, Cars, Motorcycles, Algorithms & AI, Parking
Sectors: Infrastructures, Mobility, Vehicles and vessels, Logistics

The Financial benefits: Less than 2 years payback time;Pilot implementable even for budget lower than 40k€;10 times lower total installation costs than the mainstream alternative;

Solution on-sentence summary: Recycle plastic waste that has no recycling solutions, into a wood-like material
Identification:
Recnorec aims at improving plastic recycling  ratios by proposing a solution for waste plastic blends that were eliminated (incineration/ landfilling), in order to transform them into a material used for outside facilities instead of wood, metals, plastic or concrete.



Recnorec process can absorb mixed plastic waste streams, which is logistically very interesting for plastic waste generators. Recnorec material will replace other non renewable resources like wood, and is recyclable.



Solution works thanks to an innovative recycling process line that combines classic plastic shredding/densifying and extrusion equipments, as well as an original unique shaping machine.



Process can accept plastic waste blends without sorting or washing. Material performance relies on a relative steadiness of polymers composition in the global mix. We can absorb thermoplastics that never had any recycling solution.

Solution on-sentence summary: An air filtration device using sustainable, compostable and recycled materials in place of traditional plastic filters
Identification:
Traditionally, air purifiers rely on HEPA filters to perform their function. HEPA filters are constructed of dense polymer-heavy materials. Plastics and fibreglass which have an extremely damaging and lasting impact on the environment. The industry norm is for an air purifier unit to be sold, the filters will be used for their optimal life, then more filters will be re-purchased, on average 1-4 times per year. 



Tens of millions of these harmful filters end up wasted on our planet every single year, leading to enormous environmental damage. This is the problem we have created a pioneering and sustainable alternative to.



The briiv Air Filter is made completely from natural materials such as bioplastics and recyclable materials like cardboard and glass, with zero-plastic, natural, biodegradable filters which disappear upon disposal in a matter of months.



Our three stage filter process is engineered to perform on the same level as a plastic model, without costing the Earth.

Identification: The ollas aim to facilitate the irrigation of all types of plants while allowing a strong saving of water. Simply plant the ollas near your plants and fill them with water before letting the magic happen. These porous clay water tanks have the capacity to self-regulate the plants in water up to 10 days of autonomy by slowly and naturally spreading the water around it. A thousand-year-old system still considered one of the most efficient in the world and the most sustainable. The ollas allow everyone to grow their flowers, vegetables and more without any specific knowledge. This eco-responsible system adapts to all types of plants, whether they are in pots or in gardens. Moreover, they increase the productivity of vegetables and use up to 70% less water than conventional methods.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Underground, Gardening, Green roofs & vegetalisation, Irrigation
The environmental benefits: No water stress and deep irrigation;Only needs to be filled about once a week (saving time and knowledge);70% of water saved with each watering;A 100% natural and local product;
The Financial benefits: Up to 200% more production in vegetables;40 liters of water saved per olla per year;
Complementary solutions: WEPOT: A thousand-year-old irrigation system making plants naturally self-sufficient and saving up to 70% of water (Food & Agriculture);IRRIOT - wireless precision irrigation automation: A wireless precision irrigation automation (Food & Agriculture);
Organization short description: We innovate around an ecological and ancestral irrigation system. It saves up to 70% of water.
About: Wepot brings back to life an ancestral irrigation technique called "olla" or "irrigation by jar". It traces back to more than 2000 years ago in Asia, Africa and Latin America. Wepot modernizes these technique with multiple advantages.

Solution on-sentence summary: An online solution allowing consumers and professionals to sell and buy second-hand household appliances.
Identification:
The solution izidore.com aims to extend the life of our home equipment. The marketplace, which specialized in second-hand furniture, decoration and household appliances, allows professionals and individuals to sell and buy second-hand products as easily as new ones. Thanks to the delivery service and secure online payment, buying second-hand has never been so easy. 



This solution aims to respond to urgent environmental issues, by allowing everyone to equip themselves better and cheaper. Selling and buying second-hand is also the opportunity to develop a circular economy on these types of products. Indeed, reuse is a real alternative to consider before choosing to recycle your furniture. 



Today, styles and fashions change very quickly and the objects that surround us have a very limited life span. This is why giving them a second life must become a consumer reflex. Izidore.com works to help consumers in this process and to accompany them towards virtuous consumption patterns.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility

The reuse of this product allows to extend its life span before recycling it;In the specific case of the reuse of 1 ton of matress, 77% of the CO2 emissions are safe by avoiding the landfill of 800 kg of matress;

About:
Idrabel has developped several biological solutions for water treatment. Our products are composed of a dedicated mix of micro-organisms, fixed on a porous mineral support (powder like), enriched with enzyms and oligo-elements. Our Bio-Col product can clean the sewers networks, a little weekly dose will transform the sewers into true "bio-reactors" that can "digest" fat blocks, grease and organic matters. No more mechanical purge (less CO2 !), no more bad odours, and a cleaner water.

Our Bio-Vase product will "digest" the organic part of the sludge, making a true "bio-dredging". Each kg of Bio-Vase can digest up to 3 m3 of organic sediments. It will also treat organic pollution present in the water for example hydrocarbon, PCB, fats, halogenates, dioxins, ... and "fix" heavy metals within its support.

Solution name: Biochar at Scale in the Tropics
Solution on-sentence summary: A low cost and scalable biochar production system leveraging agricultural residues, suited for developing countries
Identification:
The Solution aims at removing atmospheric carbon and storing it away for hundreds of years, by extracting and stabilizing carbon from crop residues in tropical developing countries, in the form of a product called "biochar".

Biochar can be incorporated into soils where it remains stable for hundreds of years. In parallel, incorporating biochar in soils allows to improve soil health and crop productivity, and reduces the usage of fertilizers. Last, the production process of biochar allows to generate renewable electricity.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Developing countries, Electrical grid, Biochar, Carbon offset, Agricultural Waste, Pyrolysis, Carbon footprint
Sectors: Food/Agri, Crops care, Finance and Impact offsettingSolid waste management
The environmental benefits: Biochar allows to improve crop yields between 10 and 100%;1.5 to 2 tons of CO2 removed from the atmosphere by ton of biochar;20-50% reduction in usage of fertilizers;
The Financial benefits: Payback in 2-3 years for farmers;3-4 times cheaper than biochar currently produced in Europe or North America ;
Complementary solutions:
SEAB Energy - Flexibuster: A small-scale modular container for transforming organic waste into energy (Energy,Waste & Pollution,Food & Agriculture);KITRO: Simplifying food waste management for commercial kitchen

 (Food & Agriculture,Waste & Pollution);NEXUS: An alternative for sustainable development of smallholder farmers and fisheries communities (Food & Agriculture);AgRho® S-Boost: An innovative solution for the treatment of seeds (Food & Agriculture);
Organization short description: NetZero is a carbon removal venture scaling up biochar in the tropics.
About:
NetZero® is a climate venture specialising in long-term carbon removal from the 

atmosphere

We turn agricultural residues into biochar, a very stable form of carbon. The process 

is as follows: plants capture carbon during photosynthesis; we extract and stabilise 

this carbon through a pyrolysis process; the resulting biochar is buried in the soil, 

safely storing the carbon out of the atmosphere for hundreds of years

The long-term carbon-removal effect of biochar allows to generate high-quality 

carbon credits with strong social co-benefits in agriculture and access to energy

We operate a unique model, leveraging proven technologies and own R&D, that 

maximises social and climate impact, optimises our economics and allows for scale

Our ambition is to be annually removing over 1 million tonnes of CO2 from the 

atmosphere before 2030

We completed 2 financing rounds in 2021 and finalised the building our first full-

scale production facility in Cameroon in October.
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: A digital platform to collect, monitor, analyze and optimize the energy consumption of buildings
Identification:
Ubigreen Energy is an energy management software that aims at measuring, analyzing and improving the energy performance of buildings for commercial buildings, industrial sites and public buildings. 

For the implementation of a continuous improvement plan (ISO 50001, Tertiary Decree, etc.), a remote data reading system is an essential prerequisite. Thanks to it, we can build an inventory of the building, from the angle of its energy uses: detect leaks and malfunctions, define energy performance indicators, detect problems of service or maintenance and, finally, complete follow-up and reporting to technicians, operators, energy managers and company management. 

Associated with a system or an installation (electricity, natural gas, domestic hot water, etc.), remote reading makes it possible to monitor energy consumption, make internal re-invoicing, collect energy data and fluids according to consumer usage and identify sources of energy savings & equipment leaks and/or malfunctions.

Solution on-sentence summary: Sterilizing Compactor to reclaim contaminated PPE & commingled packaging waste into safe material at origin
Identification: In 2020 alone, about 1.56 billion face masks are estimated to have entered our oceans. The most effective way to prevent plastic waste such as Personal Protection Equipment (PPE) and other commingled used plastics from polluting our ecosystems is reclaim waste at its origin by sterilizing and compacting the waste into a chip.  SAFEReCYCLER is a compact reclamation platform compressed into a single piece of equipment the size of a refrigerator to prevent waste from escaping into unexpected places in our ecosystem. It is simple to install that is fully automatic with minimal resource requirements. The entire reclamation process requires minimal human intervention, is energy efficient and is self-contained with an extremely low risk of exposure to any pathogens during operation. The output material, which is certified pathogen-free, has a wide range of applications in housing and construction such as furniture sections, floor tiles, wall cladding and roof panels.
Looking For: Visibility, Funding, Network, New clients, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Medical & hygienic, Waste collection, Reuse waste, Waste-to-materials, Packaging & plastics waste, Hazardous waste, Waste treatment

The Financial benefits: There is no cost addition for waste disposal for users but waste is converted into a useful and valuable product;Create a total value of over 200M USD of reclaimed material in the course of this decade itself;

Solution on-sentence summary: Replaces single-use packaging with reusable, available, affordable and more ecological packaging
Identification: The reCIRCLE concept is simple and is already used in 6 European countries. It replaces the disposable packaging of on-the-go catering with high-quality, washable, microwaveable, tight-fitting containers and cups with lids. The products are made of durable plastic and are recyclable after hundreds of uses, at the end of life. The innovation lies in the combination between networks, products and service. It is suitable for restaurateurs who want to pack their food and beverage in a stylish and sustainable way and for consumers who want to enjoy their food on the go without waste. It works like a deposit system and the products are returnable and exchangeable in all the restaurant partners. The products never lose value, they can be returned in every state, except if the lid is missing. This way the circle is closed and the general public can enjoy a circular economy in everyday life and zero-waste packaging.

Identification:

Droople is building the Internet of Water based on IoT & AI connecting 100B+ assets to monitor them, predict their maintenance and enable water-energy savings for those operators and vendors via a hybrid business model based on hardware sales and software subscription plan.

Droople's solution aims to reduce unplanned interventions, 24/7 monitoring of your assets in the field, increase your consumable sales and enable water-energy savings.

Complementary solutions: OSMOSUN: A sustainable, flexible energy source for affordable and renewable water for all (Water);Kelda Technology: Halve the amount of water used by your shower without diminishing the experience (Buildings & Shelters,Water);WATA™ technology: Devices to enable local treatment and disinfection of water (Water);Purifaaya: Locally-produced water filters for the production of safe drinking water in uganda (Water);
Organization short description: Droople is proven to optimize water-energy savings and CO2 emissions 23% more sustainable than mainstream alternatives.
About:
The United Nations predict a 40% shortfall of global water supply by 2030, combined with an increasing water quality concern at the tap. We are completely blind to what happens after the main water meter in any residential, commercial or industrial buildings. More than 100 billion water assets such as sanitary ware, water treatment systems and appliances are off radar today where their performance, lifetime and maintenance rely on water quality and usage. We build the Internet of water to connect those assets to monitor them, predict their maintenance needs and enable water-energy savings. 



Droople is an IoT/AI B2B Swiss-based company that serves 100+ paying customers around the globe such as manufacturers, operators and corporates to help them easily collect the data from the field, exploit them for business and operational intelligence and embed sustainability practices.



Our IoT & AI full-stack solution comprises Droople iLink edge device agnostic with a wide range of sensing capabilities (flow, temperature, pressure, hardness, pH, etc.) on mediums like water & gas, retrofit capabilities (in & out, battery-operated, leverage existing sensors) to adapt to various type of water assets and consumables as our customers sell and maintain a wide range of products. On top of the hardware layer, our water intelligence platform delivers tailored modules and analytics that are specific to the segment of our customers (filter end of life, water & energy optimization, consumable refill and automated procurement, leakage localization, cleaning or maintenance need).



Droople's Smart Water Monitoring Solutions are tailored and designed for water intensive industry sectors. We believe in the win-win strategy: optimizing water usage allows you to save both costs and the planet.

Solution on-sentence summary: A process to survey nature from DNA in the environment, making biodiversity measurement simple for businesses globally
Identification: eDNA enables data on species and ecosystems to be generated at unprecedented scales using DNA traces that organisms leave behind in the environment, especially in water. A simple kit is used to filter water from lakes, rivers or oceans, capturing the DNA traces the filter membrane, which is sent to a laboratory for analysis. In the lab, the DNA is sequenced and sequences are compared against a reference library to identify the species they came from. A single sample of just a litre of water can reveal hundreds of species, ranging from bacteria to blue whales and including both species that live in the water and those living on land nearby. The ease of sampling enables biodiversity to be surveyed in more places, more often, and by a wider range of stakeholders, providing the evidence-base for effective conservation, impact mitigation and restoration of our natural resources.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Target client profile: Public Authorities, BusinessMining & Extraction, BusinessConstruction, BusinessEnergy Utility, BusinessWater Utility
Tags: Marine & Oceans, Rivers, Trees & Forests, Soil and land, Algorithms & AI, Sensors & monitoring, Service, Software, Water & Wastewater treatment
The environmental benefits: 1L of river water can provide as much data on the fish community as up to 10 years of annual electrofishing surveys;For surveying terrestrial mammals, eDNA can detect 25% more species than camera traps for half the cost;Over 90% reduction in CO2 emissions achievable in some locations through use of on-site personnel to conduct biodiversity surveys using eDNA, rather than flying in teams of ecologists to conduct conventional surveys;Over 10 times more sensitive to detect some invasive species at low population levels compared with conventional surveillance, enabling faster response for control and management to prevent further spread;
The Financial benefits: 75% cheaper than mainstream alternative survey methodologies for some species;Hundreds of species can be surveyed with eDNA for the same cost as a single species surveyed with conventional methods;

Solution on-sentence summary: An innovative foldable container, optimizing the empty container transport, to make logistics more sustainable
Identification:
The solution aims to alleviate the problem caused by the empty shipping containers, due to global trade imbalances. While import-dominated ports accumulate large amounts of empty containers, export-dominated ports need them as transport equipment, requiring a repositioning transport of them.

In addition, shipping containers spend half their useful life empty in depots, causing a major problem in port areas that need large areas to store them.

The current strategies are not working and the final impact of repositioning empty containers is 20 billion dollars per year in cost and additional emissions of 200 million tons of CO2 per year.

Zbox is a disruptive foldable container that optimizes the empty containers repositioning. It's a patented foldable container design with the same features as the standard container. However, when it’s empty, we can fold it and bundle it in 5 containers in the same space as one, reducing the space in transport, storage and handling operations.

Tags: Containerized, Cargo ships, Pallets & containers, Route optimization, Maritime shipping

The Financial benefits: 50% reduction of the operational cost of empty container transport (2500€/year/TEU);20% financial savings over the operational cost of the total transport in a roundtrip;

Organization short description: Navlandis is a R&D company,developing Zbox, an innovative foldable container,to make freight transport more sustainable
About:
Due to global imbalances in trade routes, when a container arrives at a port, it usually needs to be repositioned empty at another point of demand to be refilled with another commodity. The sector's overall data are convincing: global empty container traffic accounts for 25% of the total. 

In addition, sea containers spend half their useful life empty in depots, causing a major problem in port cities that need large areas to store them.

The final impact of repositioning empty containers is 20 billion dollars per year in cost (Handbook of Ocean Container Transport Logistics, 2015), and additional emissions of 200 million tons of CO2 per year.

The empty containers problem is persistent since the invention of the maritime container and become bigger with the growth of the global economy.

At the present we are in a huge logistic crisis, due in a big part to the problems to empty container repositioning transport, resulting in a huge container shortage in the demanded areas.

Zbox is a disruptive foldable container that optimize the impact of empty containers. We hold the patents of a new foldable container design with the same features than the standard container. However, when it’s empty, we can fold it and we can pack 5 containers in the same space as one.
SDG’s of application: SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: WaveRoller is an oscillating wave surge converter that produces consistent renewable energy from ocean waves.
Identification: The technology is a submerged oscillating wave surge converter that produces consistent renewable energy from ocean waves. The unit consists of three main subsystems; Panel, Power Take-Off and Foundation. As Panel moves in sea, it absorbs energy from waves. Panel is connected to mechanical drivetrain which results in hydraulic fluids being pumped inside a closed hydraulic circuit. All the elements of the hydraulic circuit are enclosed inside a hermetic structure inside the device and are not exposed to the marine environment. The high-pressure fluids are fed into a power storage and smoothing system, which connects to a hydraulic motor that drives an electricity generator. The electrical output from this renewable wave energy power plant is then connected to the electric grid via a subsea cable and landside substation. The devices’ foundation is floating concrete barge which will be towed with a tug boat from harbour to installation site
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners
Target client profile: Public Authorities, Local NGO, BusinessEnergy Utility, BusinessServicesInfrastructurePorts and Marine Infrastructure
Tags: Developing countries, Marine & Oceans, Electrical grid, Wave & Tidal power
The environmental benefits: A single WaveRoller unit (one panel and PTO combination) is rated at between 350kW and 1000kW;WaveRoller can support grid stability through fast frequency response (2s-10s);Life-cycle carbon intensity of the WaveRoller is 33 gCO2/kWh (around 30% lower than solar PV);Carbon intensity of power generation can be up to 85% lower than existing levels ;
The Financial benefits: Current LCOE in the range of 100-150 EUR/MWh, with further reductions possible as deployments increase;Wave energy allows production of renewable electricity using a stable resource freely available to many countries;Offsets reliance on carbon-based generation, so no ongoing costs for fuel (e.g. coal, oil, gas) purchases to generate electricity;

Solution on-sentence summary: A dry exhaust gas treatment process to remove SOx and particles from exhaust gases of ships diesel engines
Identification: The dry SOLVAir Marine exhaust gas treatment system based on the injection of sodium-based sorbents provides an efficient, sustainable and profitable solution to comply with existing IMO 2020 sulfur regulations. The acid neutralization reaction with the SOx begins as soon as the sodium-based solution is in contact with the exhaust gases after the injection. As a side benefit the system removes more than 99 % of particles and consequently anticipates expected regulations on particle emissions reduction and can thus be considered as a future-proof solution. The sorbents used (also well-known as "baking powder") are environmentally friendly, neither toxic nor irritant or harmful to the environment and human health. They can be easily handled onboard without any risk for the crew or passengers. The resulting reaction products are considered as non-hazardous waste and different options for the treatment on land are available.
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Partners
Tags: Marine & Oceans, Cargo ships, Air quality monitors & filters, Logistics, Maritime shipping
Sectors: Freight, Mobility, Fumes and waste-heat management
The environmental benefits: Includes storage silos for sorbent and residues, a dosing and injection system and a particle filter which makes operation and maintenance easy and with a low risk of failure;Due to its simplicity the technology can be installed in short time, without longer off-time of the vessel in a shipyard, on top no dry-dock required ;No transfer of pollutants from air to sea, no acidification of the oceans by release of polluted wash water back to the sea;99 % SOx removal rate;99 % particle removal rate;
The Financial benefits: 1 - 2 years payback time;Several millions of euros fuel cost savings per year per vessel;

Solution on-sentence summary: A software solution to prevent aircraft contrails and convert achieved climate benefits into carbon credits
Identification: The Solution enables eco-conscious aircraft operators to avoid forming contrails at cruise altitudes, eliminating associated surface warming and cutting up to 60% of aviation's entire climate impact (equivalent to 2% of all human climate impact). The Solution leverages atmospheric science to generate a digital twin of the Earth's atmosphere from the surface to space, allowing operators to navigate around atmospheric zones where persistent contrail formation is likely. In addition to enabling contrail avoidance, the Solution also tracks aircraft movements to quantify achieved climate benefit for conversion into carbon credits in an emerging market worth up to $9bn globally (2019 flight numbers).
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world

Organization short description: SATAVIA simplifies decision-making to make aviation smarter and greener via our cloud-based AI technology, DECISIONX.
About:
SATAVIA is a data analytics and AI company based in Cambridge UK helping the aviation industry to make flying smarter and greener.



THE CONTRAIL CLIMATE CHALLENGE:

Recent research shows that contrails formed by aircraft at cruise generate 59% of aviation’s climate impact, versus 32% arising from direct CO2 engine emissions. Future NetZero emission engines and fuels may exacerbate contrail formation as a result of higher water emissions. Contrail formation therefore presents the most significant climate challenge that aviation will face in the post-COVID19 era. SATAVIA is currently the only team offering a practicable solution to the contrail challenge.











OUR SOLUTION:

SATAVIA’s unique DECISIONX:NETZERO system uses AI-powered data analytics and enterprise-grade data to deliver actionable insight, enabling aircraft operators to accurately forecast, avoid, validate, quantify and offset aviation contrail emissions.



Pre-flight, operators can optimise flight plans to minimise contrail formation by targeting low-risk altitudes identified by SATAVIA modelling. Post-flight, DECISIONX:NETZERO validates contrail formation against modelled predictions and quantifies climate benefit, which is then converted into carbon offset credits for operators. With a conservative target of 50% contrail prevention, SATAVIA could enable annual emissions savings in excess of >1,000 Mt CO2e/year across all operators.



Alongside ongoing, incremental efforts to develop greener engines and fuels, DECISIONX:NETZERO offers a revolutionary, application-ready solution capable of targeting and minimising aviation’s most damaging environmental impact.



While SATAVIA’s vision centres on the goal of making aviation greener, the company also offers products focused on improving condition monitoring. SATAVIA’s DECISIONX:FLEET allows operators to improve asset condition monitoring (e.g. corrosion risks for parked aircraft) by ~10%, while also optimising engine core

wash scheduling.
SDG’s of application: SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: An autonomous farm monitoring system for cooperatives and farm managers to early detect crop problems
Identification: Due to the increasing size of farms and its management, crop monitoring is becoming more and more time-consuming and difficult to carry out with the conventional means available to farmers. As a result, in order to prevent losses, farm managers use plant protection products and fertilizers, on their entire farm. Such practices have important economic and ecological consequences. Farm Monitoring 2.0 offers a daily crop monitoring solution that simplifies the work of farm managers and allows cooperatives to optimize their activities. Thus, through the combination of machine learning algorithms, remote sensing by drone and satellite, and models based on meteorological and agronomic data, the Solution ensures the anticipation and detection of the main crop problems (diseases, pests, weeds, water and fertilizer deficiencies, yield forecasts, optimal harvest date, etc.) serving the optimization of technical itineraries, logistic flows and operators' working time. The service, available on an annual subscription basis, covers the real-time acquisition and analysis of data from the relevant sources available, including meteorological, satellite, agronomic and drone-acquired data. Once processed, the information is made available via an application on a dedicated tablet in the hands of the end user or on a web platform

Organization short description: Abelio offers an autonomous system of daily farm monitoring to reduce the use of pesticides, water and fertilizers.
About:
Due to the increasing size of farms, crop monitoring is becoming more and more difficult to achieve with conventional farmers' means. As a result, and in order to prevent losses that can be enormous, farmers too often use plant protection products on their entire farm as a preventive measure. Such practices have significant consequences from economic (costly products), environmental (water, air and soil pollution) and health (contacts with harmful products) perspectives.



To overcome this, Abelio offers an autonomous system of daily farm monitoring. We develop a solar drone and a multisource (drone, satellite, weather stations, agronomic models) data analysis technology which anticipates and detects the main farm problems (diseases, pests, lack of water...). Thus, we allow not only the farmer to monitor the state of health of his farm day by day but above all to receive a daily diagnosis and advice in terms of treatment to be provided (which product, which dosage, which timing, which place). Farmers can then optimise the use of pesticides, water and fertilizers, according to the real needs of their crops.
SDG’s of application: SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: Optimal aircraft dispatch planning software for air transport operators
Identification:
4% of all passenger planes currently flying over our heads are empty. Empty flights have a considerable cost, both economic for the operator, and environmental. As a result, dispatching the best aircraft for each flight and elaborating the fleet planning is a crucial operation. Yet, the problem has a tremendous complexity because the number of possibilities makes it impossible to solve by hand, even with a limited number of flights. Pogo is a software designed to reduce this volume of unnecessary empty flights performed by air transport companies, especially Business Aviation operators. It provides the optimal fleet usage for its users and achieves the lowest possible amount of ferry flights with no passengers.

It helps them improve the efficiency of their fleet. This results in direct savings for the operators and a reduction of their greenhouse gas emissions. Because the process can be automated and runs almost in real-time, it increases operators' efficiency. Finally, it also helps users react to last-minute changes, such as grounded aircraft or flight cancellations.

Solution on-sentence summary: Hydraulic storage solution coupled with solar panels, providing clean energy 24/7 to rural and isolated areas
Identification:
STEPSol has designed an innovative hydraulic storage solution based on the principle of Pumped-storage Hydropower (PSH), or STEP in french, but in reduced dimensions (less than 1MW), outside watercourses and coupled with a solar plant: the Hydraulic Battery. 



During the day, solar panels power a village but also a pump which brings the water from a lower tank to an upper tank (declivity of +50 meters). When night falls, or when the electrical demand is too important, water goes down and activates a turbine, which will produce electricity and compensate for the lack of solar energy. This innovative but yet rustic solution is accessible for local users who can assure its maintenance and participate in civil works



STEPSol focuses its offer on energy flexibility and the permanent adaptation of its micro PHS to the specific conditions of each site. Thanks to its competitive price, low tech conception and long lifespan, the Hydraulic Battery is a great alternative for off grid zones.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners
Target client profile: Public Authorities, Local NGO, BusinessEnergy Utility
Tags: Off-grid, Developing countries, Hydropower, Microgrids & minigrids, Water pumping, Solar photovoltaic
The environmental benefits: Electricity generation 24/7 thanks to solar production and water storage;A PHS totally reduced in size: Power up to 1MW and basins up to 10.000m3;Lifespan of more than 25 years + Up to 70% of efficiency; 0% Water lost, 0% chemical pollution risks ;Using a Diesel production : 0,35lt of fuel to produce 1kWh of electricity // Using STEPSol's solution: no fuel consumption;
The Financial benefits: Payback period of the investment between 4 to 10 years ;Cheaper than diesel solutions LCOE : 150-250$/MWh (vs. diesel LCOE : 300-600$/MWh, source Lazard);A resilient and improved electrical service (fuel independent) with positive impact on local economic activities;
Complementary solutions: Renewable gas for industrial burners: Decentralized renewable solutions for process heat in industrial processes (Industry & Consumer Goods,Energy);Stirling Engine: Stirling engine modules to generate clean electricity from waste heat locally (Energy,Industry & Consumer Goods);SEAB Energy - Flexibuster: A small-scale modular container for transforming organic waste into energy (Energy,Waste & Pollution,Food & Agriculture);PowerCorner: Mini-grids for affordable, reliable, sustainable energy-services for rural and off-grid populations (Energy);
Organization short description: STEPSol proposes an innovative storage solution, sustainable and competitive for isolated areas, the Hydraulic Battery!
About:
STEPSol is a Corsican start-up founded on September 30th, 2016. We develop a hydraulic storage solution coupled with a solar production, to supply green electricity through day and night, to rural territories or isolated zones. 



We aim at developing sustainable and responsible projects, in accordance with communities and their surrounding environment, by considering local specificities and electrical grid constraints. Furthermore, the hybrid system developed by STEPSol goes beyond a simple green electricity production: it creates additional benefits to the people who host the installation. 



Principle of our “Hydraulic Battery” 



The solution developed by STEPSol combines the simplicity and rusticity of pumped hydro storage PHS, with a smart management of sun and water. 



During the day, solar panels power a village but also a pump which brings the water from a lower tank to an upper tank. When night falls, or when the electrical demand is too important, the water goes down and activates a turbine, which will produce electricity and compensate the lack of solar energy. Water acts as a “hydraulic battery”: it makes the solar production fully controlled and flexible.
SDG’s of application: SDG 6 - Clean water and sanitation, SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy

Solution on-sentence summary: Live costs and carbon footprint tracker to deploy cost-efficient sustainable workflows for audiovisual productions
Identification: TheGreenShot is a live costs and carbon footprint tracker to ease sustainable audiovisual productions. Delivered as a Web and mobile subscription service  it is used by people and teams. The solution digitises every workflow involving people and computes both costs and carbon footprints in real-time - with two key benefits: decrease the risk of budget overruns and enable productions to be sustainable at a fraction of the costs. It delivers accurate carbon footprints thanks to the granularity of the data it captures and its own computation algorithms – delivering the precision to achieve quantitative targets in footprint reduction. In addition, by focusing on all the workflows related to people – from travel to accommodation, from transport to catering and more, TheGreenShot solves the complex issue of engaging people to better address the Scope 3 dimension of carbon footprints. Through its large number of open interfaces, TheGreenShot creates uniquely efficient workflows.

The Financial benefits: Using TheGreenShot on a feature film saves between 25 to 50% of the administrative costs;

Organization short description: Make 5% of the world’s cultural and creative industries net-zero within 5 years: films, TV series, commercials, events
About:
The problem:

The cultural and creative industries’ production process is broken – inefficiencies increase administrative costs by 50%, operations generate 1% of the world-wide carbon footprint and a maze of green certifications is putting pressure on productions at world-wide level. 



The opportunity:

This industry is and will remain human-intensive and critical to our economic future:  it employs twice as many people as the telecommunications and automotive industries combined and represents 4.4% EU GDP in terms of turnover.  But this is a huge opportunity - mobilising this huge workforce to act on each production, upskilling them progressively and delivering returns on investments to productions by fixing every blockage in their production worklow.



The solution:

TheGreenShot is the 1st app that upgrades one of the most poorly digitised chain AND moves it to net-zero – delivering efficiency gains that save costs AND carbon footprints, creating a cohesive climate goal across production teams, fast-tracking productions to act concretely to save carbon footprints. Combining a unique innovation in real-time carbon footprints with an open partnership programmes that delivers connected data workflows that our customers did not even dare to dream about.



The track record:

Launched in 07/2021 after 5 years of development and testing on 5 large co-productions, TheGreenShot deployed its solution on 14 co-productions in 2022, saving 50 Tons CO2.  With a team growth from 4 to 21 in 18 months, and a marketing presence in Europe, UK, US, Canada and New Zealand.
SDG’s of application: SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: High power and fast-charging sodium-ion cells for electric vehicles
Identification: Tiamat's Na-ion power battery cell is responding to unsatisfied power needs thanks to its unique and patented Na-based active raw material. Offering superior safety compared to reference technologies, Tiamat's battery cell is also offering a long cycle life. These features allow (for example) automotive makers to reach CO2 emission targets by hybridising their Internal Combustion Engine vehicles with low voltage cost effective solutions. Using Tiamat's Na-ion cell allows better CO2 reductions by taking advantage of the unmatched high power offered by this technology. Finally, using a widely available raw material in Europe cuts the need to use rare earth minerals mined and shipped from many thousands of miles away, not only reducing emissions but increasing resource security.
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Partners
Tags: Electric, Batteries - energy storage, Electronic waste, Lithium
Sectors: Energy, Industry/Goods, Mobility, Vehicles and vessels, Power and fuel distributionEnergy storage, Energy and fuel efficiency
The environmental benefits: Using Tiamat's Na-ion cells in a 48V automotive MHEV battery pack can save 2 million tonnes CO2 a year, compared to mainstream alternative;Doesn't require Lithium, Cobalt or Nickel to be extracted;In a Mild Hybrid Electric Vehicle, this Solution delivers a reduction of 10% of petrol consumption compared to the mainstream alternative;Raw materials refined in Europe close to cell manufacturing, avoiding the need for shipping and processing of raw materials from thousands of miles away;
The Financial benefits: An automotive MHEV 48 battery pack is 1.5 times cheaper than the mainstream alternative;No additional CAPEX needed to produce Tiamat's Na-ion cell in an existing Li-ion Gigafactory;
Complementary solutions: SeaZen: A 100% autonomous solar boating service with license free self-service access (Mobility);ANTISMOG: An on-demand hydrogen fuel enhancement system for the reduction of air pollution from vehicles (Freight,Mobility);WeNow: A plug-and-play system for the driver to act for the climate now (Freight,Mobility);Heat recovery system: Low temperature heating of premises by recycling waste heat from refrigeration systems (Energy,Buildings & Shelters);
Organization short description: Tiamat designs, develops and manufactures sodium-ion batteries for mobility and stationary energy storage. Stable, simple, safe, fast and performing solution.
About:
Founded in 2017 in Amiens (France), Tiamat is based on almost 10 years of academic research carried out by some research units of the CNRS and the university working together within the RS2E, such as the Collège de France in Paris, the LRCS in Amiens, the CIRIMAT in Toulouse, the ICMCB in Bordeaux and the CSIC in Barcelona.



Unlike other Na-ion batteries and due to its specific chemistry on positive and negative electrodes, Tiamat cell is designed for high power (30+ C in discharge and in charge) and ultrafast charge (5 min).



Tiamat technology finds its major applications in mobility (48V MHEV, 12V SLI, fast-charge ebus..) and stationary storage (grid frequency regulation), where high power needs are not satisfied by reference technologies.



In addition to weight reduction due to inferior cell quantity needed, Tiamat Na-ion offers cost pack advantages vs Li-ion based power & fast charge batteries, as its low self-heating allows to avoid pack cooling needs. Moreover, as far as safety is concerned, fire risks are dramatically decreased due to chemistry nature, and the possibility to store the cell at Zero Volt.



Its widely available raw materials makes the Na-ion cells best choice with respect to Environment concerns, societal and ethics topics, and strategic supplies.



Finally, Tiamat Na-ion’s superior life cycle (4000+ high rate cycles) makes it attractive when total cost of ownership (TCO) is considered.

Solution on-sentence summary: An air-water heat pump that significantly cuts lifetime emissions in the building sector
Identification:
NovaAir provides a sustainable, energy-efficient and easily integrable heating system for private households as well as commercial buildings, that is economically superior over the course of its lifetime.



By allowing the NovaAir to run on the natural refrigerant propane instead of widespread synthetic refrigerants, its emissions are up to 700 times lower than those of refrigerants in conventional heat pumps. When compared to a Single Family Home running on gas or oil heating, 3500-4500 kg CO2-equivalents can be saved annually. Meanwhile, annual operating costs are halved, which drastically lowers costs during the estimated 30 year lifetime.



The gain in energy efficiency stems from an intricate design made in Switzerland in combination with a digital platform, that allows for continuous optimization and seamless integration with solar panels and features of the “Smart Home”. The transmission of relevant data on machine health allows for faster and cheaper maintenance of the heat pump.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Electric, Heat-pump, Building heating, Smart-buildings

The Financial benefits: The NovaAir has excellent synergies with solar panels and can utilize spare energy that would otherwise be fed back into the power grid at zero return;The NovaAir can operate at half to a third (when integrated with solar panels) the annual costs of an oil heating system (over its 20 year lifetime savings can amount to 32’000 CHF);At low energy & maintenance costs, the NovaAir is more economic than gas heating systems by the 5th year, after 7 years oil heating systems are left behind.;

Solution on-sentence summary: In-line autonomous sensor to survey potable water delivered to people in distribution pipes
Identification:
The I-CENSE is a probe for real-time monitoring of drinking water quality inside distribution pipes.

The probe is directly inserted inside the pipe and measures chlorine, turbidity, conductivity, temperature, flow and pressure. It transmits the information through radio communication (4G LTE, NB IoT) to a supervisor. It creates a network to survey the complete water distribution pipe of a city. Fully energy independent and interconnected, it is mainly used for securing the supply of drinking water but can also be used for many other applications.

The main fields of application are securing the supply of drinking water, disinfection control, microbiological contamination monitoring, compartmentalization of leakage flows and asset management

Solution on-sentence summary: A modular and patented anaerobic digestion bioreactor to treat bio-waste
Identification:
BioRenGaz has developed a new patented anaerobic digestion technology that is 4 times more efficient and much more compact than conventional biogas plants thanks to vertical silo design. The anaerobic filter uses a recycled and 100% renewable packing material to replace costly and polluting plastic packing.

This medium provides an ecological habitat for the bacteria and enhances their performance. The solution is adapted for the treatment of liquid effluents and the great advantage, unlike other technologies, is that it can also valorize pulpy effluents like biowaste pulp.

The bioreactors have lower operational costs and increased energy production by keeping the micro-organisms on the packing material, which allows producing 10% more biogas.

The system is modular, so bioreactors can be built from a small scale and easily be expanded as needed.

The Solution aims for the optimization of the economic and environmental model of energy and agronomic recovery of biowaste.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners
Tags: Biobased, Biodegradable, Compostable, Biogas & biomethane, Composting, Methane
Sectors: Waste/Pollution, Power and fuel generation, Solid waste management

Solution on-sentence summary: A renewable energy storage solution working as a giant water battery that enables the energy transition
Identification:
Pumped hydro storage plants store energy using a system of two interconnected reservoirs with one at a higher elevation than the other. Water is pumped to the upper reservoir in times of surplus energy and, in times of excess demand, water from the upper reservoir is released, generating electricity as the water passes through reversible turbines on its way to the lower reservoir.

Hydropower can play a defining role in the energy transition thanks to the balancing and system services to the grid that facilitate the integration of variable renewables.

With higher needs for storage and grid support services, Pumped Hydro Storage is the natural large-scale energy storage solution. It provides all services from reactive power support to frequency control, synchronous or virtual inertia and black-start capabilities. It brings support that was previously managed by fossil-fueled power plants but with even more reactivity and in a sustainable manner without CO2 emissions.
Looking For: Visibility
Tags: Batteries - energy storage, Electrical grid, Hydropower
The environmental benefits: Capabilities from milliseconds reactivity to weeks of storage capacity: Can provide flexibility at all timescales, in both directions (producing or absorbing extra energy);Pumped Hydro Storage capacity is 100 times higher than that of any available battery solution;With total installed storage capacity of 9000 GWh delivering short-medium-and long-term storage, PHS accounts for over 90% of storage capacity and stored energy in grid scale applications globally;By reducing reliance on fossil fuels, hydropower avoids up to four billion tons of additional Greenhouse Gas emissions being emitted annually;Hydropower has very low mineral requirements compared to other sources (accounting for only 2% of copper needs by 2040 - IEA) and does not use Rare Earth Elements (REEs) ;
The Financial benefits: The most cost-effective large scale long duration energy storage solution;Highest energy payback (energy produced/stored over lifetime versus energy required for construction): 8 to 30 times more than any other storage solution;With low operational costs (~ 1.5% of the investment cost per kW) because they do not require fuel, existing reservoir hydropower plants are the least costly source of energy storage in many markets;

Solution on-sentence summary: An artificial intelligence platform that gives maritime actors predictive analyses
Identification: Sinay proposes a Port Digital Hub, a unique tool for holistic data-driven port automation and environment management. Two specific services are targeted: predictions of ship time arrival (PTA), and of water pollution parameters. The combination of such two services is the best approach to deliver a solution addressing compelling challenges for the Port and Shipping industries (PTA). PTA is a key parameter on which a vast range of port management processes depends, including dock occupation planning or vessel traffic management. Further, the prediction of water quality parameters has a double use. First, assessing the environmental quality and anticipating pollution events; second, the calculations of water quality parameters share many input data with the calculation of PTAs. The rationale is therefore to acquire data from space and sea-borne technologies, to apply advanced AI algorithms, and to industrialize web-based services aiming at digitalizing Port logistics and environmental management processes.
Looking For: Funding, Partners, Network, New clients, Visibility
Tags: Cargo ships, Algorithms & AI, Route optimization, Maritime shipping, Software
The environmental benefits: CO2 emission decrease by 10%;Avoids 370 pollution events per year/port;Vessel waiting time decrease by 20%;
The Financial benefits: Approximatively 380k€ /year of cost savings in data analysis;Reduce downtime to 0 ;80% of Estimated Time of Arrival predictions more precise than existing ETA;
Complementary solutions: innovative telemetry unit: Simple remote monitoring solution for oil and gas tanks (Freight);K-Ryole: Electric bike trailers for urban freight (Freight);5C: Cryo-City for Cleaner Cold Chain: A cryogenic solution for last mile transportation in cities (Freight);HydroSil: A unique liquid carrier facilitating the transport and storage of hydrogen (Energy,Freight);
Organization short description: A unique digital platform that collects, aggregates and analyses all complex maritime data in one place.
About:
Sinay is a tech start-up that helps maritime-based businesses around the world to manage data related to operations and environmental impacts. Sinay benefits from an experience in collecting and analyzing maritime data to use the most relevant outputs.



The Sinay Hub is a single platform dedicated to maritime industries where data are gathered and transformed thanks to advanced AI technologies to create key indicators.Those key indicators are grouped into modules that solve major problems. Each module tailors a specific environmental issue such as air quality, water quality, aerial noise, underwater acoustics, sealife but also logistic issues such as route optimization, route planning, ETA prediction or CO2 reduction. It creates a real-time situational awareness and consequently help the maritime industries to make the right decisions, to drive more efficiency and easily comply with regulations.  



We love the data, We love the Ocean, We connect both.

Solution on-sentence summary: A system which converts waste heat from burning processes into electricity and improves energy efficiency in industry
Identification:
More than 50% of global energy consumption is lost as heat. Despite this considerable source of savings, few concrete recovery achievements have been made due to the cost and complexity of current technologies. Improving energy efficiency in industry is a major challenge for the economy and the most effective solution to meet the commitments to reduce GHG.



Our innovative solution produces electricity from burning processes waste heat. It works with fumes temperatures above 300°C in order to generate a power range from 25kWe to 1 MWe. The system is working with a mixture of vegetable oil and vapor which is propelled at high velocity onto a turbine. Coupled to an alternator, it enables to produce electricity. This electricity can be re-used by the customer for its own consumption or reinjected into the grid.



Our solution is robust, green and will cut by twice the return of investment compared to competitive technologies.

About:
Hevatech is an innovative start-up created in 2010. It mainly develops a waste heat recovery system called Turbosol based on a disruptive process which convert heat into electricity. 



Our system is simple, robust and easy to install and operate. Therefore in comparison with competing technologies, the device’s payback period is cut by half.

Moreover our product is completely transparent for the industrial processes since no modification is required in the installation. The system only requires an access to exhaust fumes to install heat exchangers.



This system is applicable for every industry which requires high temperature  processes such as waste or sewage incinerator, heavy industries (cement or glass factory, metal processing plant) and power generator.

Solution on-sentence summary: A biostimulant to improve plant development by enhancing nutrient uptake and utilization.
Identification: Crops are threatened by climate change, while the world population, and therefore the demand for agricultural products, is still growing. Consequently, innovative solutions are required to improve the current agricultural model and move towards sustainable and efficient agriculture. Activ'Nutrition is a biostimulant that reveals plant genetic potential. Indeed, without genetic modification, it allows an improvement in plant physiology and development thanks to the improvement in nutrients uptake and use. Therefore, cultures have more energy and resources to their growth and development, which allows an improvment of the potential yield. Crops have also more resources to protect themselves to different stresses like hydric stess, and to restart their growth after the stress period.

About:
Axioma is the first European company to benefit approvals for biostimulants which their active ingredients came from vegetal extractions. The biostimulants MA (Market authorization) ensure the efficiency and the safety of inputs, from phytosanitary products to biostimulants.

Our remarkable biosolutions performances are the result of the combination of two technologies : the industrial vegetal extraction of active substances AOE (Axioma’s Organic Extraction), and the BAM (Bio’Activating Mix), a complex of active ingredients with biostimulant effects for crops and biocontrol effects for farm animals. 

In our circular economy, we source every raw material in taking into account ecosystems balance and resources sustainability.

Our technologies come from applied research, from the field to the laboratory. We are thus able to take into consideration all the real constraints of the ground from conception. These benefits help  to improve economic and environmental performances, giving to professionals the opportunity to have a better production with a more sustainable and efficient model.
SDG’s of application: SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: Clinker-free geopolymer concrete technology to decarbonize the construction industry
Identification:
CEMEX Vertua®  is a range of low carbon concrete products: Vertua Ultra Zero, Vertua Plus and Vertua Classic. The Vertua product line has been designed to enable embodied carbon reductions allowing customers to meet their construction needs. Vertua was launched in 2020 and its products have already been used for large infrastructure projects in Europe and show high acceptance in Mexico, the United States, and South America.

This solution is focused on Vertua Ultra Zero, a net-zero CO2 concrete made as a result of an innovative solution created by CEMEX´s Research and Development Center. Vertua Ultra Zero is a geopolymer clinker-free concrete with a substantial CO2 reduction versus standard concrete manufactured with CEM I cement type. The embodied carbon reduction achieved from this material is up to 70%. The remaining 30% footprint is neutralized through carbon offsetting efforts.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility
Tags: Concrete, Construction, Concrete alternatives, Construction materials, Green building
The environmental benefits: Up to 70% CO2 reduction versus standard concrete (with CEM I) and net-zero strategy by offsetting remaining 30%; Carbon Neutral certificate provided by a third party through the use of high quality instruments that meet the requirements of the Carbon Neutral Protocol;Can be fully recycled at the end of its life;
The Financial benefits: Allows customers to obtain higher scores in Green Building Certification Systems such as LEED and BREEAM;Enables customers to bid for low carbon construction projects; Use of low carbon materials facilitates investment from ethical investors.;
Complementary solutions: SopraStar: Reducing urban warming by using solar reflective cool roof membrane (Buildings & Shelters);IPSIIS : Insulation based on mineral foam for better energy conservation (Buildings & Shelters,Waste & Pollution);Sopratec III: Energy efficient building airtightness system (Buildings & Shelters);Pavatex: 100% bio-sourced energy-efficient thermal insulation of buildings (Buildings & Shelters,Waste & Pollution);
Organization short description: CEMEX is a global building materials company providing high-quality products and reliable services around the world.
Headquarters: Valle de Santa Engracia, 66268 San Pedro Garza García, N.L., Mexico
About:
CEMEX is a global building materials company that provides high-quality products and reliable services to customers and communities around the world. Our operations network produces, distributes, and markets cement, ready-mix concrete, aggregates, and related building materials, services, and solutions. 

Climate change represents one of the biggest challenges of our time, and its mitigation has been a priority for our company for many years. In 2020, CEMEX announced its Climate Action strategy, defining a global target of a 35% reduction of CO2 emissions per ton of cementitious products by 2030. For its operations in Europe, CEMEX also defined a 55% reduction target, in line with what the European Commission set as a new goal for all its member states.

We have an externally validated CO2 Reduction Roadmap to meet our 2030 goal. This roadmap assesses the carbon mitigation potential that can be seized across each of our cement manufacturing sites, taking into consideration local challenges, regulations, materials supply, technical limitations, and market dynamics, among other decisive factors.

To complement this strategy with a longer-term vision, CEMEX also established an ambition to deliver Net-Zero CO2 concrete to all its customers globally by 2050. These targets are aligned with the International Energy Agency’s roadmap to reducing CO2 emissions and what is expected from the cement industry to contribute to the Paris Agreement.

At CEMEX, we support the urgency of collective action to achieve compliance with the Paris Agreement commitments and the fulfillment of the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals on climate action.
SDG’s of application: SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: Smart bi axis photovoltaic tracker for self-consumption for professional sites, individuals and agrivoltaic power plant
Identification:
Smart photovoltaic trackers allow professionals and individuals to self-consume their renewable energy production at a more competitive rate than that of the electricity grid and therefore escape the constant rise in the cost of energy.

Like a sunflower, smart photovoltaic trackers follow the sun's course and produce 70% more energy than a fixed photovoltaic installation. Their mobile shadow protects crops and grassland biodiversity from too much sun irradiation and allows farmers to improve crop yields while producing renewable energy
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Partners, Credibility
Target client profile: Individual, Public Authorities, BusinessFarming & AgricultureCrops, BusinessFarming & AgricultureLivestock & Dairy
Tags: Agrivoltaics, Solar photovoltaic
The environmental benefits: 70% more energy than fixed photovoltaic installations ;Energy production greater than 80% of nominal from sunrise to sunset;50% reduction in the carbon footprint per kWh produced compared to fixed photovoltaic installations;Reduction and stabilization of the energy bill by 20 to 50%;
The Financial benefits: Less than 10 years of payback time compared to 15 years for fixed photovoltaic installations;
Complementary solutions: Renewable gas for industrial burners: Decentralized renewable solutions for process heat in industrial processes (Industry & Consumer Goods,Energy);Stirling Engine: Stirling engine modules to generate clean electricity from waste heat locally (Energy,Industry & Consumer Goods);SEAB Energy - Flexibuster: A small-scale modular container for transforming organic waste into energy (Energy,Waste & Pollution,Food & Agriculture);PowerCorner: Mini-grids for affordable, reliable, sustainable energy-services for rural and off-grid populations (Energy);
Organization short description: Our photovoltaic trackers produce 70% more than fixed installations and are compatible with agrivoltaics
About: The biaxial photovoltaic trackers designed by the OKWind Group follow the path of the sun like a sunflower and produce 70% more than the fixed equivalent. They allow our customers to consume their renewable energy production at a competitive rate, without suffering from cost increases and without mobilising public subsidies. They consist of a set of photovoltaic panels of 117 m² mounted on a 7 m high mast. Their very small footprint allows them to be easily installed on agricultural land (1500 in operation to date on farms). A genuine land development tool, our trackers allow energy to be produced and therefore generate value in diffuse areas without having to reinforce the distribution networks. Connected in real time with the French weather forecasting databases, remotely controlled and monitored, they have recently been coupled with an AI-based energy management system that allows them to cover 50 to 70% of the self-consumption needs of professional sites while reducing their consumption by 10 to 20% (water treatment plants, industrial sites with positive cooling, etc.). An agrivoltaic tracked power plant of 10 trackers (installed power 220 kWp equivalent 375 kWp fixed) is easily connectable to the low voltage network, can be implanted on constrained terrain (mountainous area) and has an excellent landscape integration with a free and evolving use of the surfaces under the trackers.
SDG’s of application: SDG 6 - Clean water and sanitation, SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: A repairable electric battery that uses solder-less design to reduce CO2 footprint of e-bikes
Identification: Non-replaceable batteries are bad news for the environment and consumers. Most batteries in today’s products cannot be easily removed, replaced, or repaired. 80% of cells in a classical lithium-ion battery found in the trash are functional. The global demand capacity for batteries is projected to increase in the next decade: up to 60% for batteries in consumer electronics and 15% for LEV (Light electric vehicles) by 2030. Gouach is producing in France a battery for LEV that is repairable in less than 10 minutes, as reliable and powerful as the market leaders, but eco-friendly. The solution uses a solder-less design so that the battery electronics and cells can be changed easily, with no risk and without damage to the cells. This allows for an increase in the battery longevity and a substantial reduction of the battery's CO2 footprint. Gouach aims at providing a sustainable, repairable, and eco-friendly battery for fleet sharing, delivery fleet, and electric vehicles manufacturers
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Funding, Network, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Electric, Recycled, Landfill, Batteries - energy storage, Lithium, Biking, Reduce & prevent waste, Recycle waste
The environmental benefits: 80% of cells in a classical lithium ion battery found in the trash are functional;Consumes 2,5 times less water than a regular battery;Emits 2,5 times less fine particles than a regular battery;A deployment of 10,000 Gouach batteries could prevent 20 TCO2eq of emissions;
The Financial benefits: Repairing a Gouach battery costs 5-10€, compared to 200€ when replacing complete battery;The total cost of ownership TCO is reduced by 50%;
Complementary solutions: EP Tender: A range extending service for electric vehicles (Mobility);AEROPAK G: Ultralight fuel cells and hydrogen energy storage for electric-powered aircraft (Industry & Consumer Goods,Mobility);Atawheel: Zero emission mobility based on hydrogen energy storage and water electrolysis technology (Infrastructures,Mobility);Stor-H: Connected and innovative hydrogen cartridge for light urban mobility (Mobility,Energy);
Organization short description: Gouach is manufacturing the first repairable and renewable electric battery, cutting down costs and CO2 emissions
About:
Our study on hundreds of small scale lithium-batteries showed us that 80% of the lithium-ion cells are actually discarded while they are perfectly functional. This waste is due to the fact current lithium-ion batteries cannot be repaired due to their fabrication process.



We designed and patented a battery with no soldering, no paste and no wires, which makes it easy and convenient to service and repair in a few minutes. The consequences are :



- an increased lifetime, and thus a reduced cost of operation for the user

- a reduced ecological impact as individual lithium-cells can be changed throughout the battery life (about 70% less carbon emission)

- a much improved battery, with electronics offering new functionalities like bluetooth connectivity, data collection, long-life mode, etc, that would have been too expensive for current disposable batteries
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: Glass wool insulation roll with low thermal conductivity (lambda 030) & bio-based binder, for renovating buildings
Identification: SWISSROLL 030 is the world first glass wool insulation roll with a very low thermal conductivity (lambda 0,030). It is aiming to be the best insulation solution for renovation, thanks to its high thermal and acoustic performance, incombustibility, recyclability, and low environmental impact. It is manufactured with more than 80% of recycled glass, and a bio-based binder. The production is made locally, with local hydroelectric power and CO2 neutral gas. The exceptionally low thermal conductivity allows to save valuable thermal energy and use less material (thinner insulation) for thermal protection. The self-supporting roll shape allows for an easy and quick installation. The flexibility of glass wool guarantees an excellent thermal protection even in buildings with irregularities and requiring a lot of adaptations (e.g. passage of pipes). Glass wool is incombustible by nature which ensures additional safety for building occupants. The bio-binder use certifies very low VOC emissions

Identification: Feedgy analytics' mission statement is to promote green, sustainable, and competitive energy through innovation. Its goal is to put solar energy at the center of tomorrow's energy model. The team wants to give each owner of a photovoltaic plant the necessary decision support tools to make them players in the energy market.
