Solution on-sentence summary: Drilling for natural hydrogen
Identification: Natural hydrogen is a newly discovered geological source of sustainable and non-fossil energy. It is generated by a natural geochemical process deep inside the Earth'crust, making it a sustainable and inexhaustible source. Natural Hydrogen is still a little-known source of energy but some projects are already set-up and produce natural hydrogen in industrial quantities. It is the cheapest solution to produce carbon-neutral hydrogen and is competitive with fossil fuels. Its value chain is similar to natural gas production. It includes prospection, selection of sites, drilling, extraction and separation of products. It is important to note that environmental protection is a top priority for the implementation of the Solution, which is why Natural hydrogen does not require using controversial techniques like hydraulic fracturing.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Funding, Partners
Tags: Hydrogen, Gaseous waste capture, Drilling and extraction
The environmental benefits: Extraction and use of every kilogram of natural hydrogen prevents emissions of 7.7 kilograms of carbon dioxide;Natural hydrogen is expected to be cheaper than the current cheapest hydrogen (which is around $2/kg), produced by the process called steam methane reforming;Hydrogen is constantly generated in the Earth's depths and the current estimates of the flux give 23 million ton of H2 per year from all geological sources combined;99% reduction of carbon emissions resulting from manufacturing hydrogen;100% reduction of particle and NOx emissions resulting from use of fossil fuels;
The Financial benefits: 33% cheaper than cheapest hydrogen from fossil fuels;2 times cheaper than cheapest green hydrogen;
Complementary solutions: Renewable gas for industrial burners: Decentralized renewable solutions for process heat in industrial processes (Industry & Consumer Goods,Energy);Stirling Engine: Stirling engine modules to generate clean electricity from waste heat locally (Energy,Industry & Consumer Goods);SEAB Energy - Flexibuster: A small-scale modular container for transforming organic waste into energy (Energy,Waste & Pollution,Food & Agriculture);PowerCorner: Mini-grids for affordable, reliable, sustainable energy-services for rural and off-grid populations (Energy);
Organization short description: Exploring for sustainable energy provided by natural hydrogen from newly discovered geological sources.
About:
Free hydrogen has long thought to be rare on Earth... until recently.

Several years ago, geologists from our Team predicted and then discovered a new, previously unknown natural phenomenon: many places on the Earth’s crust seep significant quantities of hydrogen gas (H2). 

The presence of naturally occurring H2 was not recognized before because it is odorless, invisible, tasteless, non-toxic, and most importantly, a very diffusive gas. Natural (geologic) hydrogen is non-fossil resource, meaning its use will not generate any pollution. It can reduce the carbon and pollution footprint of the transportation and chemical industry: hydrogen is the most energy-rich gas and is now considered to be a viable replacement for fossil fuels. Currently, the most common processes used for hydrogen generation require the decomposition of natural gas or electrolysis of water. Such methods produce undesirable by-products and require considerable expense. Therefore, there is a real need for an inexpensive, clean, and sustainable hydrogen source.

Moreover, helium in commercial concentrations is often associated with hydrogen. It is a valuable, but very scarce resource and its reserves are limited. Demand is growing faster than current supply.



To explore for this new natural resource, Natural Hydrogen Energy LLC, was formed in the United States. Members of our international Team are geologists and chemists. All Team members are highly qualified, have advanced scientific degrees, and have spent many years in hydrogen research. We have extensive knowledge of natural hydrogen and lots of "know-how". Combined, the Team has more than eighty-years of experience and are constantly expanding our knowledge in ongoing research collaborations with leading institutions and organizations. To assure competence in our exploration, we use the services of experts in drilling and gas production, who share our high regard for environmental protection.



After several years of intensive research, our Team selected and obtained mineral leases over our most promising geological sites. The first drilling in the USA was successfully completed by our company in 2019. The results show that extraction of hydrogen and helium gases is possible.
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: A platform for designing and implementing sustainable smart mobility programs
Identification: Sharo's mission is to revolutionize the way people commute. The Solution helps companies, districts and institutions get commuters in and out of the office safely and efficiently while improving their wellbeing, productivity, and the environment. Sharo Smart Commute platform enables organisations and districts to pinpoint hotspot locations and routes so they can plan, setup and monitor safe and sustainable mobility options easily accessible through the Sharo app. These include shuttle buses, carpooling, micro-mobility and more. With COVID-19 it is more important than ever to guarantee everyone has a safe commute by controlling distancing & capacity, validating IDs and tracking who travels together to enable automatic contact tracing where necessary.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: New clients, Funding, Partners
Tags: Route optimization, Software, Carpooling & carsharing, Public transport, Corporate & Employees, Planning tool
Sectors: Mobility, Project planning, Energy and fuel efficiency
The environmental benefits: 31% reduction of CO2 emissions equivalent to 228 tons / year;30% reduction of KM travelled equivalent to 1.6 million KMs / year;
The Financial benefits: Less than 12 months payback time ;Expected savings of up to 16% in terms of recruitment & retention, productivity loss and parking costs;

Organization short description: Our software helps organisations improve their people's commute with smart and sustainable mobility solutions.
Headquarters: 4/5 Burton Hall Rd, Sandyford, Dublin, D18 A094, Ireland
About: Our enterprise smart mobility platform enables cities, companies or universities to analyse and improve the mobility of their communities of residents, employees or students. It helps our customers identify problem areas where people have trouble commuting and implement sustainable travel modes that will reduce local traffic and CO2 emissions. Organisations and institutions can provide access to and incentivise the use of a variety of smart mobility options all available through our Sharo app. These may include carpooling, shuttle buses, vehicle sharing services (e.g. bikes, scooters, cars and vans) and public transport through partnerships and integration with local mobility providers.
SDG’s of application: SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities

Solution on-sentence summary: An energy-efficient and user-friendly system for efficient heating management
Identification: Snugr will help users to feel more comfortable and save money by setting the right temperature, at the right time, in each room with an easy-to-use heating management system and devices. Snugr is a set of heating equipment (battery-less connected radiator valves, aerotherms and boiler controllers...) that is compatible with most heating systems without heavy works, combined with an easy to use web-based solution enabling room-by-room temperature control and heating schedules. Snugr increases the comfort and make it possible to reduce heating consumption in private and public buildings.

Organization short description: 4INCH is a belgian company behind Snugr, heating management system allowing room by room temperature remote control.
About:
4INCH is a Belgian company that firmly believes new technologies can be used for more than gadgets and luxury products. We believe they can make everyday life more pleasant for everyone and have a positive impact on the environment.



Snugr our heating management system, is used by facility managers and building owners who want to increase the comfort in their buildings while cutting energy consumption. From a smartphone, tablet or computer anywhere in the world, users can easily instruct Snugr to adjust the temperature and create a heating schedule for each room.



Our solution uses the Seebeck effect in order to harvest the required energy to remotely manage heaters, removing the need for wiring or batteries, making Snugr the ideal solution for energy-efficient renovation of existing buildings.

Solution on-sentence summary: Low-cost electricity from an autonomous patented wing drone connected to a ground generator
Identification:
Seeking to meet the EU climate change targets, we will need to at least double the electricity generated from renewables by 2030. Wind power is our second largest energy resource after solar power.  Wind resources could provide 1,800 TW to 3,600 TW of energy, 100X more than the current global demand for power. However, most of this wind is at high altitudes.



Skypull is developing an efficient, reliable and scalable high altitude wind energy system, that consists of an autonomous vertical take-off and landing (VTOL) drone tethered to a ground generator. The drone, operating between 200 and 600 meter elevation, captures much stronger winds compared to traditional wind turbines, enabling the production of abundant low cost electricity potentially in almost any location around the globe. Skypull has a much lower environmental impact versus traditional fossil fuel based electricity generation systems, and also versus traditional wind turbines, by eliminating 90% of their mass and providing for ease of transportation and logistics, with substantially reduced CO2 emissions during its lifecycle. The worldwide patented system is completely safe, thanks to its operational principles and redundant technical solutions.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Off-grid, Drones, Wind power
The environmental benefits: The Skypull 1 MW system energy production is double of a same rated power wind turbine, installed in the same location;The Skypull 1 MW system overall mass (including foundation) is around 60t, vs. approximately 2,000 t of a wind turbine of comparable capacity;The Levelized Cost of Energy (LCoE) of the system ranges between 30-40 $/MWh, allowing it to compete with all fossil fuel based technologies without public incentives ;A Skypull system reduces 99% CO2 emissions (less than 1 g vs 820 g CO2/KWh), when replacing a coal fired power station;Its environmental impact reduces 90% CO2 (less than 1g vs. 13 g/kWh) versus traditional wind turbines, due to much lower energy demand during manufacturing;The drone is 7 times smaller in size compared to a traditional wind turbine rotor, and operates at 200-600 meter altitude, reducing the visual impact by 90%;
The Financial benefits: The Levelized Cost of Energy (LCoE) for a 1MW Skypull system will be 30% less than traditional wind turbines in low wind site locations (6 m/sec avg. annual wind speed);Energy Return on Energy Investment (ERoEI) of Skypull's 1 MW system is expected to be above 150, a value that can grant a new era of economic and social development around the world;One 1 MW Skypull system will produce enough energy to provide sustainable clean and renewable power to 1,100 homes at near zero CO2 emissions over its lifecycle;
Complementary solutions: Renewable gas for industrial burners: Decentralized renewable solutions for process heat in industrial processes (Industry & Consumer Goods,Energy);Stirling Engine: Stirling engine modules to generate clean electricity from waste heat locally (Energy,Industry & Consumer Goods);SEAB Energy - Flexibuster: A small-scale modular container for transforming organic waste into energy (Energy,Waste & Pollution,Food & Agriculture);PowerCorner: Mini-grids for affordable, reliable, sustainable energy-services for rural and off-grid populations (Energy);
Organization short description: Globally scalable airborne wind energy for affordable renewable energy, at a lower cost than from fossil fuels !
About: Skypull is developing an airborne wind energy system with ground-based generator. With 95% less materials than used for building wind turbines, but with double their production capacity it will produce renewable energy at lowest cost… lower than from fossil fuels! The Skypull fully autonomous hybrid drone is capable of vertical take-off and landing and flies like a kite in more powerful winds at higher altitudes, pulling on a tether connected to the generator to generate electricity. A reduced scale prototype is already operational and further development incorporates scalability of production, to allow acceleration of the buildup of affordable renewable energy for combatting climate change.
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy

Solution on-sentence summary: A process that transforms used plastic bottles into new apparel
Identification: The Solution is represented by the production of clothing apparel and accessories (i.e. bags) in polyester recycled from used plastic bottles. The Solution aims at providing a circular production process where new products are created from waste. The objective is to manage a close loop where both the collection of plastic waste and the production of apparel occur in the same country/location hence creating a complete circular economy. Pielleitalia has developed a certified supply chain The Solution allows the re-use of waste to generate products with the same quality and characteristics as the non-recycled alternative. In this way, large amounts of CO2 emissions are saved and this would have a positive impact on people and the environment.

Solution on-sentence summary: A semi-submersible floating system providing access to offshore winds in deep maritime areas
Identification: STAR is a semi-submersible floating system for floating offshore wind. Floating offshore wind turbines harness the energy of offshore winds in deep maritime areas farther from the coast, which are powerful and constant. Unlike fixed-foundation wind turbines that are supported by a base, which is directly set on the seabed using a gravity foundation, this Solution is based on a floating structure in concrete, steel or a steel/concrete hybrid combination fixed to the seabed by an anchoring system that controls its movements. Compared to fixed-foundation wind turbines, this innovative technology overcomes the constraints of deep-water installation and is able to produce renewable energy farther from the coast with a low visual impact. The Solution is designed to be competitive, produced in series and easily operated. It can be adapted to the specificities of the operating site and local industrial ecosystems.
Looking For: New clients
Tags: Coastal, Offshore wind power, Wind power
Sectors: Energy, Infrastructures, Manufacturing and construction processes

Solution on-sentence summary: Optimal route for electric vehicles and fleets including vehicle charging
Identification: The EV for All Solution by Make My Day uses unique data and technology to help B2B customers reduce costs and emissions in the largest growth market in the automotive industry. The Solution provides the optimal route for EV drivers and fleets, including vehicle charging, by using a unique decision-making algorithm which combines data about the driver's calendar, the fleet's CRM, the battery status of the EV, and the charging stations in the areas. Combining all this data in real-time creates the optimal route and plan, both for drivers and fleets including the charging.

Organization short description: We optimize and manage EV charging for EV fleets and drivers, helping our customers to reduce costs and CO2
Headquarters: Dvora HaNevi'a St 119, Tel Aviv-Yafo, 6944038, Israel
About:
We optimize and manage EV charging for EV fleets and drivers

By using unique data and technology – we help our B2B customers to reduce costs and Co2/carbon in the largest growth market in the automotive industry.

Consequently, the EV driver and the EV fleet manager requires a comprehensive solution to manage the charging task; primarily from the point of view of minimizing this time consuming task by his drivers, while enabling them to achieve their daily objectives without too many limitation; and additionally to reduce as much as possible the total cost of ownership of maintaining an EV fleet including minimizing the required time of fast charging. 



Product and Technology

Make My Day solution is providing the optimal route for the EV drivers including vehicle charging.

We are achieving this, using smart technology, by:

-	Connecting to the fleet calendar/ CRM and understanding the daily needs of drivers and fleets.

-	Connecting to the EV itself and retrieving key data of the battery status in real time.

-	Collecting and using important data concerning the location of the driver and charging stations, and any impediments on his route.



Then, we are combining all this data in real time by our unique proprietary algorithm which creates the optimal route for both drivers and fleets and a recommendation for optimal fast charging time. 



We are working in a B2B business model and currently have active projects and revenues with energy, automotive and fleets corporations across Europe- such as Centrica in the UK, Enel X in Italy, Lafargeholcim ,BP and more
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities

Solution on-sentence summary: Intelligent robotics system able to sort different waste streams into colored bags
Identification: Waste Robotics offers systems, which did not exist 4 or 5 years ago, and makes it possible to compete with an increase of performance and economies over Capex and Opex. Technological advances in recent years have made it possible to put artificial intelligence and robotics at the service of the environment at more affordable costs. The Waste Robotics system uses cutting-edge alternative technology that has more capacity than human sorters. Waste Robotic offers an avant-garde process which makes possible the selective collection of different types of residual materials (and namely organics) by the use of separate bags of different colours, using Waste Robotic's optical sorting. This allows a single picking of residual garbage and organics and promotes maximum citizen participation while ensuring optimum quality in sorting materials. Thanks to its simplicity, Unicollecte is convenient and cheaper than traditional "brown" or "green" collection bin, while reducing trucking and GHG emission.

Solution on-sentence summary: An autonomous solar tower engineered to provide uninterrupted operation of mission-critical devices
Identification: The Monolith represents the new generation of multifunctional solar towers on the market. Its innovative design allows it to maximize its energy production and storage capacity. The specially designed solar panels use the latest technology solar cells. In addition, its patented structure provides enough storage space for high-capacity batteries. Because of the tower’s vertical design, this product requires very little maintenance. The elements, like the wind and rain, naturally clean the outside surfaces without the need for human intervention. Furthermore, the panels’ positions allow for efficient energy production throughout the day, from dawn till dusk. Finally, its numerous mounting plates let you connect many devices from different technologies. Whether it be surveillance cameras, antennas, weather stations, lights or emergency telephone devices, the Monolith is ready to take them on and ensure their uninterrupted operation.

Organization short description: Soluxium Technologies is a young company driven by its desire to offer innovative and creative energy solutions.
About:
Looking at the world around us is a constant reminder that technology evolves quickly and brings us many great benefits. But the thing with technology is that it requires electricity, and electricity requires expensive infrastructures.



We strongly believe that everyone should have access to, and benefit from; basic electricity, communication and security services. In the pursuit of that ideal, we have brought together creative and engineering minds that worked relentlessly to allow these technologies to become more accessible, without the deployment of infrastructures.



We, at Soluxium Technologies, dream of the future and create solutions.
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities

Solution on-sentence summary: Enabling real time computing with edge computing
Identification: ObjectBox empowers storing and processing data locally - on the edge, e.g. a car, windmill - and synchronizing only select data to a central instance (cloud/server) or directly to other edge devices. Uniquely designed to run on restricted devices from sensor to smartphone to server, ObjectBox is faster and more efficient than alternatives, and solves data synchronization out of the box with native language APIs that are fast for developers to implement. This enables the digitization of industries and new IoT use cases that need to * process large volumes of real time data on the edge * work offline, independent from any internet connection * reduce cloud costs and energy consumption * keep data secure, private data private. ObjectBox' out of the box solution saves teams on on time-to-market and reduces development costs.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Partners
Target client profile:
BusinessEnergy Utility, BusinessServicesTransportersPostal Service, Couriers and Messengers
, BusinessServicesTransportersRail, Metro & Tram, BusinessServicesTransportersTrucks & Other Road Vehicles
Tags: Electric, Internet, Sensors & monitoring, IoT
The environmental benefits: Cuts the power consumption of their IoT applications;Reduces companies' emissions by 50 - 90%;Edge computing;
The Financial benefits: Saves energy costs;Reduces cloud costs by up to 80%;

Organization short description: ObjectBox DB is a fast on-device database for Mobile & IoT. Supporting Java, C, Go, Kotlin & Swift. Running on Android, Mac/iOS, Windows, Linux, Rasp Pi & more.
About: ObjectBox enables scalable and sustainable digitalization in IoT and Mobile with a reliable, high speed database and data synchronization solution. More specifically, ObjectBox empowers Edge Computing: storing & processing data locally - on the edge, in the car - and synchronizing only the data you need, efficiently to a central server. With ObjectBox' speed and efficiency, devices can operate reliably offline, in real time, creating more sustainable computing architecture while reducing energy and electronic waste
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: Technology for rare earth elements separation and extraction
Identification: The Geomega Solution aims at providing an environmentally sustainable and profitable solution to recover rare earth elements from permanent magnets and other mining sources. The technology has been developed to address some of the intrinsic challenges faced in conventional Solvent Extraction (SX), where the most advanced improvements and decades of operational experience are all in China. Geomega Solution can increase recycling of end of life products and create a sustainable and independent supply of rare earth outside of China. Most importantly, neodymium magnet producers will finally be able to recycle manufacturing waste efficiently and without affecting the environment.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partnership opportunities
Tags: Rare earths, Industrial materials
Sectors: Waste/Pollution, Industry/Goods, Materials and chemicals, Manufacturing and construction processes, Solid waste management
The environmental benefits: A 55% reduction of GHG emissions (kg CO2-eq./kg REO);41% reduction in Energy consumption relative to the mainstream alternative solution that is being used in China today;A 82% reduction of GHG emissions relative to producing from a mine;
The Financial benefits: Capital costs estimated to be over 50% lower than a traditional alternative; Operating costs comparable to prices in China but with a significantly better environmental footprint;3 years payback time with a contribution margin average of 23%;

Organization short description: We are developing a disruptive technology in the rare earth elements (REE) sector.
About: REE are important in many of the high tech and clean tech applications in today's world but it comes at a great cost to the environment in China. In Geomega we have developed a technology that allows to separate REE in a clean and sustainable way and are currently working on recycling REE from industrial waste to further derisk our technology and begin generating cash flow before we apply it to the mining industry. We own the Montviel REE project in Quebec that has over 120 years of resources and is easily accessible by existing infrastructure.
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: An innovative system for sub-metering electricity consumption
Identification: In a rapidly changing global energy context, energy efficiency is becoming an increasingly important issue. Energy efficiency is the largest contributor to reductions in greenhouse gas emissions globally, with renewable sources of energy coming second. The industry is the world's largest energy consumer, accounting for more than 30% of total global energy consumption. To tackle this issue Qualisteo developed Lynx², a technology dedicated to electrical consumption metering. Lynx² helps to better monitor industrial energy consumption, leading to the identification of potential energy savings. This Solution can be implemented on all types of buildings, such as stadiums, airports, factories, and stations. Thanks to its dual innovation in metering and data processing, Lynx² can reduce energy consumption on industrial sites by over 10%.

Solution on-sentence summary: Low construction and maintenance costs waterless urinals
Identification: Traditional urinals not only consume between 1 and 4 litres of water per use, but also need a lot of energy during production, use and transportation. URIMAT waterless urinals reduce the water consumption by 100% and use no energy during operation. Thanks its low weight compared to other urinals, URIMAT plastic waterless urinal range reduces energy consumption during transportation by around 80%.The Solution relies on high-tech plastic or ceramic urinals with an integrated and patented odour-trap (MB-ActiveTrap) which assures that urine is transferred without water to the wastewater pipe network without any odour nuisance for users. The rimless urinal bowl with water-repellent surface assures smooth transfer to the wastewater system and makes cleaning easier compared to water-flushed systems. First-class customer service is provided by the manufacturer and their distributors.

Solution on-sentence summary: Design special molds for the manufacture of thermoset and thermoplastic composites
Identification: Vistex has developed a disruptive technology for the manufacture of advanced thermoset and thermoplastic composite products. The patented Pressure Focusing Layer (PFL) process, which reduces energy consumption as well as capital expenditures and operating expenditures by at least an order of magnitude, provides customers with improved throughput and performance at a competitive price. The PFL process reduces manufacturing waste, while providing equivalent strength, dimensional tolerance, and improved aesthetics when compared to the same autoclave cured products. Vistex utilizes digital modeling and proprietary optimization algorithms to drive the design of the patented fabrication process and manufactures complex components without the need for extensive heat, therefore using less energy.

Tags: Composites, Manufacturing, Software
The environmental benefits: Vistex process generates 20 times less materials waste than the Autoclave processes;Vistex's process uses roughly 60% less labor per part (note, this is relatively skilled labor);Compared to an Autoclave, the industry-standard technology, CO2 savings using Vistex’s technology are 120 kilograms per square meter of the composite. This is equivalent to driving 293 miles in an average passenger car;The chemical footprint of Vistex's process is on average 8% of the chemical footprint of an Autoclave, but comparable to the chemical footprint of Compression Molding;
The Financial benefits: The cost of curing one square meter of composite with Vistex technology is roughly 60% lower than the curing cost using an Autoclave for volumes over 10-50 units.;The cost of a composite produced by the Vistex process is roughly 30% lower than market standard while increasing margins for the manufacturer.;

About:
Vistex Composites is a manufacturing innovation company that has developed disruptive technology for the manufacture of advanced thermoset and thermoplastic composite products. Our patented PFL™ process can be integrated into existing manufacturing plants, leveraged by Vistex in-house to manufacture high quality advanced composites made at lower cost than competitive processes. 



Our patented PFL™ process reduces energy consumption and CapEx/OpEx by at least an order of magnitude, provides  improved throughput and performance at a competitive price. The PFL™ process substantially reduces manufacturing waste while providing equivalent strength, dimensional tolerances and aesthetics when compared to industry standard technologies. Vistex utilizes digital modeling and proprietary optimization algorithms to drive the design of the patented fabrication process, and manufacture complex components without the need for extensive heat, vacuum, consumables, etc. In an industry that traditionally relies on brute force, Vistex provides an elegant, energy-efficient solution.

Solution on-sentence summary: Solar street light that integrates environment sensors to reduce energy consumption
Identification: The solar street light designed by Green Tech Innovations works with the data collected by environment sensors and adjusts in real-time with the charge level of the integrated battery. The electronic controller manages the energy for the best use of the whole system (solar panel, battery, LED, video, environment sensors, etc.) In that way, customers can be sure that their electricity consumption will be optimal and will help them to achieve a significant reduction in their electricity bill. The Solution could replace existing street lights with a renewable energy system that is totally autonomous. With Solar E-Light, not only will Smart City no longer just be a concept, it will also enable citizens to regain their pole position in the urban space, while decreasing their energy expenses. In addition to reducing CO2 emissions, the system is modern and updatable, economically profitable for the customers and has the ability to integrate the last innovations.

Identification: The reliance on fossil fuels and the greenhouse gases they emit threaten humanity and our planet future. Progress have been made and renewables now account for 25% of the world energy production stemming from wind, solar, and hydroelectric, but this progress has had limited impact on the transportation sector. Hydrogen can be produced with zero carbon footprint that can play two relevant massive roles : enabling the Renewable-energy system and decarbonising transportation. However, the financial model does not support long term deployment of new hydrogen infrastructure. The solution aims to accelerate the deployment of hydrogen fueling infrastructure profitably by leveraging small, streamlined, modular The hydrogen generators come in two main classes of products. The hydrogen generators come in two main classes of products. The AutoARK is a fully automated hydrogen generator created to a scale for residential, small business, telecom and farm applications.

Solution on-sentence summary: Microbiological bioremediation of heavy metals contaminated soil
Identification: To meet this challenge, this solution is a microbiological bioremediation method to be used on site. Thanks to a specific mixture of selected micro-organisms and enzymes, the populations of natural micro-organisms present in water, soil, sludge, etc. are stimulated. By optimizing their functionality and their processes, it makes it possible to degrade hydrocarbon molecules correctly and quickly, to sequester and inertize heavy metals. Hydrocarbon is an organic molecule and is used by microorganisms as a food source. With PETROLSYNTH, hydrocarbons are degraded up to 95%-99% and this quickly and naturally. Heavy metals first sequestered by micro-organisms, then inertized via several strategies including chelation, inclusion in non-hazardous and energy-free molecules.

Solution on-sentence summary: Biomethane production from mixotrophic single cell algae
Identification:
The concept of the process is a closed circuit of water and biomass in a 1.5 hectares area. For this process, only Algamoil strain can be used, this is our patented mixotrophic single-cell alga composed by 50% of lipids. There are four steps during the cultivation of the algae: 1-Photosynthesis to grow up the biomass sequestrating the CO2; 2-separation of the biomass and the water recycling 100% of water; 3-Heterotrophic growth of the biomass with the decomposition of organic waste, or agriculture by-products to increase the lipids percentage, 4-Separation of the lipids from the solid part.

Main benefits of our solution are: -To reduce the output of the CO2 in the atmosphere by two ways: (i) sequestering more than 9000 tons of CO2 it in a natural way with the photosynthesis and (ii) reducing up to 20% the output of the drainpipes of cars and trucks with the utilization of the biofuel. To reduce the use of food to produce energy (Biodiesel & Biomethane) -To reduce the use of agricultural land to produce energy. Reduce the production of plastic pollution -The high profitability of this solution for the final client/investor.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Funding, Credibility

Organization short description: Biotechnology based on microalgae harvesting
About: We sell keys on hand plants for the cultivation of monocellar algae in a closed circuit, like Spirulina, astaxanthin, Omega 3, Chlorella, or any other algal strain. For the solutions we will present only Algamoil, composed by 50% of lipids and part of the family of Chlorella. The plant which will host the photobiorecatos shall be preferably a greenhouse, thus we need a huge quantity of CO2, 10.000 tonnes/hectare/year, to force the chlorophyll synthase inside them, autotrophic phase, with or without LED light, it depends on the solar radiation. After this step which last one day and the photobioreactors empy every night, we will feed the algae inside a fermentor to develop their biomass, heterotrophic phase. This process last four days and the nutriments are, for example, cattle or chicken manure, digestat, residuals from wineries, breweries, dairies, etc., but certainly not human waste or pork manure. We need between 10.000 t/y and 15.000 t/y of nutriments, the difference is about the quality of them. At the end we will receive 50% of pure vegetal oil of third generation, once refined it will become biodiesel, bioethanol, biokerosene. The other 50% is a dry leftover which can be used as nutriment for the fish farming, livestock, etc., as a fertilizer or employed in a biogas to produce biomethane. Could be also used as raw material for the production of bioplastic even biocompostable.
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure

It was equivalent to tell the corrosion experts that human can live six-times longer or an unbelievable scientific miracle to current standards.  AnCatt's revolutionary next generation anti-corrosion coating will dramatically reduce corrosion cost which is one of the largest cost of our economy if it is not the largest cost driver.  Since metal lifted human civilization from bronze age to iron age, and even intensify during the modern age; from building construction to bridges and highways; from automotive to aviation and shipping; from energy infrastructure to defense system.  The initial target market will be marine, shipping, energy and transportation infrastructure, and aviation.  AnCatt environmentally-friendly much longer lasting anti-corrosion paint product could easily save billions of dollar for one major transportation or energy infrastructure repainting maintenance such as a bridge. a oil rig, or an offshore wind turbine.  Or AnCatt coating can solve the pandemic of infrastructure budget crisis.  Huge saving will lead to huge carbon reduction, most important, AnCatt technology will also lead to dramatical reduction of the two most intensive man-made source of CO2 emissions from steel production and cement production.  AnCatt unbelievable anti-corrosion coating technology breakthrough has been vetted and awarded by leading organizations including American Chemical Society, National Innovation Summit, National Science Foundation, and NASA.  AnCatt also received the most promising energy and clean tech company venture award from the RICE Alliance. Solution on-sentence summary: Turning plants into practical consumer products
Identification: Cleaning products are everywhere. We use them to clean our clothes, dishes, windows, and now more than ever our hands to keep us and the people around us safe. But only 3% of products in this $13 billion industry are eco-friendly, which comes at high environmental and societal costs for future generations. On top of that, products that are eco-friendly face performance challenges or safety concerns, leaving us as customers in doubt over which product to buy. Sironix has developed a new technology to turn plants into eco-friendly cleaning ingredients that are performance advantaged and free of hazardous chemicals. By offering bio-based technology to cleaning brands, producers and consumers alike, Sironix aims to reducing the environmental footprint of a huge industry, and allows you to shop a product that fulfills all needs: sustainability, safety and performance.

Solution on-sentence summary: A modular energy storage system for large-scale building applications
Identification: SolarLEAF is a distributed energy storage solution that directly PV couples to solar panels and installs underneath them. This panel-level format is enabled by an  advanced thermal management design which passively ensures that the batteries are maintained at optimal operating conditions. The solution directly addresses the high-cost variability of energy storage installations. These include: permitting, interconnection, customer acquisition, project origination, EPC and other project overheads. In particular, commercial installations in the 50kWh to 1MWh often lack a location to site the energy storage. Yotta addresses this challenge directly. The installation is in-line with the solar installation, requiring very limited additional training for existing solar installers and provides them with a standardized approach for deploying energy storage.

Target client profile: BusinessConstruction, BusinessManufacturingSolar Panels, BusinessEnergy Utility, BusinessServicesBuildings Operators

About:
We are a Danish company that develops innovative solutions within plastic glassware, our main focus being functionality, product safety and the environment - reuse & recycle! 



Once your reusable, recyclable and eco-friendly plastic products are used, we take them back. Then we grind them and make new products.



Our products are made of specially designed plastic, which ensures that the glasses never shatter, leaving dangerous glass shards. 



Together with our customers, we will lead the way at developing reusable, recyclable and environmentally friendly plastic drinking glasses and other products that never break as well as accessories tailored to individual markets.



Within our collection of reuseable, recyclable and environmentally friendly plastic glasses, there are more than 160 different plastic glasses in the plastics material’s polycarbonate, tritan plastic, PP & SAN.

The collection contains, among other things. water glasses, wine glasses, gin glasses, beer glasses, champagne glasses, drinking glasses, cocktail glasses, decanters, ice buckets and much more. All within the category of unbreakable hard plastic, plastic glass, plastic mug, plastic cup, etc.

Solution on-sentence summary: Algorithms matching energy consumption with actual energy usage in commercial buildings
Identification: Climy provides instant energy savings for commercial buildings, and we do this fast, remotely, and without ANY risk for clients. Climy's innovative features are specifically useful nd relevant under the COVID situation and in the post-COVID world, where a long term building occupancy reduction is expected due to the economic downturn. With algorithms, Climy dynamically matches actual building occupancy with energy consumption. There is no need to install new sensors in buildings given that Climy leverages existing building automation technology. The savings come at no risk for customers, as there is no need for an upfront investment, and Climy's contracts are performance-based, charging a percentage of actual savings delivered by Climy.

Solution on-sentence summary: A long-lasting bottle made from ocean plastic and supporting coastal communities
Identification: 22 million kilograms of plastic enter into our oceans each day, devastating marine ecosystems. Over 75% originates from uncollected waste and polluted areas that need better waste management. The Ocean Bottle is a long-term solution to the ocean plastic crisis that everyone can be a part of. The Solution is giving plastic a value so it is not discarded and therefore preventing the ocean from being choked with waste. By giving plastic a value in Haiti, Philippines, Indonesia, Egypt and Brazil. tens of thousands of people in coastal communities are engaged to become plastic collectors and have the option of earning a living wage while keeping the environment clean. Each Ocean Bottle funds the equivalent of 1000 ocean-bound plastic bottles  in impoverished coastal communities where there is little or no waste management and plastic pollution is prevalent. Plastic collectors can exchange plastic waste for money or credit via blockchain technology to spend on tuition, tech goods, health care and micro-finance.
Looking For: Network, new clients, funding, visibility, partners, credibility
Tags: Recycled, Packaging, Reusable, Marine & Oceans, Municipal Solid Waste, PET waste, Floating debris

Solution on-sentence summary: High performance, eco-friendly, self-healing epoxy primer for industrial environment
Identification: Incumbent solutions to the problem of corrosion have included coating components with high toxicity and VOCs. Inspired by nature, our self-healing technology begins to repair coating damage immediately and without manual intervention. AMP-UP 100 Low VOC Self-Healing Primer is a single component, environmentally friendly, and self-healing water based hybrid epoxy primer designed to replace incumbent solvent-borne systems with a higher performing and more environmentally friendly coating system. This novel coating system is designed to displace incumbent coating systems that often release large amounts of volatile organic compounds into the environment. AMP-UP 100 primer also removes steps of mixing separate components before application and has a dry and re-coat time within 1 hour. This primer doubles the lifetime of the coating via built in self-healing technology, that responds to damage when and where it occurs without external intervention. This results in half the amount of paint purchased, half the energy consumed, and only 5% of the VOC's of most solvent-borne coating systems over the lifetime of the surface.

Solution on-sentence summary: A manure additive to fluidize liquid manure and reduce ammonia, methane and nitrous oxide emissions
Identification: SOP® LAGOON is a powdered additive for the treatment of the liquid manure of dairy cows. It is used at 2 grams per cow (0.07 oz per cow), per week, making it very practical and simplifying the logistics for farmers.The application of the product can reduce the emissions of Methane up to 23%, of CO2 up to 22%, Nitrous Oxide up to 100% and ammonia up to 100%. The ammonia reduction that can be achieved in barns with slatted floors does not only constitute an improvement for the health of the animals, but also for the working conditions and health of the operators. It also helps the farmers with the management of liquid manure, dissolving any crusts or sediment, keeping it fluid and reducing/eliminating the need for agitators.

The Financial benefits: SOP LAGOON is profitable for a farmer already from the first year of use, as it does not require equipment compared to traditional manure management ;

Organization short description: Since 2001, SOP researches, develops and commercializes scalable solutions for Sustainable Intensive Agriculture
About:
The 2050 challenge requires the world to feed 9 to 10 billion people without compromising the needs of future generations. At SOP, we believe the only way to achieve this goal is through Sustainable Intensive Agriculture.

Founded in 2001 by Marco Poggianella, the Italian company SOP - Save Our Planet places both environmental protection and farmer economics at the center of all its activities. Thanks to the proprietary technology developed by SOP’s founder, the company has developed farmer oriented solutions that could enable faster climate policies.



Its products for crop systems and livestock operations interact with the microbial and biological activity of soils, plants, and animals and enable stable and consistent yields while reducing the emissions of greenhouse gases and other pollutants.

SOP solutions include products:

• for CROPS, which help farmers reduce the use of synthetic fertilizers, lowering inputs costs and mitigating the environmental impact of intensive cultivation of staple crops, including corn, wheat, soy, rice, alfalfa, and cover crops;

• for ANIMALS, which enhance overall health, improve feed conversion efficiency, and reduces costs of operations, while improving the production of milk, meat, and eggs;

• for WASTE MANAGEMENT, which reduce odors, ammonia emissions, and greenhouse gases, while mitigating the impact livestock waste on the environment and the surrounding communities.

The efficacy of the products has been established through scientific studies conducted by several of universities, including UC Davis, Cornell, University of Milan, Guelph, and the University of Piacenza.

SOP LAGOON, the product for manure lagoon management, was studied for its ability to reduce ammonia and GHG emissions from dairy liquid manure. The results of this study were published in September 2019 in the international peer reviewed journal called “Sustainability.”

SOP products are currently distributed in North America and Europe, enabling farmers to achieve sustainability within intensive agriculture across economic, environmental and social impacts.
SDG’s of application: SDG 6 - Clean water and sanitation, SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: A connected voltage control device for controlling energy consumption in large buildings
Identification: The voltage of the electrical power provided by utilities fluctuates at the mains – typically in Europe, between 207 and 253 Volts. Although it does not affect the functionality of the electric loads – designed to work within this range – it affects the electricity consumption. Voltcontrol products stabilize the voltage around 207V, which saves energy and increases the lifetime of electrical devices. The device is connected to a server to record the energy consumption and savings of each building. This platform may also host and transmit information from other sensors related to all energy sources in a building (heat, air conditioning, water, gas, etc.). The VCS voltage stabilization & reduction technology allows clients to save 10-15% on their building's electricity bills and another 20-30% on global building maintenance costs thanks to a longer lifespan of light bulbs, electrical devices & engines. A lower electricity consumption coupled with a longer lifecycle of light bulbs and electrical devices & engines translates into much lower CO2 emissions and lower use of raw materials and transportation as well as less waste. An AI system is currently developed to analyze the consumption data to identify potential problems and send alarms to the client.
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Partners,
Tags: Smart-metering, Maintenance and inspection, Sensors & monitoring, Smart-buildings
The environmental benefits: 15% reduction of electricity consumption;Lifecycle of light bulbs multipled by up to 3 times;
The Financial benefits: Quick payback time for the client, 3-4y on average for a large building;Direct saving from day 1 on electricity ;Indirect savings on maintenance and electrical devices replacement (20%);
Complementary solutions:
Heat recovery system: Low temperature heating of premises by recycling waste heat from refrigeration systems (Energy,Buildings & Shelters);animeo Connect : Facade shading management solution for increased energy savings in buildings (Buildings & Shelters);Recovering heat : Standardized, ready-to-install solution for supermarkets to heat buildings or water using waste heat (Buildings & Shelters);LightFi: Continuously measure building occupancy to optimize energy use for HVAC and lighting



 (Buildings & Shelters);
Organization short description: VoltControl helps saving CO2 by reducing electricity consumption and enhancing lifespan of lamps and electrical devices.
About:
Utilities are sending electricity in the network with an average tension of 230V with a tolerance of +/- 10%. However, all electrical appliances are built to work between 210 and 250V, so if 210-215V are enough, why use and pay more?

VoltControl devices are placed at the entrance of the electricity in the building, lowering and stabilizing tension around 210-215V. The unused power is not paid by the client, generating 8-15% of savings on the annual electricity bill.

Another huge benefit of tension lowering and stabilization is to avoid power peaks that are overheating and potentially damaging lamp bulbs and electrical engines & devices, thus lowering their life span.

Lower electricity consumption and longer lifespan of bulbs and electrical engines will not only save a lot of money for the client, but also reduce CO2 production.
SDG’s of application: SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: A high-performing switch-disconnectors for pv and energy storage system applications
Identification: In the solar segment the utility scale solar plants are moving towards the 1500Vdc solutions from 1000Vdc. The need for the switch-disconnector is to be energy efficient and able to achieve the 1500Vdc disconnecting as low amount of poles as possible, which has an impact on the efficiency level as well as lowering the needed cabeling. OTDC switch-disconnectors range above 250A ensure reliable breaking power for every current level, enhancing safety, efficiency and simplicity. For 1500V DC systems, the basic configuration is two poles from 315A up to 800A (IEC 60947) and from 250A up to 600A (UL98B). The ratings from 800A up to 1000A for 1500V are achieved by the parallel connected poles. Both front and side operated models are available. Modularity of the OTDC Switch-disconnector allows to disconnect up to 3 1500Vdc circuits with only one switch. Optimized 2-pole DC switch-disconnectors for 1500V DC utility-scale photovoltaic power plants and for Energy Storage System (ESS) applications bring space savings efficiency with up to 64% reduced power losses compared to weakest in the market and better performance with DC-PV2 ratings.

Tags: Electrical grid, Inverter, Maintenance and inspection, Solar photovoltaic

Solution on-sentence summary: Mapping the seafloor, offshore wind industries and protecting against illegal fishing
Identification: It is expensive, unsustainable and dangerous to research and monitor oceans and marine environments, yet that information is critical to protecting and understanding the ocean as well as the profitability of the $2.5 trillion marine industry. Data Xplorer is a solar-powered ocean drone, also known as an uncrewed surface vehicle (USV). Powered only by the sun, it can travel on the ocean for months at a time collecting ocean and environmental data using its suite of modular sensors. It sends the data back in real-time through secure communication systems and clients can control the USV from anywhere in the world using our user portal. Capable of traveling both in coastal waters and on the open ocean, and with a customizable platform for multiple sensor integration, it offers the ability to understand our oceans in an entirely new way. Utilizing this technology, Open Ocean Robotics provides specific services in seafloor mapping, marine mammal detection and enforcement against illegal fishing.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world

Solution on-sentence summary: Digital platform for unlocking the potential of secondary material exchange
Identification: Excess materials and products are currently not exchanged in a structured manner on a large scale. Mounting environmental pressure, consumer awareness and circular ambitions put pressure on companies for taking responsibility, they need to scale up their currently small scale initiatives. Excess Materials Exchange operates a B2B digital platform where companies buy and sell any type of excess materials, products and waste streams.The platform matches materials to their highest value reuse option. On the platform, the Resources Passport Module gives materials an identity and collects material data in a structured manner which allows to find high-value reuse options. The Tracking & Tracing Module allows users to follow physical resource streams by linking them to their digital twin through identifiers (i.e. bar-codes, QR-codes, RFID chips). This enables to communicate when and where products and materials will be released. The Valuation module quantifies the financial, environmental and societal impact of materials to understand which next use application is the most beneficial. Lastly, the Matchmaking Module facilitates the matchmaking of excess materials to new reuse options thanks to Blockchain and Artificial Intelligence.

Solution on-sentence summary: Hydraulic device system for the activated sludge sewage stations
Identification: Traditionally clarifiers are equipped with a Clifford (cylindrical skirt). The currents are directed towards the bottom and have a circular shape in which sludge is captured as a cloud. So that, sludge is spread and it is difficult to gather it and recycle to the aerated tank. Speed-O-Clar is a custom-made HDPE retrofit device improving primary or secondary clarifier performance. A cone shaped piece of equipment, installed at the inlet of circular clarifiers, directs influent onto a baffled plate, changing the direction of flow within the clarifier. This creates a centripetal flow at the bottom which make them more efficient and enhance the limit flow rate.
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Water-networks, Domestic & municipal wastewater, Industrial wastewater, Activated sludge, Water & Wastewater treatment
The environmental benefits: Energy savings;No maintenance;
The Financial benefits: Short ROI (few months to 2 years);
Complementary solutions: REM: A novel acid regeneration system for steel pickling (Waste & Pollution,Water,Industry & Consumer Goods);E.S.T.: An intelligent robot-based system for automatic extraction, treatment and packaging of sediments (Waste & Pollution);ECOSOFTT: A suite of solutions to allow underserved communities to manage their water resources (Buildings & Shelters,Waste & Pollution,Water);BIO DISPERSIS LC: Recycle vinasse, a polluting residue from the alcohol industry, into organic additives for concrete (Waste & Pollution,Industry & Consumer Goods);
Organization short description: Developer of SPEED-O-CLAR™, clarifier process, enhancer for sewage stations, prevents from overwhelming situations
About:
Speed-O-Clar cancels or reduces the risk of sludge leaving during periods of high flows (intense rain). Its principle intervenes on the currents and accompanies the decantations towards the bottom of the clarifier. The sludge blanket disappears in favor of a settling front which is driven towards recirculation. All the installations have reached more than 2 X original flow concept by rainy periods.

The Speed-O-Clar process is maintenance-free, wear-free, energy-free, has already been installed in all types of clarifiers, scraped or suctioned, in all diameters (7 to 52m), in all flow rates: from 4m3 / h to 2000m3 / h.
SDG’s of application: SDG 6 - Clean water and sanitation, SDG 7 - Affordable and clean energy, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: Connecting water utility users in the poorest urban populations
Identification: 1 billion urban dwellers currently lack access to running water at home. Rapid urban growth will make this worse. In 2050, 3/5 of humans will live in cities and need access to water service at home. The task and expense of offering them reliable at-home services are formidable, and requires breakthrough financial and technical innovation. Low-income urban populations have either never been connected to water networks or are being disconnected. In addition, an estimated 50-60% of water utility subscribers cannot pay monthly bills and face disconnection for arrears. CityTaps' vision is running water in every home, with a goal to reach 3 million people by 2023. CityTaps provides the only smart Pay-As-You-Go metering solution to address a billion person market. The CTSuite solution provides a financial and technological offer which allows low income populations to pre-pay their water in micro payments and avoid disconnection. As a result, utilities no long accumulate debts from their subscribers and thus have better financial resources to sustainably serve everyone. CityTaps' solution improves the lives of both water utilities and their subscribers creating a win-win situation for everyone.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: New clients, Visibility, Funding, Partners, Credibility
Tags: Developing countries, Software, Smart-metering, Sensors & monitoring
The environmental benefits: Today, globally, water utilities lose approximately 50% of the water they produce;By reducing water loss by 15% (reduction of non-revenue water), we save 10% of water extracted from the natural resources;Enables utilities to treat and pump 10% less water;Potential to decrease energy consumption by 8% (utilities);
Complementary solutions: Kelda Technology: Halve the amount of water used by your shower without diminishing the experience (Buildings & Shelters,Water);Water Widget: A simple and inexpensive device for reducing water usage in showering applications (Buildings & Shelters,Water);Hydraloop: A fully automatic stylish in-house greywater recycling system (Buildings & Shelters,Water,Waste & Pollution);AQUA4D: Water-Smart Irrigation: Precision irrigation for water efficiency and land restoration (Food & Agriculture,Water);
Organization short description: Our vision is running water in every home.
About: Our vision is running water in every home. CityTaps has developed CTSuite, a solution that bridges the gap between water utilities and the urban poor: a water prepayment service that comprises the world's only smart and prepaid water meter, CTMeter, and a billing software, CTCloud. Our system helps utilities become financially independent and able to invest in infrastructure for at-home water service to even the poorest residents. Beneficiaries use mobile money to prepay for running water with any mobile phone, at any time, for any amount, and improve their household budget. Running water in the home is substantially cheaper, more convenient, and healthier than any alternative. Our innovative solution has the potential to dramatically and quantifiably improve the lives and well-being of a billion urban people who do not have access to water in the home. It is our goal to work together to make access to running water in every urban home a reality.

Solution on-sentence summary: A dewatering technology for the implementation of the urban sewage sludge directive
Identification: Premier Base has developed an approach to dewatering municipal wastewater sludge for small WWTP's that involves no energy or chemicals. The product receives secondary sludge in the range of 0.8% to 1% DS and dewaters to a range of 7% to 10% (ranges of 30%/40% can also be achieved). The Product A concrete tank*: unit dimensions 1m in-depth, 3m in width and 8m in length.  Sludge Drying Beds may be used for dewatering sludge well digested by means of either anaerobic or aerobic processes. The Sludge Drying Beds does not require any coagulants instead utilizing heat, gravitational forces and the sloping floor to dry the sludge resulting in significantly reduces operational costs of the wastewater treatment plants, a reduction in dried sludge volume and hence a reduction in transport and disposal costs.
Maturity stage: Prototype testing in the real world
Looking For: Network, New clients, Visibility, Partners
Tags: Domestic & municipal wastewater, Filtration & purification, Water & Wastewater treatment
The environmental benefits: Transport of sludge reduced from 1 per week to 1 per 3 months;Uses no energy;
The Financial benefits: Reduces the operational costs of a 500 PE WWTP by up to 50%;Reduces chemical costs up to 50% ;Savings of over €100k annually for 500PE WWTP;Transportation reduction of up to 90%;
Complementary solutions: REM: A novel acid regeneration system for steel pickling (Waste & Pollution,Water,Industry & Consumer Goods);E.S.T.: An intelligent robot-based system for automatic extraction, treatment and packaging of sediments (Waste & Pollution);ECOSOFTT: A suite of solutions to allow underserved communities to manage their water resources (Buildings & Shelters,Waste & Pollution,Water);BIO DISPERSIS LC: Recycle vinasse, a polluting residue from the alcohol industry, into organic additives for concrete (Waste & Pollution,Industry & Consumer Goods);
Organization short description: Ecofriendly sludge processing technology which does not require energy or chemicals.
About: A system for the effective separation and decanting of water from waste activated sludge and the drying of the treated sludge. Each unit within the system, which is made out of precast concrete, is 8 m x 3m x 1.2m, has a sluice door located in the front wall and a valve controlled filler inlet pipe at the back wall where the sludge enters the bed. This process forces the dry solids to the top of the unit which is the inverse to what occurs in other technologies and provides the uniqueness to this system. The dry solid content on the top also has the effect of filtering the incoming sludge. Each unit is covered with a roof for ventilation, heat absorption and surface water runoff. The sluice door contains alternating plates to facilitate the filling of the units and the decanting of the water at multiple levels within the sludge, with a sump located at the front wall to facilitate the efficient removal of the dried sludge from the beds. A scraper and conveyor can also be added to scrape off the dry solids and transport to a skip. The units are modular in design with each unit having a capacity of 30m3/d. The efficiency of the units depends on the target dry solids required and the climatic conditions. The units are especially efficient in warmer climates. The system can be manually operated or totally automated.
SDG’s of application: SDG 6 - Clean water and sanitation, SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 11 - Sustainable cities and communities, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution name: AWA® : The Smartphone of Solar Energy
Solution on-sentence summary: An efficient, sustainable, and reliable electricity service for every household
Identification:
AWA ®, the Smart Solar Energy Station ® is an individual, harmless, intuitive fully integrated all-in-one solution. Despite having one of the World's Largest Wireless Energy Networks, the Sun, with a 99.999% network coverage, more than 80% of Africa's territory is not served by any electricity grid network. 

More than 65% of the population lives in rural areas and only a fraction of this population currently uses a generator to power basic household equipment, often limited to lighting, ventilation and sometimes a television set. Families have no electricity to run water pumps to have access to safe water or refrigerators to store indispensable vaccines and medicines. To tackle this challenge, users simply have to remove the AWA® from the box and connect the AWA® device either to the Planet Plug® certified household appliance or directly to the electricity circuit-breaker panel to provide safe direct current (DC) power throughout the house. The AWA® enables Direct-Current full-size household appliances such as fridges or freezers to run directly from the harmless DC energy produced by solar panels, eliminating the need for a costly, troublesome and inefficient inverter.

Solution on-sentence summary: Large Autonomous Laboratory Vessel to collect oceanic mega-data
Identification: Today, oceanographic data is mostly collected in 3 different ways: via scientific exploration vessels, drifting buoys or satellites. These 3 complementary solutions to each other, each have their limits; the high operational cost and therefore the parsimony of deployment of scientific exploration vessels thus limited in time and in the marine space, an exploration area constrained by drifting buoys because of their dependence on sea currents as at their source d energy conditioning their lifespan, visibility limited to a few meters deep and data based mainly on optical or altimetric technologies for satellites. SphyrnaALVs can carry up to a ton of measuring equipment. They make possible to collect no less than 50 different types of data, transmitted in real time, for a cost divided by 50 compared to “classic” scientific vessels.
Looking For: Investment opportunities, credibility, visibility, clients
Tags: Electric, Marine & Oceans, Boats, Automation, Sensors & monitoring, Vehicles, Electric vehicles
The environmental benefits: Noise pollution and chemical pollution reduction;Monitoring Marine Protected Areas;
The Financial benefits: Cost divided by 50 compared to “classic” scientific vessels;Autonomous instrument;
Complementary solutions: IOT flood alert: A smart device-based solution for information, anticipation and alert of flood risks (Water,Infrastructures);Breeze Technologies Environmental Intelligence: Smart sensors for air quality monitoring and improvement (Buildings & Shelters,Infrastructures,Waste & Pollution);Air Pollution Abatement (APA): A smart multiservice platform for air pollution abatement (Buildings & Shelters,Infrastructures,Waste & Pollution);Urban vegetation monitoring: Supporting cities and planners with an inventory of the ecological status of the territory (Infrastructures);
Organization short description: SEA PROVEN imagines the boats of the future and is positioned as a world key player in the surface marine drone market.
About:
Inspired by the shape of Polynesian pirogues, the SphyrnaALV reveal remarkable hydrodynamic performance. With their innovative conception and design these unique, unmanned surface boats are characterized by four crucial elements.



- First of all, their very high level of stability: due to their asymmetrical hulls, pitch and roll motions are considerably reduced. Such design also provides the specificity of generating very low physical and noise disturbance to the equipment installed on board.



- Range is definitely another key component of the SphyrnaALVs. The ships are propelled by an electric engine powered by solar, wind and tidal energy. This energy mix provides power for the propulsion system as well as for on-board equipment without any consumption of carbon energy. In addition, the hulls of the vessels have been optimized to reduce drag and therefore energy consumption. All these specifications allow us to carry out 10- month offshore missions, at a speed of 5 knots.



- The Sphyrna's third asset is their lightweight and strong architecture.  The Sphyrna-Odyssey mission perfectly demonstrated the ships' adaptability to the very demanding requirements of acoustic missions, as well as their robustness in the severe winter conditions of the Mediterranean Sea in which they were operated between September 2019 and March 2020. Such reliability is even more remarkable as the Sphyrna were also designed to be deployed and dismounted very easily by an extremely reduced team of two people. Transportable in standard 40-foot containers, they can be easily deployed anywhere in the world.



- The last specificity of the Sphyrna is their capacity to load more than a ton of material, which makes them precious data collectors, for up to fifty different types of data, including : passive acoustic monitoring, measurement of anthropogenic factors (noise pollution, chemical quality of the environment, radioactivity,

etc.), 3D photogrammetry of Posidonia meadows and of seabed, currents, and many other parameters useful to scientists and companies to better understand and manage human activities in a sustainable way.



The environmental, societal, economic and political issues of the 21st century will be closely linked to our oceans. And yet, this vast and complex ecosystem is still largely unknown (according according to the International Hydrographic Organization only 10% of the seabed relief is known beyond 200 metres of depth). Based on this observation, a question arises: how to transform human activities and guarantee their sustainability for our oceans if we do not have the capacity to correctly know, track and monitor 71% of our planet? It is clear that the awareness of economic and political decision makers in the field of maritime issues is now accelerating and that many of them are willing to get involved in sustainable actions. To do so, they need technological equipment tested and made reliable for oceanic use, but also resolutely innovative vectors to be able to deploy these technologies on a large scale: the Sphyrna ALVs were designed with this objective. The ambition of Sea Proven is to become the leading supplier of ocean data in Europe by deploying a constellation of several hundred Sphyrna ALVs throughout the world. Operating like sea satellites, they will make possible to draw an accurate mapping of our oceans in real time, thus enriching the data already acquired by conventional tools (satellites, drifting buoys, research vessels). A way to revolutionize global oceanographic exploration.
SDG’s of application: SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production

Solution on-sentence summary: A personal styling ai for faster online shopping, higher conversions and less returns
Identification: Every year, the fashion industry faces greater than $35B annual losses in returns, over $60B resulting from insufficient personalization and more than $50B from overstock and out-of-stock in fashion e-commerce in Europe and the USA. Dresslife mitigates these losses with its Personal Styling Artificial Intelligence (AI) that helps shoppers find clothing they like and that fits in a faster and more conveniently way, leading to higher conversions and less returns for fashion retailers. Dresslife sorts products based on a recommendation score, reflecting the probability of a customer liking and keeping an item. Personalization is 6x more effective in all segments other than apparel, due to shorter product lifecycles and the complexity of the human body. Dresslife mitigates losses and achieves similar metrics for fashion e-commerce, by addressing the segment-specific complexities. Global marketplaces, such as Amazon or Alibaba, already reach a revenue uplift of 35% through personalization. Dresslife allows fashion retailers to maintain competitiveness and avoid losing market shares to the larger platforms.

Each year billions of clothing items are produced, and over 95% of them end up in a landfill. EON is powering the connected and circular future of commerce. Organization short description: xFarm Technologies is a tech company focused on making agrifood sustainable through digital.
About:
xFarm Technologies is a tech company that aims to digitise the agrifood sector by providing innovative tools that can support agricultural entrepreneurs and stakeholders in managing their businesses. 

Born from the union of the start-ups xFarm and Farm Technologies, the company's aim is to drive the digital transformation of the agrifood sector.



The company's offer consists of three pillars: technological solutions for farm and supply chain management, digitalisation project management and training activities for farmers, professionals and agrifood managers. Working in these three areas, it is possible to implement a change that is expressed both on the tools front and on the upskilling front.

Today, xFarm Technologies' services are used by more than 120.000 farms, covering more than 1,6 million hectares, in more than 100 countries worldwide, 25 of which have an active presence.



The core services of xFarm are a management platform, a dashboard of supply chain analytics and advanced agronomic algorithms.

The platform is a Farm Management Information System, i.e. an application that can be used from both PCs and smartphones, and covers all areas of any farm. In fact, there are functions covering business administration, bureaucracy, financial management, agronomy, sustainability, agromechanics and precision agriculture. The aim of this product, tailor-made for modern farmers, is to combine in one simple tool all those disciplines that would normally take place in complex and separate software.

In parallel, xFarm Technologies also offers IoT devices, such as weather stations, pest monitoring traps and environmental sensors, which allow field parameters to be monitored for advanced advice through predictive modelling.



xFarm Analytics is a dashboard for the aggregation of data at the level of the entire supply chain and makes it possible to view the agronomic situation of the conferring farms, the environmental impact (CO2, Water, Acidification) and the supply chain relationships, both at the overview level and at the level of the individual farm. The use of this tool is coupled with a digital transformation path, where agronomists and engineers from xFarm Technologies support the partner on implementation, training and project management.



xFarm LAB, on the other hand, is the division of xFarm Technologies that deals with Research and Development with a strong Market-Driven connotation, creating IT and IoT solutions applied to agronomy that, integrated in xFarm or in the partners' systems, use data to provide decision support to the farmer. To date, the group has already developed strong know-how in the areas of irrigation, crop protection, yield monitoring, integration with agricultural machinery and Internet of things in agriculture.



xFarm Technologies today has a team of more than 60 people in 4 offices (Lugano, Milan, Rome, Barcelona) and pursues its goals of increasing agribusiness sustainability through a focus on user experience, technology integration and cooperation throughout the supply chain.
SDG’s of application: SDG 9 - Industry, innovation and infrastructure, SDG 12 - Responsible consumption and production
